review_body: about amazonbasics amazon basics was launched in is amazons own inhouse brand for fast moving small electronic consumer goods here amazon uses its massive collection of sales data to launch products that are in huge demand already exist in the market but at lower prices simply put up similar replica for something successful but at much affordable prices if something isnt an immediate hit amazon pulls it and moves on amazon otherwise is like an online marketplace where it provides portal for various sellers to sell their product but with amazonbasics amazon is selling its own product at its own marketplace here it derives the benefit of eliminating any intermediate distributors or retailers hence amazonbasics branded products are available for lower price attracting bulk customers online as an additional benefit amazonbasics products are delivered free to prime members are covered under amazon warranty for all and hence any claim or replacement procedures are highly streamlined immediately taken care of about our product requirement vs actual recently purchased new qualcomm qbix car charger was looking for cable with usb to micro connector listed my priorities under various heads to come up with conclusion and let us compare the actual product based upon my initial requirements data exchange since it was to be primarily used for fast mobile devices charging in car data exchange capability was not much of my concern preference though would surely have been usb but it didnt bother me if could only get usb too actual product did try to copy movie file just for the sake of testing data exchange and found it to be pretty well did not capture any speed data but then we all know speed of data transfer also varies with the type of data being transferred the more variety of data being transferred simultaneously the lower will be the speed length of the cable again since could not afford to have lengthy loop of cable bunched around my gear knob preferred to keep it short simple hence my only lookout was upto around meter or below actual product the cable came nicely packed in paper packet and was precisely meters or approximately feet long the length was sufficient for me to plug in any of the mobile devices to my car charger at the drivers or the side passengers seat tangle free flexibility strength standards am not particularly fan of those stubborn braided wires which are so hard that they retain the shape in which they are bent wanted something that was thick yet flexible enough to acquire circular shape when bunched actual product the cable received looked exactly as shown over the site with good flexibility reasonable thickness sturdy intermediate cable the whole construction of the cable due its cable size flexibility is almost tangle free the associated cable was not exactly thick but cant be termed as thin or delicate too its not the thickest ive seen but then thickest doesnt always means most durable given my application its more than just suitable the overall built quality of the cable insulation looks promising enough to last few years even if used for other than car charging it looks durable enough to last long had further shortlisted mansaa an amkette cable for the same purpose but they were too long for my requirement compact moulded connectors had an inclination towards moulded connectors to avoid any issues where the connectors break open exposing the terminal pcbs actual product there are no complaints regarding the connectors of the actual cable the connectors are perfectly moulded without any joints or risks of splitting open the connector casings are further quite compact at terminals to fit in comfortably at scarce spaces the connector ports are sturdy enough both at usb micro ports the micro port pins lock securely onto the charging mobile devices which is quite good no signs of loose construction being gold plated is more of misleading fancy term in this case as most of the metal ports designed today already have corrosion resistance nobody is going to use them in saline sea water anyways availability of ties velcro straps as per my intended use in car where compactness was of paramount importance expected an included cable tie or velcro strap would be nice add on to properly adjust arrange the cable as per requirement actual product this miss the most in the provided actual cable there is no provision of an included strap or cable tie through which could adjust my required cable length easily decent current handling capability on the newest qc certified chargers the current transmission can go up to amps in certain cases hence the cable needed to have decent current handling ability actual product the actual cable has nameplate rating of handling up to amps against demands at new qc chargers that could go up to amps here let me clear out that the latest qc chargers vary voltage to current ratios to achieve desired fast charging thus it is not like continuous flow of amps is there it keeps on reducing hence cable ratings designed for continuous current handling of anything above amps would sufficiently work with qc chargers have tried it safely multiple times charging my samsung from without the cable getting hot warranty comes with year warranty as expected not the best in the industry but reasonable other observations apart from the above listed features the other details of the actual product received worth mentioning are the cable is manufactured in china imported by amazon warehouse dealers under the brand name philosophy of amazonbasics the cable has manufacturing date of oct it was imported to india in dec the cable has mrp tag of bucks however purchased it online for bucks being prime member shipping was free customer care toll free number email is also printed over the label for registration of any consumer grievances final verdict it has been few days since have received been using this product so far everything from construction to performance seems to be convincing enough to recommend it and for price of around suppose its worth it will surely update if any malfunction is observed worth for buy the quality that amazon basics at times give at cheap prices is beyond imagination simply superb goverment shouldnt hinder amazon products amazon products rather gives competition to local qualityless products which consumers are forced to buy beacause they have no quality competition make in india is good but if the make in india products are simple cheap copies of branded products without any investment in and without and make in india would never be successfull and ousting companies like amazon will only lead to loss for consumers govt should infact encourage such competition amazon basics provides one of the best cables available for charging your phone or connecting devices as an past customer of many cables from amazon this cable doesn also disappoint supports fast charging for all my samsung phones use samsung pro samsung plus which this cable is compatible with very sturdy thick and very long ft very affordable pricing thanks amazon also use usb cable for my samsung fe super product charging is ok however it mere foot in length the vendor could have mentioned correct product description there is no need to mislead too early to say performance as have received it today good have bought many cheap chinese micro usb cable in rs and rs of ubon and of many other chinese local companies and none of them worked properly finall decided to go for this and it is charging as well transferring data without any issue and am very happy with my purchase my advice dont buy cheap chinese local cables of you will have to throw them in dustbean after some time better buy this one

about the tv wonderful probably the best tv in this price range inr good google interface loaded with features lightweight watt power consumption stable design average sound and picture quality is quite good but if you compare it with premium brands then obviously not that good features most of the streaming apps available and compatible you can connect with wi fi lan cable hdmi set top box laptop usb gaming console old dish cable and direct tv antenna as well built in chromecast to cast any compatible app directly from phone to tv over same wi fi network ways to connect phone via cast feature on mobile apps no password needed only need to be on the same wi fi network via chromecast app project only selected media pics videos or entire phone screen ways to connect pc laptop windows cast option project the entire laptop screen on tv using windows cast option need to be connected on same wi fi network via hdmi cable about the amazon installation service awful the technician brought cheap hanging hook that had mrp inr on it and asked for inr for it without any receipt he kept telling that it was not for sale and company had sent this specially however it clearly had mrp mentioned on it went to market and bought much better cabinet for just inr and for installation of that as well technician was really adamant to drill the two required holes on top he just drilled one on top and one on bottom and kept all the other spare screws which had bought with him after about half an hour of arguments he finally drilled the other required holes and for all this he kept cussing me that wasted his time there was no assistance from the person who represented the service agency as well this whole process took me two hours to complete that too with lots of arguments this was the worst installation experience in my life so far bottomline please do not avail the so called free installation service from amazon it is just scam instead call the acer support they will do the job much better after using it for months here are it pros and cons pros great picture quality it awesome blacks are very good and is adjustable sound with db is very good looks great with thin besel remote comes with favorite ott buttons content upscaling is very good cons remote could have been better can use dth remote to turn on both televisison and set top box remote operation is bit complex motion technology not great there is noticeable blur when watching moving ballson ott but it decreases when you switch to dth overall it nice buy at this price point think am getting fairly better picture quality and sound am satisfied with the product product has good picture quality good product at that price with sound applications running smoothly months older no issues yet it running smoothly you get decent features for the price you pay screen resolution might be set back as you may find pixalation overall it good am amazed with the picture quality of this hd ready tv it is truly an amazing panel found it suitable for viewing distance of between to feet any nearer it may not look very crisp and any farther it will feel like very small size the speakers are also very good for the price and can get very loud without any distortions however since the speaker is downward firing the experience will vary based on whether the tv is wall mounted or kept on stand the remote is good voice search works well for me tv start up takes long time in my opinion but have not compared it against any other inch tv and hence do not know where it stands among peers ghz wifi works very well even across walls only negative aspect faced is the experience of using my bluetooth headphones earphones firstly the connection sometimes doesn happen automatically after restart which means have to remove and re discover the device thru the menu which is not simple secondly the signal itself seems to be very weak and even at distance of feet in front of the tv the signal breaks even if you move your head by inches however am still super happy with this tv got it for during the launch offer and it is totally worth it and is recommended from my side at this price range it is good quality product on this market acer only should work with sound quality improvement otherwise all ok picture quality really impressive wifi connectivity good easy to install boderless screen design is premium and also google voice support is good sometimes lagging no major issues found on this tv just go for it vellu for money good product very nice product save money

absolutely value for money connect it with my samsung inch uhd tv jbl soundbar and jio set top box all is working zakkaass picture quality improved compared to my earlier cable now getting dolby with this set up thumbs up for this item best product at fair price quality of the cable is too good must buy picture clearity upto the mark

achha product hai thoda brightness badhane ki jarurat hai after heavy usage for days pros battery last brightness depends on the brightness of the place we re using it smooth and addictive attracts you to scribble something on it best time pass my years old boy loves to doodle so to avoid him scribble on everything bought this for him now he lovesssssss to write on it while other children addicted in mobile proud of my kid but the misfortune is it addict everyone so when my son busy playing with other toys we started using it cons color started fading could see some dark blue at bottom as it somewhat green colour while writing if we write our palm will be visible in this slate it really drawback even if we cautious about it we re helpless delete button print gone in day easily get scratch size want to big and need more brightness over product is awesome like this product very nice satisfactory brightness is very low and depends on the ambient light in the room otherwise great product na its nice product to use and save paper and for this price range guess its the good option

affordable available and multi purpose cable best suitable for traveling and reducing overall cables to carry warking fine build also good it is nice cable as it fits in most of the phones and devices sturdy one no fear of damage by wear and tear however felt that the cable is heated up substantially with higher currents this uncommon in standard phone cables provided by oems have been using this cable from last few months and very much satisfied with the this product and recommend to go for it the cable quality is very good charging time is good with availability of different cable types considering the price compared to competitors at market this is cheap but no compromises have been made with respect to sturdiness or quality the wires are wonderful despite using it for more over month now no issues at all were faced regarding wire tangling torn out wires etc very sturdy and pretty easy to carry regarding charging speed it delivers what it promised the quality of the ports are also solid no issue had been faced at all packaging was great performance of the product even greater the wires are long enough though in my personal opinion little bit more lengthy would be icing on the cake making the product absolutely perfect one overall very happy with purchasing it great vfm product for all those having multiple type devices with them this one single cable has solution to charging it all warp charge is working fine and satisfactory lightning cable is working in normal condition rather than fats charging but overall the product is awesome and felt value for money like

after about month of usage this is an over all good product from inalsa here are the key highlights has dual speed options to chop onions tomatoes for tadka and also make purees chutnies etc does both effortlessly powerful watt motor cuts through onions like hot knife through butter easy to clean as the blades can be separated from the main jar thanks very useful and handy for daily kitchen needs reasonable price excellent product love good product the product works good and powerful too the box arrived damaged but product aint good value for the money good product motor quality is heavy just concerned about jar request company to make it available on amazon excellent product with heavy bowl powerful motor makes it easier to chop vegetables in few seconds this is very good kitchen accessory for every household needs helps to chop and cut vegetables quickly have used other choppers in the past this has much better cut performance

found the ssd took about seconds and delayed response to startup but when ever it didn start it was quick don know probably an issue with my psu or something hands down go for it quite nice sleek then placed this order after searching for rating of this seller which found legit the ssd is good installed it in my asus laptop the laptop is running with gigs of ram gen processor and this ssd after installing it boot up within seconds whereas my previous hdd takes nearly about minutes

after days of use bhaut acha chl rha ha and will review again aapko bata dunga kessa ha thoda time baad but product acha ha abhi tak kuch kharab nahi hua and mene bhe isska khayal rakha ha pencil is good working good but build could be better excellent experience works well with ipad pro inch good battery life no need to buy overpriced apple pencil brilliant product adds value to the pad thankfully the alternative to otherwise expensive brand pencil really great product by king one when purchased the pencil am doubt full about the quality of product but now month used it its amazing product by kingone and it no doubt best alternative for the apple pencil even it supports wireless charging that make it amazing and battery is also to good osm product and didn faces any ancidental power off as other pencils it cool and automatic swich off in it idel time save battery it like all rounder can made note and draw the paintings and so many other things am student it saves moeny it best in one forth price of original one cool great quality with noags for all those who can not afford the apple pencil this one is real problem solver its little hard to get used to the pencil but works like charm zero issues lovely product initially was sceptical using this pencil because it kept skipping lines and became unresponsive but after while it became as smooth as original you must go for it if pressure sensitivity is not what you are looking for with wireless charging and button shortcuts its the best budget pencil will update my review to stars after using and testing it for while if it passes all the criterion thankyou

after going through many reviews and checking multiple brands decided to settle with philips ac not sure how accurate is the pmi number it is displaying but we can feel noticeable difference after using it for over month cleaning the filters also easy overall happy with the product highly recommend so much so that bought another one it been month and just had to wash the first filter once and works very nicely everyone in the house is breathing nicely and clearly monitors the pm level in the air exactly when installed it in the kitchen the pm level went up as soon as the cooking started and the purifier automatically switched to higher speed and brought it down during karthigy when everyone was cracking crackers the pm level went up in the purifier indicating increase in air pollutants great product no issues and work very efficiently easy to install no noise and air clean quickly did not receive an invoice and there is no serial number marked on the product am unable to initiate any request with the manufacturer it reduces pollution indoor but take time good purifier with almost no noise and good display of impurities in air

after receipt of product received demo request and opted for demo code ref today contacted eureka forbes for the demo and understand there is no demo for vacuum cleaners from their end fyi please na good but complicated equipment blower function unable to use we didn receive stamped warrenty card with the product compact and good value for money but there was no demo from eureka forbes they did not bother to call us the pipe provided are of very low quality one of the pipe is already broken they have sent youtube link thats the great support we got from the manufacturer it is pleasure to clean without noise and stress this product from eureka forbes is very good it lives up the name eureka forbes have made in vaccum cleaner market good suction power easy power control cord length is also good with convenient button to roll it sufficient accessories which covers almost every area good filters works on normal sockets which isn the case in some high power vaccum cleaner demo for the product provided by ms priya was also good use of all the accessories was clearly explained and other necessary details to operate the product was clearly explained too overall am satisfied with the product and service provided till date

after testing couple of times it seemed as if the fans didn impact the cooling experience as much as hope and most of the work was done by the stand raising the laptop itself this laptop fans started failing couple of months after purchase and now make quite an annoying noise hence referring my above statement if you experience this noise it would be best to just leave it turned off if you don care about the small additional cooling it do cooling but not that like was expecting quality is nice having fans two separate controls controls four fans nd control for middle fan so depending upon laptop battery cooling required power can be distributed built quality is good although it is very light weight design is superb having two usb ports so even one fails second would be avail which will increase life of this product its throwing really cool air through small honeycombs can feel with hands so its cooling my laptop really well just had small issue about fans that sometime if pad gets tilted before starting have to tap it lightly to start it may be its balancing issue but its not much problem for me as it occurs only sometimes it works very well all time so recommend everyone to buy good product like the product and the performance also but the cost is too high think they need to reduce the price according to the performance for office use it is good adjustable is slightly okay build quality and fan quality is good best for price rpmlooks good quality is also good not for heavy gaming am using it for video editing premier pro works fine but fan sound is high

after using the phone for day feel corners have been cut in various areas jn sensor is not that great in low light color is typical samsung style with oversaturated greens interesting to note that jn is also being used in samsung new thermal management is very poor device heats up in normal usage within minutes if the screen brightness is high same is the case when camera app is opened simple games on flipkart gamezone are played there are reports on youtube of narzo camera shutting down on hot days above scenarios and hz adaptive refresh rate also drain battery like crazy speaker and earpiece do not have crispiness upper treble instead sound like white noise earpiece volume is low so is the speaker volume when on call on the other hand speaker volume is decent while playing back videos flashlight is half as bright as normal smartphones don really know if company did cost cutting here or its software bug no fm radio and secondary mic minor features missed if shifting from miui to realmeui the gallery app is not as good as miui one requiring more taps for basic opeeations like viewing whatsapp images folder mediocre ram management with realmeui android to be fair could not find any major bug in realmeui so far the lcd display is fantastic and very well calibrated with relatively cooler white point as opposed to yellowish super amoled there was no green or purple tint touch response was excellent screen protector case fast charger usb cable were present the phone feels much slimmer than my bulky due to its thin body gm less weight and sleek case camera app has full fledged manual mode something absent from samsung disclaimer above impression has been made after using smartphones over last years asus zenfone redmi redmi samsung strongly consider other current alternatives too like redmi note poco pro poco pro redmi note samsung samsung moto before buying narzo more info do not fall for bloatwares like glance when setting up the phone check as few check boxes as possible before blindly clicking agree turn off content recommendation by going to the settings additional settings get recommendations and switch the green toggle off to remove bloatwares that cannot be uninstalled usual way follow excellent guide by youtuber tech office mentioning all realme app names required for adb commands was able to uninstall hot apps games this way update detailed camera comparison between samsung and narzo samsung hdr algo seems more sophisticated narzo unnaturally brightens some shadows too much there is also some oversharpening both cameras choose cool auto white balance which results in bluer skies but lifeless greeneries even in golden hours however narzos colors become more hue accurate after choosing white point in expert mode whereas samsung still delivers bluish green foliage colors at cloudy white balance narzo strangely does some weak auto hdr even in expert mode but samsung fully turns it off in pro mode resulting unusable photos however when using night mode narzo photos appear more cleaner but less saturated at night gcam for narzo is not optimized properly and gives noisy night photos with greenish cast and crushed shadows much worse than realme night mode on the other hand thereas no gcam and no camera api support for at night you can take long exposure shots upto secs through expert mode by manually choosing shutter speed in narzo something you can do in this however requires tripod support and whenever done properly the results are very good you have manual film mode in narzo whereas you can even manually set white balance in video mode as samsung lower end galaxys don have pro video mode this mobile is suitable for every one it good but camara is average quality very good phone iam very happy with this while using thank you amaon had purchased this phone in and this phone is actually brilliant in this price range camera is good fingerprint sensor is good back panel is good purchased black one no hang but there is small problem that battery drains little faster and when you click home button google assistant appears most of the time which is quite annoying sometimes overall am happy with the phone wanted an affordable phone this fits the bill perfectly fantastic finger reader battery sustainability for long time usage and hd quality natural photographs awesome product at stunning price

am not big on camera usage personally was even mentally prepared for bad camera based on some reviews here but was pleasantly surprised that camera clicks good photos they are not awesome but they are decent photos that can even be shared now coming to my biggest grouse heating issue the phone started heating up while charging but it was just little and so could have ignored it but then it started heating up more and got me very concerned even ordered replacement thinking got defective piece but then after further tests found that it is heating more when download huge amounts of data for example when restore data of my old phone from back up this is ok with me as don perform huge data loads regularly definitely not on phone then tested by running tasks usually perform such as checking office mails attending office meeting on phone watching video from amazon prime and so on the phone did not heat up even little personally this is good for me at this price range this is good phone but if you are camera heavy user and expect to perform heavy downloads frequently this phone may not for you am personally satisfied with this phone as it works for my type of usage will not go into plus points of this phone as they are covered by other reviews already am only attempting to clarify about how this phone can suit you or not in terms of camera and heating had many questions about these aspects before buying perhaps this review will help you make an informed decision to buy or avoid cheers display beauty camera decent performance amazing battery ok in mah expect more tbh overall good phone also after day of use found some network connectivity issue in my jiosim which using right now in this phone but ll keep update this review after month of usage it decent mobile under this price but few things worried me weight of the phone too many procedure to change some settings no screen casting apart from that it has good touch decent camera for day light battery life is good bought this smartphone for my mom samusung interface is very handful for easy use battery is superb last whole day camera is mediocre but provide original colour pictures all in all satisfied with this smartphone that got in sale for unable to do video call within same service provider as in volte within same service provider video call feature is available product is fine nothing fancy but for the budget it is good phone battery more than enough for normal use not sure in gaming camera good in this segment can record videos in fhd fps display since it lcd display the quality is bit less but good ram you can add upto gb of virtual ram but have to sacrifice your storage space to use it overall good budget phone finger print is working speedy battery backup is good camera quality is also good

am not pro gamer play gta valo and cs go this mouse is enough for casual gaming and didn find any issues with it although after year something can hear the parts in side the mouse rattling but that could be because the mouse was dropped several times though the year maybe it well built so even the counterparts are moving the mouse still works good at this price nothing much to say sbout it it does the job and cable is strong enough decent buy if you want simple mouse with long enough cable the product built is quite good and hold is also nice must buy if you are looking for good mouse at this price standard mouse with good build quality can be used for both office and home basic purposes cheap in price great built quality smooth in use best over other mouses of this price segment and even better than costly mouses prefect product overall if you want good daily use mouse go for it over any mouse in the market can be used for normal purpose adequate length of the cable brand value comes with quality easy to use not suitable for gaming been using from while and its super comfortable

am pleased with my purchase the installation process is easy and the product is very reliable the level safety feature ensures that the water heater is safe to use and prevents accidental scalding the water heater heats the water quickly and the temperature can be adjusted to suit my needs the only problem am facing is with the indicator ideally the red light shows that the water is getting heated and it turns off when the water is heated enough but in my unit it vice versa the green indicator is working as red and the red indicator is green it is worth buying it works well first of all packaging was poor secondly crompton says it is good for family of members bath bucket but for that waiting is too long go for higher rated geyser from crompton installation is not hard instruction book is given only lacking point is warranty card is sign seal warranty card is valueless works just fine but must say it is useful more for kitchen purpose and in bathroom if don use shower cuz after running for couple of seconds the temp of the water drops heating is not that effective being instant if anyone wants to take hot shower must go of geysers with larger storage capacity the packaging was good and intact no connecting pipes were inside the power cable was very short that made things bit difficult bought lengthy connecting hose for cold and hot water supply installed it myself and registered online on crompton site if you have drill machine or if you can borrow it it just takes two holes to complete the installation working well and makes hot water in mins do not connect using any extension box unless it is rated for otherwise the wires will melt better always try to connect directly with the socket very useful product

am posting this after few weeks of using the product usage continuous ott only no cable dish operator average daily usage hours the tv is great value for money product installation the installation was simple and amazon assisted installation was smooth timely and hassle free picture the picture quality is not great when compared with the smoothness of sony lg and samsung with these kind of specs movies and especially hi res tv series experience was somewhat diluted as most of the times the output while in hi res wouldn look like movie quality which we are used to of watching in the likes of sony samsung lg etc however with time you get used to it and only realize the difference when you see the same movie at someone else better tv sound sound output is decent you wouldn need additional support to enhance the volume as such remote sleek sensitive and user friendly it exactly like amazon remote os same as any smart android tv works smoothly without much lags or hiccups switching apps from one to another takes couple of seconds more than sony but unless you have used to of those performances it looks just fine standalone and as your first smart tv you wouldn find any reasons to not am using this on an old mac mini since the broadcom proprietary drivers aren available and the replacement drivers don allow for sufficient download speeds at least in my experience got this device up and running with ubuntu with linux generic google search for morrownr au and use the driver on github using the product tp link ac btw if you are using the other variant sold on amazon use lsusb and find out which network interface you are going to have to install drivers for giyf will admit this is probably going to be hard for someone who is not generally comfortable with shell bash for example but even though had never used dkms or iw before the github repo along with the build tools available in the jammy repo made it easy enough to get the device working read the git hub readme to be sure first got the drivers working in local ubuntu vm using guest additions to connect to the usb device directly from the guest os which also worked ultimately installed the os on the host and setup the drivers using usb tethering then got the same download speed using this device was previously getting on my other network interfaces on windows and mac but now on ubuntu the device itself is bit sensitive to the antenna direction when it comes to the impact on download speed have been using for about month now without complaints do not go for reviews that say that it do not support kali me and some of my friends all are using it for wi fi hacking and it works really well it also supports monitor mode if you are having issues in connecting it to your kali machine then just go through the web surf bit and you will find relevant articles on how to connect this tp link adapter to your kali machine there is also driver of realtek which you might need to install to make it work in your kali machine have given it stars just because the performance if not good as the alpha adapters which is reasonable for this range of price but in this range and for as beginner it is the best adapter you can buy nice product working fine my pc is now price is too high so giving star got the wi fi in one of the rooms from to has been working well since month now good alternative to repeater if only single device needs to access the wi fi from corner the product is very nice and have good wifi signal using this for over month now no complain but when it for the first time you need to install the driver on your desktop laptop from the tp link website to make it operational which is not very well explained in the manual this product is very good have buy this product because my laptop dont support wifi ghz band in ghz receive mbps speed only but my broadband plan is mbps easy to use plug and play windows good signal am using another room from router no signal drop receive full signal little bit expensive but go with this because of good signal receive mbps download and mbps upload speed on ghz and my broadband plan is mbps highly recommend this product purchase this product for company use and this is very good product

am writting this after months usuage go for it as suction power is too good only cons is dust capacity is very limited as we need to clean frequently it too heavy to be handle and not good for deep cleaning tried to clean matresses and sofa but dusts were there too early to write the review but working good so far likes handy easy to use comparatively light cleans extremely well due to strong suction power looks good good clean design power cord is very long easy to store doesn take up much space dislikes heated up quite lot within minutes not even minutes after cleaning an upholstered stool and foot rug had to switch off and let it cool so obviously not something that can be used at stretch to clean all your upholstery etc like other more expensive vacuum cleaners no flexible hose with the more expensive version with extension stick when one has paid much more providing the small flexible hose which is meant for cleaning inaccessible areas like underneath sofas ceilings etc was something expected sure the hose itself is pretty inexpensive they could easily have provided it at no extra cost if one needs that hose one needs to buy the less expensive unit again just to get the hose as it not even available for sale separately manual is hopelessly inadequate had to look up you tube videos no soft brush provided for cleaning the filter does not come in amazon packaging even though it fulfilled by amazon it just the agaro box think is closed by openable flaps not even sealed so we cannot be sure if it returned defective product or brand new one no quality check sticker or anything assuring that the product has been checked before packing on you tube video there was sticker at the joint of dust connector and main body on mine there is no sticker just slight sticky residue so it been removed by someone not sure if it returned product again as there is no seals on the box don want to return this as already had returned one box that was filthy with oil stains and had opened from the bottom flaps had come apart none of the attachments etc were sealed in their plastic cover packets quite loud reading the reviews thought it would be less noisy but it not no blower function other brands in this range have would have been great to have this only attachments floor carpet brush multipurpose brush crevice nozzle other brands in this range have many more an extra filter would have been good gesture to include not very light if one wants to clean high surfaces like sides of ceiling or ceiling fans etc one needs to lift it and hold in hand while cleaning very difficult to do especially for ladies or at least me middle aged lady again here the flexible hose if provided would have been handy someone could hold the vacuum cleaner while using the hose to clean high areas all in all reasonably happy with this purchase as it is supplementary one to my existing year old eureka forbes vacuum cleaner which is still going strong as the upholstery cleaning attachments for that model got lost do feel strongly though that the price could have been reduced considering all the above pros and cons compact size it is light duty light usage and limited application area equipment not for effective complete usage its good vaccum good suction and easy to clean up however the suction sound is quite loud nevertheless its good machine does the job well the product works well it just heats up after using for mins

as browsed various multiple earphones in this range on not so busy workday break came across this very feature packed product it seemed interesting and had something called dirac opteo in it anc so thought give it shot first day impressions it blown me away exhaustive list of impressions dirac opteo balanced sound with punchy bass yeah and not booming bass it so great and quite surprised it sounds like something you expect at higher price point soundstage as soon as the headphone is switched on it starts in battery saving mode once you turn on dirac opteo mode you can literally feel the space opening up all the instruments feel individual and sound separated fireflies by owl city sounds lovely and all the strings sway in the centre while the various zaps and buzzes surround you it really great for the price treble and mids clean and clear the bass doesn overpower them and feels just right the vocals come out clearly and all the instruments don interfere with it drive home by steven wilson sounds great bass punchy and tight love how it fizzles in bonfire by knife party and how it reverberates in turn down for what by dj snake breakin sweat by skrillex zedd sounded tight and discovered how well produced it is lovers of tight bass this is your product volume it gets really loud so loud that can listen to it at the highest setting but if that your thing then you should know that the highs get pretty shrill at the setting but the bass is still pretty clean and loud anc anc is present but won drown everything out it great add on but if you re looking for headphone to make all sounds around you zero then this won do that if you need to drown out some noise while you listen to your tunes this will do the trick ambient sound mode the opposite of anc it pulls in the outside noise to let you have conversation again you can blast tunes at high volume and still have convo but you can listen with lower volume near volume and hear things around you if the ambient sound also increased as increased volume it would have been amazing calling did couple of calls with no noise the other person said sounded great took couple of calls in local grocery store was pretty loud and the other end had no issue hearing me buttons the button placement is easy and didn feel any issue getting used to the controls the simple manual explains everything in mins so read once and you re good to go to note the sound is best in dirac opteo mode every time you turn it on you have to double press the multi function button to turn it on have loved having it on by default also every time turn it on it plays second tune which could have been shorter imagine hearing it every time you turn the thing on ugh connectivity once connected it to my phone the first time it connects to my phone within seconds of turning the earphones on battery it seems to last long ve been using them for about hrs and it gone down about cannot say anything more yet though when you take both the earphones out of your ears it doesn auto pause like some of the competitors annoyed that this was missed would have saved so much more battery if they did this build quality have black version it made with good quality plastic and didn feel heavy around my neck it doesn have metal anywhere and it quite simple think it looks decent exercise need to test will update later in summary an easy recommendation if you can overlook the small issues there great sounding feature packed and long lasting device here at great price would definetely recommend first was bit sceptical about the build quality but have to say it got pretty sturdy material and decent quality buttons bass is good vocals are much clearer in crystal bionic mode anc is working to degree will definitely cancel out the noise of your celing fan but don except any more than that no issues with call enx is working upto it name battery is sufficient around hours if you mix up the modes overall decent all rounded neckband jack of all and king of none all other things such as sound quality battery backup are very good but multiple device pairing is implemented very poorly if connect with laptop and try to connect with phone at same time it does not work many times if headphones are connected to laptop and you close the laptop without shutting it down then you won be able to connect with phone again unless and until you disconnect with laptop this is big bug please fix this this bo at anc neckband is very good but needs improvement and fixes pros nice sound quality while using crystal bionic sound but it average on normal mode which feels little more bassy and losses clarity at certain points great build quality it anc ambience mode is good in this price range it quite comfortable to wear for long sessions as per my ear fitting it has dual pairing which is very good but it not very seamless and there is small issue with dual pairing while receiving call on one device the audio video being played at another device won pause you have to manually pause instead there won be any sound output through that device its little issue but it would have been great if the video gets paused while receiving call on another device as this is available on bo at rockerz and few different bo at neckbands cons it range is very low considering bluetooth even have bo at neckband with which has better range even single wall coming in between ms can block the sound output its battery life is average which needs charge every day if you use it for roughly hours everyday with bionic crystal mode anc enabled while using dual pairing sometimes there are sound drops and lags in between and the sound gets high pitched and starts lagging sometimes if you switch quickly between devices this happened on the replacement unit received maybe it not the case with your unit sometimes no sound is received while playing audio from both devices don know if it wrong with my unit or every unit overall this is good and considerable neckband under if you want good bass rich sound quality anc ambience mode and descent battery life but if your requirements mostly is dual pairing then this is not for you as bought this considering dual pairing feature most importantly but it not really seamless in between devices but still it the best possible available feature in this price range or even under but it needs improvements and fixes to make it more seamless and efficient another problem with dual pairing is that the media doesn gets paused on first device if there call on the second one which is already there on bo at few other neckbands but then there is no media pause feature on them if audio is being played on devices first device audio will get paused if audio is played on second device and vice versa so do try it out by yourself because it my personal experience with the neckband maybe you get better experience thanks for reading happy shopping bought this one after using rockerz pro for over years now comparing this with that that one was ergonomically better felt snug in ears standalone review of this noise cancellation is just alright not too great not too bad sound quality is definitely great and excellent with the bionic sound feature kudos on that part bass quality is fairly good at this price point holds charge for as long as advertised overall bulky nature of the neckband puts you off and then the finish is poor too around the control buttons making it look very tacky cheap atleast on the funky grey one which bought because it was priced lowest conclusion good product at fair price nothing too great but nothing bad either

at rs it great deal use it for mobile vlogging noice cancellation is not working value of money good mike worth money very nice mic in this price range after seeing many microphone found this bought it becuase of its good ratings and reviews and in buget price this is best for beginners the first time had ordered this mic received in amazon plastic bag and the product box inside was completely damaged and was sealed using cello tape also the mic seller sent me was damaged and had low quality audio it was duplicate but when replaced received the packing in cardboard box but still the inner box had few damages the mix received inside was good here is detailed review of the mic the quality quality overall nice the wire might seem filthy and weak but in reality when tested it it was indeed bit durable it can easily sustain bit of pull and twist just mind the spots when the wire meets the audio jack and the mic sound quality sound quality is really nice but but but before you think of buying it read the paragraph below of noise cancellation the mic catches sound equally even if you are from far away or close to it noise cancellation this is major point used to mic lot for testing purposes let me share my experience tested it in different environments in closed room with ac and total silence in such environment you will get crisp sound like boom microphone but you will also receive bit of white noise or background static noise which you can easily reduce using the noise reduction feature in room with ceiling fan on and moderate noise still seems good but not great your is not exactly portable and the form factor reinforces that feature it is intended to be desktop unit and it comes with reasonable set of cables the quality of the included cables is quite poor so it best to use something else compared to the direct input from usb the overall sound is poorer with shrunken soundstage and coarse vocals and treble still this is being used in high end system suspect with many lesser speaker amp dacs it will be acceptable at maximum output the level is about lower than direct usb connection to the dac it is around the same as my signature acoustics unit which is rd the size but uses battery and doesn have volume control or the bypass feature or the nice display which is handy if you are close by the bypass is one of the highlights of this device it basically connects the two optical ports together in passthrough and allows you to use both bt and another optical source receiver though only either can be used at time the build quality is average it is lightweight enough that set of decent cables will tip it over backwards hence the thin cables supplied the onboard volume control is nice if bit redundant given everybody uses their handheld or other device to control volume use the dac remote it also has only clicks so the control will be very coarse the display has no spelling errors and while the resolution is low it is sufficient for the tasks overall it quite expensive but is more kitted out than similar devices the sound quality limitations of bt transmission compulsory resampling and lossy compression among others cannot be overcome even with the fanciest devices and protocols so rank it close to the top of what you can get as an add on for hifi system for more normal usage there are cheaper options available excellent product bluetooth speaker and is perfect choice for those who are looking for budget wireless speaker for their laptop or mobile phone with low volume issues or for those who need some portable music device and who dont want to shell out lot of money it serves these purpose very well and is not pricey why am saying all this first things first got this at the black one only as rest of the colors were way too pricey and choice of colors can be sacrificed in such case my laptop and phone volume is too low and watching video or listening to music on these devices is not good experience so here too this speaker served the purpose as connectivity is excellent size of speaker is conveniently small lightweight and battery backup is damm awesome after complete charge used this speaker for continuously for about hours at about volume and still the speaker is left with charge cannot comment right now for the charging time as it arrived with more than charge and just topped it to full bluetooth connectivity is exceptionally good upto mtrs fm reception is average without connecting the data charging cable but it is awesome if the cable is connected it has only four buttons and all the functions are controlled by these buttons only first button is mode which when pressed switches from bluetooth to fm to aux to usb memory card transition of switching is flawless volume up down keys are used to change volume and switch the channels long press changes the volume and short press click changes the channels in fm or changes the track via aux most usefull feature of this speaker is its mic yes you can actually use this speaker when connected to phone to talk with someone and that too with no connectivity issues voice clarity is very good for the calls made music clarity is not very good read cons for this quality of the plastics used seems good and feels durable cons sound quality is just average voice call clarity is very good where music is not dominant but when it comes to music this speaker struggles to deliver quality people are complaining in reviews that it doesnot produce any bass but actually its is the bass produced by the speaker which deteriorates the quality this is understandable for this product as it just has one tiny speaker inside and if manufacturer makes it to produce some bass will definitely deteriorate the music quality but this is manageable and you can adjust the music equalizers in your laptop or phone to get pretty decent music quality this is the reason dont consider its music quality con for the product theres one limitation about charging connector to it comes with charging port compatible to type connector so if you have charger with data cable supporting type connectors you are bound to use the charging cable supplied with speaker only so you cannot keep just one common cable with you to charge both your phone and speaker instead you will have to carry two different cables this speaker does not come with charger so you will have to use your mobiles charger for the purpose but for the price rage this seems reasonable useful tip for buyers most of the smart phones will display battery percentage left in the speaker but you can install any of these two apps bluebatt or bluetooth check ringtone and show battery level from the playstore if in case your phone is unable to fetch battery data from speaker what you get in complete package unit of bluetooth speaker cable which has aux connector usb connector and type micro usb connector tiny user manual quality of packaging excellent sturdy packaging used by cloudtail to secure the companys product packaging manufacturing date was of may like it portability and bluetooth connection is good awesome

came in few hours later installed and gave demo sound per other reviews sound from speakers is apparently bad but in my case found it satisfactory have it wall mounted in ft room and the tv speakers sound better compared to bose soundlink speakers that connected it to via bluetooth picture the panel great but nothing worth raving about gray uniformity isn great gray tones won be perfectly uniform across the whole panel there ll be darker zones towards the edges corners based on backlight placement blacks aren perfectly black and they re brighter than you expect from va panel but this isn noticeable at all when the room is lit no backlight bleed colors are as good as like them to be and the panel does get noticeably bright for my taste even when brightness is turned down to content is watchable from ft is good say better than expected and is well connectivity have mb broadband connection and all content streams in when available without stutters the tv has bluetooth and works with bosch true mixx pro mixer grinder watt mgm min black review usually do not write reviews but felt had to write this one because when was researching which mixer to buy found really bad reviews that do not do justice to the product went with the trust on bosch brand name and am extremely satisfied with the product have been using it daily sometimes multiple times in day for past month during lockdown period hope this will help others mixer includes capacity mixer body plastic blender jar ml fruit filter wet grinding jar ml dry grinding jar ml chutney grinding jar ml extra pounding blade spatula build and overall appearance the mixer grinder watt motor is extremely powerful have used it to grind both dry wet ingredients such asgaram masala idli dosa mix chana dal paste poppy seeds paste coconut chutney dry rice and urad dal powder ginger garlic paste ice etc regularly blend and make milk shakes lassis etc and have found it to very fast and convenient does the job fast within few seconds minutes depending on the amount and type of ingredients you are working with body is good looking sturdy well balanced and easy to wipe clean the vacuum feet are quite secure and give true hands free experience overload protector for added safety helps if you overload the mixer by mistake the jars also are easy to use and quite well built jars blades the jars are metal with removable stainless steel blades chutney jar blade is fixed an extra blade is provided for stone pounding affect spatula cum blade changer is provided the jar lids are made of transparent plastic each lid has small top cap which can be removed to add liquids materials while grinding blending each lid has rubber gaskets this gives completely leak proof experience while grinding blending these gaskets are very easy to remove and attach all jars have fibre clasps to close the jars in the blender jar juicer attachment has been provided this is the only thing have not used hence cannot review the performance of this attachment blender can be used without the juicer sieve and works fine in wet blender flow breaker is provided sound sound is high but that is to be expected in powerful watt machine dos dont feel if we follow certain guidelines we can best out of the product do not overload do not use for more than minute without giving little rest when turning the speed knobs dont turn all at once from to max you will see that it works better if you turn knobs slowly staying at each speed for few seconds actually for most things low to medium speed is enough the machine is really powerful when grinding large amount of ingredients the jar can heat up not the machine so give little rest in between for wet grinding use cold water to grind that way the jar will never heat up do not grind hot ingredients many people have complained about the rubber gaskets melting that can only have happened if hot food are being blended or ground bring food to room temp and then grind wash the jar gasket jars immediately using sponge and liquid detergent so that the shine of the jar remains intact always remove and wash the gasket to avoid unhygienic conditions as food can get under the gaskets in the wet blender remove the flow breaker by sliding it off and wash it separately as food particles can get stuck behind it to remove fine particles when dry grinding dont use spoon to avoid scratches to the jar you can use your hand and brush used for this purpose only this is an expensive piece of equipment in my house only my husband use it we do not allow children or household help cooks to use it this way the machine will not be misused if you mixer does not work please check the overload protector button on the underside of the machine remove some of the ingredients and try again take care while handling jar lids and lid tops although they appear quite well made cannot say if they will break when dropped pros the machine is very powerful and delivers what it promises it is easy to use and gives truly hands free experience easy to clean grinds and blends everything leak proof lids takes very little time to grind the motor does not heat up even easily the overload protector works perfectly cons guarantee manual the manual has to be downloaded from the amazon website the amazon payment is the guarantee there is no separate guarantee card provided had to call amazon to understand the situation regarding the guarantee card delivery the mixer grinder came in box but there was no special styrofoam padding this was big minus for me couple of extra lid clasps should be provided one of my lid clasps was loose it is working fine at the moment but as backup company should provide these as the jars are pretty large for smaller amount of products it is little difficult wish the smallest chutney jar was usable for both dry wet grinding rather than only wet the jars do have screws heads on the inner side but this is not big deal and can be cleaned quite easily review after using for few months pros the lock feature is really good for hands free usage grinds very fast say half cup soaked urud dal can be ground to paste in less than minutes juicer is good extraction is good for the juicy fruits good design and takes less space in kitchen cons noise is there for the power it grinds but anyway not that high as mentioned in some reviews which read before my purchase steel jars get heated up quickly so used to refrigerate the soaked rice or dals to balance the heat just need to be careful while cleaning as there are some sharp edges which could hurt little wet grinding jar tips clean the jars immediately after use to make the cleaning easy with sponge so that jars won loose it shine bought this bosch mixer on and the motor is not working have to buy another mixer what is the use of putting such big amount in it it worked only for years it was only for household purpose purchased very much disappointed with brand showed to their mechanical he said motor is burnt from inside true to its name the bosch mixer grinder is great machine to have in your kitchen however the locks of the cap have given away and cleaning it is challenge na this is very good product overall the dosa idli and other such batters come out excellent the motor is powerful and can handle any mixing and grinding needs the only unsatisfactory thing about this is the juicer it works well with slightly watery fruits like citrus oranges watermelon etc but the moment it comes to fruits and vegetables with lower water content the juicer fails at extracting anything the juicer is basically another blender jar with mesh attachment to sieve out the pulp there is no option of being able to push the fruits closer to the blender blade which makes it difficult to crush them all in all an excellent product as long as you stick to the citrus juices was happy customer of sujata for the past years and bosch was good option good design powerfull motor worth for the price bought in offer it has powerful motor does grinding pretty fast compact size lid lock clip very useful priced high juicer function is not much useful

bought havells lts instant geyser kw white blue and really happy made this decision let me start with why went for instant geyser instead of storage geyser storage geyser have tank to store water and heat it for example litre storage geyser fills up the litre tank and then heats the water as it has to heat high volume lts of water it takes time of about to minutes instant geyser on the other hand heat water instantly within to minutes however the catch is they dont have huge capacity tank which means at given instant it has only small volume depending on tank capacity of hot water now who should opt for instant geyser and who should opt for storage geyser is the question if you like to have shower bath for which you require more than litres of hot water continously then you should go for storage geyser since storage geyser of capacity more than lts will store lts of hot water and provide it to you as soon as you turn on the shower without any pauses instead if we consider instant geyser of lts capacity for shower bath it cant provide you lts of hot water continously because for every lts it takes time to heat water again hence for shower bath better to go for storage geysers if you like to have bathtub bath then instant geyser are good to go because consider using bathtub bathtub generally is of capacity lts if you even use storage geyser of high capacity as much as lts still you will have pauses of to minutes each because at one shot this storage geyser can provide you only lts of hot water continously and then you will have to wait for mins for the next lts to heat so to fill the entire bath tub you need to have times lts of hot water lts so the total wait time would be times mins on an average mins in this scenario of bathtub bath its better to go for instant geysers since they provide hot water almost instantly and eventhough there will be pauses for every lts of hot water still the pauses being very small you ll have bathtub full of water with enough amount of heat hotness then you might ask what should we consider for bucket bath both storage geysers of lts or above and instant geysers of lts or above are good to go just choose based on price time taken to heat instant takes less time energy consumption instant comsumes less now coming to havells lts instan geyser of kw why bought this havells is great brand wanted to have it for bathtub bath kw heats lts of water in just to seconds what liked about this product have been testing it from week and it is really ossum as it is heating lts of water in just seconds have used timer to note that the installation was totally free however remember you will be charged if there is any plumbing work do be done no need to buy any extra accesories like pipes everything is provided in the box you just need to buy amp plug which would be less than rs as soon as the product was delivered by amazon got message from havells saying they have registered my installation request and the very next day the instalaltion was done thanks lot havells this might differ for you based on your location live in hyderabad really like havells customer service the geyser comes with years of warrenty for the whole and yrs of warrenty on the tank it has auto cutoff feature to stop further heating or wastage of electricity if you forgot to switch off however please switch it off once done because eventhough it has auto cutoff still once the water in the tank cools down it will again start heating and the cycle repeats it shows color indication blue when its heating and orange when it has done heating have look at the pictures have attached note go for the kw model if you want hot water instantly in to seconds the kw model might take to mins to heat lts of water make sure it is kw model because see reviews from other customers who say the mustard colored geyser is not kw but kw better go for white and blue color to be sure very nice product good product kw rated heater is able to heat water in minutes and maintain that temperature for continuous flow of hot water good product great product at great price value for money and instantly warm water comes in just min havella water heater water heats up in secs depending on the weather this review is after using this water heater continuously for days in december in kolkata with one of the days being extremely windy and lowest temperature at degree celsius during afternoon early evening hours on the coldest day so far it took around min seconds to heat up completely if you don have chronic pain or arthritis or this is not going to be used for very old people whereby really hot water is required for bathing think it can work perfectly for winters with lowest temperatures upto degrees because have chronic pain and use this to get really hot water and for shower not using bucket and it manageable obviously can be compared to steaming hot showers using storage geyser but this heats quite quickly so can be used in the shower even with the low capacity for that same reason it can be used for multiple people because by the time one person leaves the bathroom and the next enters you ll have fully hot water only of lesser quantity so if you don live someplace cold or don need very hot water but mildly hot water this can be used for multiple people as well installation support was also good no cons only that if havells introduces instant heater in the range then that would be game changer and might give storage geysers run for their money because this is perfect for anyone who doesn have their own home and might need to move around because it compact and provides instant hot water

bought it in january posting it in august so ve used it almost months and giving honest review in short if you are getting it during sale time then it steal deal also in regular price it good product sound quality is good enough loud at volume bass is also ok whenever needed it produces punchy bass overall balanced mic quality is good in indoor condition but in noisy environment you can rely on this recevier can clearly listen to you you can do gaming as company claiming low latency myself didn test it now about battery backup company claim it will give battery backup of hours with case hours in single charge additional hours times charge via case but in practical use it gives total hours playback it will give around hours backup on single charge of buds volume if you only listen to music or watching video but no call or gaming you can charge the earbuds full times via case so additional hours just one issue with it design suit case type box not easy to carry in pocket would say it personal preference if you are into good looks design then it not for you now it regular pricing varries between rs in this price range also it is one of the best tws under will tell why now days many brands are launching tws in the market under most of them sound almost similar difference is like they are just marketing their tws with huge hours of battery backup by youtubers reviewers hours of playtime is just myth ve personally used truke airbuds lite buds which is by far the most false promising brand claiming hours of battery in their every tws but only give hours even other tws of boat airdopes pro which claim hours playback only give around hours defy gravity claiming hours only give hours if you are impressed by their looks huge battery backup and thinking to buy those you will be disappointed after purchase instead go with this you will not be disappointed read the negative comments first and decided not to buy it because the comments said it gives high latency on gaming like pubg and also it falls from ear while running and that the difference between normal and beast mode slightly had difference but pubg youtuber recommended me this so decided to give it try after trying out myself let me provide the facts for you have boat rockerz headphone which obviously should be better than this airdope but this airdope surprised me by doing better in providing accurate sound in pubg its been days used it daily for hours on full charge it has no buttons and it works on touch sensor which was impressive for me and in pubg it doesnt give delay as written in the comments it has good latency better than what had expected from the negative comments sometimes though faced the issue where one side of the airdope stops working because its either on standby without detecting the user or bug which is included in the faq guide help card in the box im satisfied in terms of gaming for sports like running wouldnt recommend because it slips away however maybe can tie the airdope with thread attached to ur neck so that its safe from landing on the ground im gonna try that please dont use both the airdopes while running on the roads with vehicles running for your own safety keep one side of your ear free for hearing sounds from your environment pros the level of volume it gets to is just awesome it can get incredibly loud so if you re at the gym these are perfect awesome bass noise cancellation is just great if you simply put them on without even any music playing won be able to hear things around very well it great for places like gym lovely battery life ve had them week and only had to charge the case once that too for just few minutes and the earbuds themselves leave them in case for just five min and you ll be getting battery for long long while they are very comfortable can be used for long periods of time affordable the touch controls are very responsive tap to pause double tap right one for next song double tap left one for either rewind or previous song can also pick up calls just by tapping multiple ear coverings are provided with it type port cons the sound quality is not bad or anything but it is slightly muffled as compared to good quality headphones etc the bass is the highlight so it great for music but for movies or gaming you won get the most crisp audio some connectivity issues sometimes have to turn my bluetooth on and off many times for it to work this is occasional not daily or frequent occurrence edit after month use it now very frequent issue the mic quality is good if you are using your phone but for some reason the quality is really bad if you are on pc sometimes on whats app the mic will not be detected if you are on call with these earbuds so you will end up having to take them off to accept call sometimes not an issue if you are the one dialing hope it just whatsapp issue rather than earbuds issue overall needed these for my gym since they play horrible music there lol so very very happy with them highly recommended for music and or as more affordable option as compared to jbl etc
