bought this item in august and the delivery and packaging was as good and sturdy as ve come to expect from amazon using the printer from my macbook is breeze over wifi although printing over wifi from android requires some poorly designed app from canon and has no direct support the only couple of issues faced with this printer were during setup scanning the qr code for the setup guide didn actually lead to much of guide rather boilerplate page would only much later find out the way from that page to the actual guide canon could do better job of surfacing the online guide as the image clarity in the included hard copy is quite poor installation of cartridges seemed to take forever must have removed and re inserted them almost times before they were properly detected no error messages showed up and didn know if had recieved faulty product or if was doing something wrong never having owned printer and always using either copy shops or the huge laser printers at work ended up making mistake in setting up the paper tray leading to jam at the first print itself thankfully it was straightforward to open up the printer from the back side and remove the torn pieces canon could do better job of demonstrating how to set up the paper sheets clearer access to the online guide might ve helped here except for the these minor concerns in setup enjoying using this printer surprisingly since printers alongside projectors are usually the worst items ever developed by the electronics industry ve used all the features so far print colored double sided scan and copy and not faced any issues with quality wifi or the cartridges good scanner printer installation procedure is very simple and priter quality is high had xerox copier but istallation of scanner option could not complete if you are purchasing it for your home use don look any further it has got all the functions you ll find in worth printers all in one includes print scan copy and fax as well colour adf duplex printing wifi you download the app in ur phone and give print commands via mobile itself only two issue that faced firstly the print quality which ll speak to the service center and secondly is the total quantity of color prints have only taken out couple of color printouts bad already the level of ink is guess ll have to purchase larger cartridge very good printer sometimes back to back printing cases paper blockage but overall very happy gud printer but printing cost is expensive in this price range features are very nice got this printer ion nov after days of usage unable to print as it is showing color black ink is low have print less than pages and in description they told that pages yield which is totally wrong cannon this was launched as successor for searched everywhere but couldn find credible source to explain the differences between the two researched extensively before purchase to find printer which will fullfil the following criteria for me wifi enabled so that we can print with smartphone without opening the laptop clear color print decent for child homework photo quality not required and cheap to run seem to fit all the criteria so ordered this even the canon authorised showroom didn have in stock so ordered the off amazon summary fullfills top two criteria though is little expensive if you do more than the occasional print delivery was days earlier than the delivery date shown on amazon so that was great it was just the printer box with no outer packing the box was sealed with cello tape and not sealed so suspect it had been opened at some point thankfully all the components were there and the seal on the printer and cartridges were intact so was ok with the delivery setup was smooth on both my smartphone and laptop over wifi never had to use the usb cable setup was through the canon app on phone and the canon website link for both given in manual which guides step by step on how to setup did not face any challenges and the setup and printing has been smooth from all devices color prints are bit faded on plain paper gsm this might be function of the paper and not the printer the black white prints are crisp and sharp the print speed is decent the only negative is the amount of ink consumption while the box says color prints and both my cartridges are showing at after color print and around specially for color prints the printer tends to drop the cartridge level by notch after just prints suspect the color cartridge will not last longer that full color pages refilling the cartridges few times is of course an option but it is messy and requires practice this is fine for me as need color prints very rarely special mention for the adf and duplex printing both the features are extremely useful duplex printing is especially unique in this price range and comes in very handy while printing larger documents overall am happy with my purchase after couple of weeks of usage will update the review if run into any issues

bought this phone after tonnes of research and watching and reading several you tube videos and blog reviews of multiple phones my budget was around max and this one somehow fit in all ways had almost finalized one plus nord ce but changed my mind at the last moment and don regret ve used redmi phones before so aware of the sturdiness and value for money they offer got this for with close to exchange on my one year old tecno spark phone one of the worst phones ve ever used refer to my tecno spark review for that here my review of this phone based on months of usage pros build quality is good finishing and lookwise it sleek and quite comfortable in hand back camera is really good better with the ai camera the mp gives good pictures although not comparable to phone or google pixel quality but for the price range it not bad portrait mode gives great pictures in well lit conditions decent in low light with night mode charger is very efficient phone gets fully charged within mins from below battery levels battery backup is decent with normal usage charge easily lasts for one and half day or more dolby atmos dual speakers are really good you could be watching movies on this and feel the surround sound through the speakers pretty loud too no lagging and smooth touch refresh rate is pretty good unlike some of the earlier redmi phones or chinese phones in general there are negligible auto installing bloatwares android performance so far has been satisfactory hasslefree usage in general something that struggled with lot with my earlier techno spark phone for basic functionalities cons front camera could ve been lot better in daylight conditions picture colors aren vibrant enough and in low light pictures come grainy dissatisfied with that amoled display isn as good as had expected especially becomes evident when light reflects on the screen while you re watching something nothing else worth mentioning that can think of right now may update this review if anything encountered for people with budget looking for good overall usage phone having this phone is worth shot along with nord ce lite nice phone with good battery backup fast charging sturdy body and good process speed camera quality is not good enough but overall good budget phone battery is decent charging is very fast camera is averaging overall nice product the phone is good from all aspects bug if ur looking for good camera this is not the one the price of the product is higher at the time of launch within month it dropped by the price qty is ok some features are missing which are available in chinese make model pros display super amoled battery life hrs moderate usage fast charging hz refresh rate work seamlessly cons miui lots of unnecessary apps processor sd is too old main camera not up to the mark overall just want to say if you re looking for phone to watch movies and series and casual gaming go for it pubg cod feels fantastic in this without any lag if looking for heavy gaming or looking for camera phone this one is not for you brother good phone need improvement in camera this mobile has the best camera compared with other models

easy to install working great recommended for light use if you want to use hard disks without lagging then will suggest to buy self powered usb hub the product does what it is intended to do however it does not compliment the sleek laptop use it with probably direct plug in extension no cord would be much better option needed portable usb extension headphones keyboard and mouse serves the purpose for an indoor setting have explained why it is not an outdoor device under the cons pros nice design sleek unobtrusive suits some work environments for those who have limited table estate go for models that have vertical usb slots saves space this is for those who can have it flat next to the laptop computer check image works well for audio hids and great for data transfer observation an interesting observation when using usb keyboard the usb drive is as if not more sensitive than direct typing with mechanical usb keyboards there is latency but chiclet and usb dongle based wireless keyboards seem to work well usb or wireless usb rf mouse works perfectly very little noticeable latency not for gaming purposes keyboards mice joysticks etc this is no brainer in rapid response gaming environments were latency is life or death an extension is not an option cons check image the usb female slots in the extension are shallow the male plugs do not go in fully there is cm of the metal plug exposed this may be risk in exposed outdoor environments humidity increases the chances of electric shock and dust being an insulator may cause static electricity build up the worst case is if conductor falls across the exposed points the whole system can short out suggest the designers take this into consideration for their next batch of products the depth of the usb slots needs to accommodate the full length of the usb plugs functionally it works design leaves lot wanting go for it if are sure you can be safe go for different model if you need this for outdoor use update th nov on connecting the keyboard to the usb drive there seems to be an increased latency and sometimes the keyboard does not respond as anticipated the text does not appear on the screen immediately and sometimes particular letter just cascades repeatedly and one has to press backspace often to delete the excess letters for data transfer it works fine but has lower speeds when all four slots are being used expected probably works well and does the job like it very much value for money product is excellent just that wire is very short rest all good using in laptop useful usb multiplier and works well for headsets too was apprehensive earlier if it deteriorates the audio quality only drawback is the length of cable as it keeps protruding out of laptop bag

edit this doesn change my review actually it probably makes it lean even heavier towards the star than star rating but actually sat on the keyboard while it was on my chair an absolute unit of dude weighing kg and the keyboard wasn affected at all genuinely surprised first of all give this instead of the but rounded it up instead of down because there more to like than dislike product was delivered promptly but the packaging was in rough shape when unpacked it the keyboard had three missing keys iirc it was left alt and the windows keys turned over the box and dumped everything and voila the missing keys fell out not off to great start but slapped those keys on which was very straightforward meaning that replacing keycaps in the future will be relatively easy and plugged in the receiver to my laptop no setup or rd party software necessary it just started working instantly pretty seamless only use the keyboard when connect my laptop to my tv and sitting at distance use my laptop keyboard otherwise absolutely love the keyboard was expecting it to feel wonky and cheap but it actually feels decent it not super premium but it much better than what was expecting for the price it has flip stands on the back to raise it and an on off switch if you want to conserve battery the keys themselves are full sized and as someone with larger hands really appreciate it the curve around the space bar looks cool but don think it adds anything ergonomically the typing experience is nice the keys have enough feedback to them not mechanical levels obviously but still satisfying enough the caps lock key has little raised bit to it so you can feel it without looking at it and don accidentally hit it while typing neat little addition the shortcut media keys on top all work fine with windows there not much else to say about the keyboard it should be more than sufficient for everyday office browsing school tasks and will be good and comfy for people who type lot do not buy this expecting gaming level keyboard with antighosting etc or buy it expecting to have the durability of true mechanical keyboard was initially going to mark it down for not having any backlight at all but given the budget that understandable and acceptable overall very much like the keyboard and find it to be above par for what you pay the mouse on the other hand no pun intended is mediocre at best the build quality is not good it does not feel good when you use either of the click buttons you can feel the inner mechanisms groaning like it gonna fall apart at any time the mouse also starts lagging randomly the lag only lasts couple of seconds but it occurs enough to be an annoyance also it just doesn feel good in your palm have an amazon basics mouse that purchased while was in the us for rs and that thing feels so much sturdier and better built than this it also has no lagging issues and the clicks feel smooth even after few years of use as an overall package would say it decent for the price there are lots of other sets in this price range and picked this literally because of the logitech branding since own few other logitech products and enjoy them lot the keyboard is doing all the heavy lifting here and carrying it mouse friend hope they improve the mouse going forward because then this would be the best combo in this range as it stands right now it fairly indistinguishable from its competitors recommended for people looking for an affordable wireless set for everyday computer work and people who type lot not recommended for gaming or any form of power users it might work for single player games like city builders grand strategy rtses etc but would not recommend it for any form of shooters especially online the mouse simply isn up to task the keyboard is good and working nice for me the mouse is too small and not able to use properly and getting pain after using for very less time only it will be good if the mouse is in regular size also the mouse is lagging bit even after changing the settings using this product since one year not any problem found even battery cell not change don really know if it worth the cost or not but mainly prefer silent typing and mouse clicks ergonomic is also must as use these for long hours currently use logitech mouse which is really awesome and makes almost no noise at all great product have been using this product for years it battery is great still running the keys could get hard with time therefore had to use wd to lubricate them after years some random keys have stopped working such del semicolon numpad the mouse right click isn functioning anymore the left click has irritating double click issue so not suited for fps games speed and connection is adequate no lag noticed the keyboard collects lot of dust so better to cover it ergonomics are great no issue with that if you re looking for longer size keyboard for approx years of proper functioning for daily or official use then it is good purchase mouse is small and comfortable even for left handed people keep in mind the keys will become stiff over time purchased it for my personal use which includes mostly working it has good connectivity both for keyboard and mouse have not faced any issue with it have not tested its performanace

first of all delivery of amazon it was as specified no delays hence appreciate it packaging not good the box was tempered torn and damaged product ordered black received brown didnt replace as the fountain pens can start with this as it does the job edited have been using this pen for over days now am facing issue of nib dryness if dont use the pen for sometime the pen doesnt write at all have to wet the nib or do something or the other in order to make it start writing it writes great when it starts writing but the initial pick up is really bad have platinum preppy too its better option to go with if the budget is tight however there we have good writing but bad looks few points have been reading about this pen which would like to answer compared with two other pens parker vector and luxor grip read in couple of reviews regarding the thick grip and the curve at the grip which makes it awkward to hold honestly have not felt so at all the grip is pretty medium larger than parker vector and comparable to the luxor it wont create any problems holding it am an average and people of same build hand and finger size wont be any problem also on parker vector the metal body starts to feel slippery due to metal small grip and feels tiresome after writing couple of pages been nice to hold the elegante and feel firm in hand it makes one feel like holding pen with substance nib and feeder it says fine on the nib and it is comparable to the luxor and parker fine nib few claim it is medium kinds its all about the pressure on puts when writing it just touch the nib on paper and rest the pen does so would say it is fine it is way too smoooooother and fluent than parker which felt bit rough parker fine nibs give feedback making it bit of dragging experience however on elegante the nib just flows and slides over the paper it is not only the nib but also the feeder which ensures the nib slides the feeder ensures that there is even flow of ink through out the writing experience the writing it leaves is slightly wet and not dry personally prefer that over the dry and dragging this ensures that one gets to write about pages sides without refill plastic construction and feel in hand the cap is made of brass as they say the cap has matte finish not glossy one the clip and top is glossy gives fair enough good contrast to add some looks to it when taking it out of the pocket the pen itself very much plastic if try to weigh both the cap and pen separately roughly they feel of same weight it is that light weight just feel factor how felt however this does not mean it is cheap construction it has fallen from floors down and did not crack anywhere so would say its good strong plastic it makes one feel pretty solid holding it the size if compared to other two is larger it rests pretty well in between my thumb and index finger which parker does not luxor does hence never needed to put the clip on the rear without the clip it is very much balanced parker and luxor both feel well balanced without the cap placed on top with clip elegante and parker feel bit top heavy ink filling personally always been fan of eyedroppers good old school days however this converter and used it as eyedropper few said it worked few said it leaked need to substantiate it not sure and hence wont try this out to spoil such nice piece if anyone has tried would love to hear first of all wanted to buy one juicer to have juice instantly so reviewed many juice blender and finally bought this philips hr made carrot apple orange promoganate etc all did and had fantastic juice fruit pulp and waste all collected in one tray and it is easy to wash thanks for this instant juice blender good deal find this juicer amazing end to end it takes me around mins to extract the juice clean pack it back that easy it is to use the product is very good and user friendly exactly as demonstrated in video used to have juicer many moons ago but it was cheap model and never really produced the juice wanted and couldn afford the mega posh ones which juiced fruit and veg to within and inch of its life so was excited to be able to start using this new one first off this is nice compact design it really doesn take up much room and it has small suckers on the base to keep it in place on the kitchen surface the juicer is simple to take apart and put together instructions are not really needed though there are some basic pictures provided on the box the juicer spout where you put your fruit and veg in is quite small need to cut up my apples into quarters to fit them in and although this is not huge flaw it is shame as you wouldn need it to be much bigger to get them in so far my juicing attempts have all been successful apples raspberries grapes cucumbers carrots have all yielded fair amount of great tasting juice also unwittingly popped chopped up mango in there without realizing it is one of the starchy fruits that is apparently doesn work with it seemed to work fine for me can see how banana or avocado might not work but the mango did produce juice so you may want to experiment the pulp left at the end is still fairly damp and found could easily squeeze liquid out but it in no way dripping and would say decent job had been done know that there is lot of goodness left in the pulp so if you want to use this then just make sure you clean your fruit before juicing and remove anything you wouldn want in the pulp that way once you have finished juicing you can just scoop out the pulpy goodness and do whatever you want with it juicers produce different quality juices there are really key areas to judge juicer on it juice quality some juicers produce higher amount of juice per food item you can tell by the drier pulp that is extracted some juicers produce frothier juice and warmer temperature juice signs of lower quality because the air and heat are evidence of the oxidization of nutrients faster spinning juicer centrifugal will often produce more heat and froth which is why the masticating style juicer slower chewing action creates better quality juice in terms of these key areas this philips does an alright job producing dry pulp and an excellent job with low froth and low temperature juice the slow masticating action is excellent and on par with other juicers to get more descriptive like to run the pulp of the philips through the juicer time to get extra juice out of it running it nd time and get hardly any juice one extra run of the pulp is sufficient the specs for this juicer claim you can clean it in under minute think this is little optimistic but that said its not too far off all the plastic parts rinse clean easily and quickly with warm water and the only part which takes little more effort is the metal sieve and grater this has teeny tiny holes in it to help separate juice and pulp and so it does get clogged up with stuff that said have found that using soapy scourer sponge and gently rubbing with the green side does the trick pretty swiftly it certainly does not take much elbow grease and found it very easy to clean off unlike my previous juicer where you needed to scrub for half an hour and you were still finding bits the next time you used it think this is pretty decent juicer for the everyday user yes it could produce little more liquid from the things it juices but it is certainly not bad and the stuff it produces is on the whole clear from bits the anti drip spout is not quite anti drip and you do need to watch out for juice on the fruit plunger when you put pieces in as have whipped it out too quickly and splashed drops of fresh juice all over the place for the current price would say it is well worth it high quality premium juicer with low noise and excellent ability to squeeze max to juice out of fruits and veggies the look and feel is outstanding and way above what other options are available have been using this for month now it is easy to use and clean and assemble but at times have seen that the pulp is also coming in the juice and sometimes it makes different sound while it is grinding feel the carrot and beetroot pieces should be cut bit smaller and not like slice cause if cut like slice flat one carrot slice got stuck within the blades and the machine made different sound and it was not giving more juice but could see the pulp try to cut the carrot pieces of atleast inch size like round one and not like slicebut overall good experience as make carrot and beatroot juice and it takes minutes to cut grind and clean very easy to use and very easy to assemble thanks perfect home juicer easy to clean assemble and comparable loves it

first would like to comment on the tab market of india the most peculiar thing have seen in india is when particular product is aimed towards students or education suddenly corporations go out of their way to milk money and under deliver as much as possible it is exactly opposite to how students are given access to technology in the usa you watch the prices of chromebooks tablets back to school offers in the us and compare them to india and it feels extremely unbalanced after the pandemic there was huge surge in the tab market and tier brands started delivering garbage for rupees snapdragon old mediatek gb ram abysmal non ips screen for just to mint money and take advantage of pandemic scenario and the circumstances of students this tablet brings the revolution am no student but bought this for day to day use and am an user of the normal big bezel th gen pad so my review will be comparative in nature also bought this at rupees so my judgements will be in accordance to the price paid if you are planning to buy an pad just buy it considering gb is enough for you and you use it for normie scenarios you do day to day stuff you will be satisfied with your ipad with its everlasting updates this tablet if compared spec vs spec give good challenge to the ipad for rupees even for it is fine build is fine although put tempered glass on the st day itself back is plastic but sides are metal and the back gets quite smudgy the ips screen is really good there is no backlight bleeding no dead pixels as you can see in the picture with the dark background am used to oled screens on phones so at first blacks may disappoint but oled is impossible at this price the screen is better than my th gen pad display it is brighter has more punchy colours blacks are darker on top of that hz panel hdr certification dolby vision support makes it great for content consumption it would be great device for xbox cloud gaming with the xbox controller attached to it display is the part of the device with which you interact the most and display is the highest point of this tablet snapdragon is fine in market where older mediateks and lower midrange snapdragons are dumped into the market hence say if you don want this just buy an pad but don buy any other android tablet at price point all are trash was fine with all those games which rule the market today it has less pixels to push than in phone and the bigger surface area helps in better heat dissipation so gaming is effortless can comment on how the battery will serve me in the long run but for now don see any drain or backup issues with content consumption or gaming it has watt charger in the box although it does support watt charging the bigger battery takes some time to charge with the inbox charger but my pad takes even longer with its trash charger and it has bigger battery and apple devices are extremely picky with chargers the camera is okayish just like most tablet cameras the pad has even worse cameras for document scanning it should be fine but other than that it is not much useful it is still better than what samsung and lenovo gives in range tablets the second highest point of this tablet is its quad speakers they are loud have depth are not sibilant and have brilliant stereo separation and soundstage they are louder and punchier than those normal non ultrabook thiccc laptops which cost they will hit you as massive surprise did not at all expect such good speakers they seriously outmatch those cheapo rs boat goat mivi generic speakers in terms of distortion at max volumes separation and low end of course those cheap speakers would be louder and more shrill but it is about quality vs quantity coming to the cons was it courage or something else that xiaomi couldn find place for mm jack not even dongle in the box they should seriously stop copying apple wrong habits and instead copy their good habits like long device support via updates although mitigated the issue by using portable dongle dacs like shanling ua ibasso dc etc which generally use with even my phones and my pc coz they are way better than on board audio of most devices except some devices like some lg phones with quad dac am an audio enthusiast so spend money on such products and you need not although it works with my old mi dongle just fine for rupees don expect the pen and people who are expecting pen with tablet should really open their eyes and look the disaster also know as indian tablet market and its offerings but for they could just offer bundle where you pay rupees more and get the pen as an add on the accessory market might not be that vibrant already there are no unofficial cases available from good brands there is one from nillkin here on amazon and the seller has the audacity to price it at rupees lol the official xiaomi folio case is magnetic slap on at the back and don trust those type of cases one more issue that would like to point out is that xiaomi lately has tendency to creep up prices by rupees within month or two by doing the good old gst bro so if it ever reaches for the gb version just close your eyes and buy an pad with card discounts so in nut shell for it is was no brainer but even for it is really good deal considering what its competitors are hope this was helpful have been using the mi pad for over month now and am only glad that didn spend more on an pad once the retail therapy phase of the device wears off what remains is the user experience while it is true for both devices find that more at ease with the mi pad for the sheer look and feel of the content watch in it also spend lot of time reading books and illustrated designs pdfs and often found myself amazed almost chuffed over how good the content looked that display gets the accolades for reason the mi pad largely meets my expectations and when people see this tablet the immediate comparison they make is how much it resembles the pad gross generalisation so here for those looking for genuine review brief comparison summary between the best three earphones headphones in the budget segment let help you to make up your mind the review is for sennheiser earphone but items for comparison are sennheiser hd ii over the ear headphone sennheiser cx in earphone sony mdr xb ap in ear extra bass earphones just for an introduction would like to mention am dire fan for flagship electronic goods manages to fulfill my passion for the taste of quality from time to time now lets begin when you start looking for earphones or headphones sennheiser is definitely brand worth to look for and rightly so the brand has acquired great reputation of producing some top notch quality gears in its segment too started my quest to purchase some of the best sounding earphones within reasonable limits of purchasing power excluding those insanely pricey ones read some very good reviews of the sennheiser hd ii professional over ear headphone from my fellow amazonians and bought it found it to be reasonably good but having certain drawbacks may refer my review of hd at amazon which were not upto my taste next unsettled went to purchase these sennheiiser cx in earphones and here are my observations design construction looks feels delicate to hold with its extremely thin wires and if you are casual in handling frequently then in the long run its sure to fail wires which are around in expanse are not tangle free and keep getting into random knots each time you get to use it comes with different sized earpieces to snug fit different ear anatomies and provides decent sound isolation but not the best inconvincing design of the earpiece globes as the bottom tail piece below the earpiece was not large enough to grip with fingers to comfortably fit or adjust the earpieces in the ears and each time you had to twist the spherical globes to snug fit comes with gold plated shaped additional adapter for better fitment to laptops etcf comes with small pouch which for the most part was useless accessory for me case or box would have been more more elegant option squeezing the whole earphone into the li ll pouch everytime naah feels primitive but then its my own two pieces sound quality performance the sound quality is crisp clear with clear mids and crisp pitches bass was okayish but leaves you craving for more every time you plug it in to watch some movie or natgeo documentaries the lack of an adequate bass may even get unsettling sometimes the frequency response as per specs was to hz against to hz of sony mdr xb ap just to quote sonys bass could get really deep low with its mm drivers and neodymium magnets for purists senneheiser does its job quite honestly but in general as for sony little make up wont hurt lol sound quality is maintained till the maximum volume though it felt slightly that the mids succumbed to pitches at the apex verdict lack of decent bass extremely fragile design is unacceptable at price range of bucks for me not worth it details comparison happened to test the quality performance of all the renowned sennheiser hd ii over the ear headphone sennheiser cx in earphone lastly sony mdr xb ap in ear extra bass earphones bass sony senn hd senn cx the extra bass at sony may feel out of place at rare instances but never feels cheap redundant or unpleasant to the ears its quality refined timbre bass not some low quality stuff hd bass was ok but then it had other issues with sound leaking from the pads and disturbing others sound quality excellent on all but sony bit appealing with its phenomenal immersive bass build design again sony senn hd senn cx sonys wire were tangle free earphone pieces felt indestructible noise isolation was ultimate next was senn hd and least by any standards was senn cx the fragile design of the wires around mic in senn cx may itself be let alone discarding feature for many senn hd ii might be good for gamers and watching from distance with its long cord if leaking sound to outside world is not an issue bass is anytime better than senn cx but not as mesmerising as sony sound quality though is very good crisp and clear senn cx might be good for purists but even with its balanced highs and mids serious lack of bass keeps you longing for more especially if you are more into movies games and documentaries than music moreover its extremely fragile always tangling thin wires is constant annoying feature sony mdr xb ap gets the most evident and refined high quality deep bass with crisp high and quality mids its indestructible unique design offers the best noise isolation of all and comes with the most sturdy tangle free wires do not consider higher bass as an adulteration to pure music its quality bass with frequency response as low as to hz adds mesmerizing essence to the quality of sound which is absent on other two probably like super amoled with extra vivid colors that look more punchy full of life anyways at the end of the day its your call keep listening note there are thousands of reviews for this product but surprisingly there hardly any review explaining its performance in long run and comparing this earphones with similar ones available in market am using these earphones since last one year and in the meantime also happen to use jbl si and sennhesiers cx so would be comparing all these earphones in this review you get shaped connector in these earphones so note that am dividing this review in several subtopics directly stating my user experience and stating which is the best earphone in that subtopic built quality bo at flat cables which is tangle free in true sense metal housing holds up good but colour sheds off after months perfect shaped connector which is apt for using with laptops while resting jbl small round cables shredding off after months of moderate usage plastic housing doing great so far connector is bent but not in perfect shape so its quite pain to use while resting sennheiser small round cables holding up good after year of rough use plastic housing has become slick as rubber coating on it has shredded off perfect shaped connector which is apt for using with laptops while resting winner bo at comfort bo at comfortable enough when used while in upright position these are very uncomfortable when you use them while resting on couch or bed for watching movies or so has very long earphone head jbl comfortable enough in upright position slightly uncomfortable using while resting as these have offset opening sennheisers comfortable in both the position these are apt for long duration usage winner sennheisers cx loudness cx bo at jbl cs si bo at tends to distort above level of volume jbl crystal clear even at full volume but has least sound level in all of three sennheisers tends to distort above level of volume but has greater sound level of all winner sennheisers cx sound quality bass mids lows noticed that all of them have almost same mids lows which are strong crisp but bass levels are different bo at has average bass am very disappointed with it since these earphones are marketed as bassheads jbl has least bass of all felt treble is high in these sennheisers ton of bass and when used proper eartips its just treat for bass lovers winner sennheisers cx sound quality over call bo at noticed in early few months quality over call was great but started to deplete after months but its still good not as good as new noise cancellation is good and noticeable by person on other side jbl its quite average and has maintained the quality over year now sennheisers their no microphone lol pnote bo at jbl both mics works with android and os perfectly winner bo at customer care bo at year warranty had no issues till date so didn got chance to check it but some of my friends who ran into issue had mixed experiences jbl year warranty had issue with one ear piece and was replaced within weeks after contacting nearest service center sennheisers years warranty had of these and one pair stopped working after year and half was replaced immediately within week after contacting nearest service center note first contacted the company via mail with my product details and was given all the required details for service would suggest this to all winner sennheiser cx connectivity all the earphones have mm connector and works perfectly with both android and os devices verdict don think need to explain anything else now since mentioned all the points of all these earphones to sum up would say bo at are good if you are going to use the mic alot and not going to use these earphones while resting on couch for watching movies if you want mic and even want to watch movies resting then go for jbl cs si but if you want the earphones only for watching the movies and listening to songs like me then certainly go for sennheisers cx hope this review helps you make sound decision

giving this review after using it for months am using more cameras from other brands which are china made bought them or years ago and there are various issues with them wanted to buy this qubo camera and give it try as this is made in india and from the famous hero group the product did live up to my expectation here are my observations pros excellent in performance accurate in motion detection can connect anytime from anywhere if the camera is connected to the internet led turns red when there is no internet connectivity crystal clear vision even in night cons had to struggle bit in configuring it the usability of the app is not easy to understand figured out the right options to use after few trials hence giving star rating the led doesn glow green when it is recording though the option is turned on keep it up hero group and looking forward to more such great products from your organization the qubo camera is great am able to set it up for my kittens whom can be assured once leave my house for some time the best feature is the two way talk in which we can communicate via the camera itself product is very easy to install as well as setup and use it is excellent motion detection and also has person detection which is not available in this price range camera quality and clarity are good also having excellent features this camera was delivered on time and the tech support is also good the only missing feature is that this camera lacks storage to external nvr bought this model for my living room its very decent and easy to install working very well it is goo product using it and hai be over month and have no issues with this product target has to fixed as it observed motion and went over there on wall it get stuck over there as no motion now next great product works well just faced couple of issues while setting up but after that it is working great

good looking amd working fine brought this primarily because my lenovo laptop windows has only one usb port no ethernet slot and one connector port while in office immediately after purchase of this tp link ue port usb hub and gigabit ethernet adapter used this for the ethernet connectivity to my office network simultaneously was using the usb ports in the hub for connectivity of my wireless mouse and one port for external hard disk this continuously gave me problems with connectivity of the mouse or the hdd got errors like usb device not detected etc till point where it refused to detect my mouse at home used the hub for connecting only to my external hdds two numbers and it is working fine for moment was trying to return the product but since got this delivered in mumbai at my office and then had returned home to karnataka it refused to process return in different city right now it is working fine since do not need ethernet at home speed is more than wireless am not used since it restricted in my system have used it with hp and dell laptop its compatible with all its plug and play and easy to use good product it works perfectly trusted and reliable brand with convenient design having slot for folding the cable it works and works well every time however they made strange design decisions that take some points off the satisfaction of using of the product there is bright white light on the product which keeps flashing when the connection is active it is huge annoyance when im working at night the cable is flat which is like double edged sword on one hand it comes in handy when folding it on itself and redacting into the body but when its not hidden and used with laptop with the adapter being visible the flat cable folded sideways looks ugly the product wouldve been perfect if tp link didnt make these strange design decisions hope this helps thanks

good packaging wire quality is good very good quality but the wire is meters only at least should be meters for the price am using this with an as my satellite speakers wires were getting very flimsy out of the box these cables are very thick compared to the ones my speakers had before after replacing the cables with these ones noticed two things right away my speakers are louder the sound quality is much better one thing you wanna be careful is that these cables stick out like sore thumb in front of white walls so if you are like me who cares about the looks you might wanna cover these with cable raceways or even paint them like am planning to do wire is very best quality but cost not worth for it durability quality is absolutely good the product is gauge pure copper multi thread wires sound quality is impressive bears black band for ve ve distinction ve seen many reviews where people complain that this cable is not copper its aluminium and even some saying its fake so thought ll clear some doubts about this product its true this is not pure copper cable its copper clad aluminium infact most of the speaker cables are copper clad aluminium majority of the audio signal travel through the outer edge of the conductor skin effect hence the copper cladding thicker the cladding better the audio quality this cable only got thin cladding of copper the steel aluminium reinforced center is for more durable conductor now no where in the description amazon has mentioned that this is pure copper cladding cable so just need to get your expectations right you simply cannot expect oxygen free pure copper cable at this price rs you will not find decent gauge copper speaker cable for less than rs this is cheap gauge speaker and it does the job very well this cable is more than enough to deliver good sound to your speakers cable quality is average but you get what you pay for now if got some high end speakers then won recommend this cable good

got of this gb hp pendrives this morning review is based on testing done the same day summary the product is genuine and sturdy but the performance is just about average based on random file copy performance to fill the entire space pros cons comparing with san disk cruiser blade gb pros solid body looks and feels great read speed is fine mb product is genuine covered under year manufacturer warranty cons fits too tight in usb port thus causing more wear to the port and may even damage it if not used carefully capacity is gb precisely bytes not as advertised in windows it ll show up as gb drive compared to in sandisk no big deal just technical observation write speed mb is not bad but slightly inferior to its close competitor sandisk cruiser blade which easily gives to mb for the same test warranty is only years compared to years on sandisk but since almost nobody claims warranty after years and besides the plastic body of sandisk gets physically damaged in years anyway so it okay for me bottomline it good enough for casual users maybe chosen over sandisk for its look feel and sturdiness frequent users may want to look for better options with easier port fitting and better write speed details the product name is hp as shown on its packing the images in listing are correct while its part number is fd so slightly confusing but both are the same thing testing whether it is genuine or fake the bottom of the hologram sticker on the packing has silver layer with scratch and check written on it scratching it reveals digit code beneath it and the right edge of the sticker has the url to verify this code go to support product authentication page on that url that page contains instructions and explanation of the results that you may get mine were originals with the codes tested for the first time repeat test result will be warning that the code was tested before so that means it is covered under year manufacturer warranty as declared by hp for aisa pacific region design and build quality sturdy stylish but with design flaw it is exactly as shown in the picture the body is solid steel case with open front and the back sealed with black plastic cap the plastic back fits perfectly and gives it stylish look though it may come off later the hp logo product code etc are embossed on the steel body so likely won be erased with time overall it looks and feels great the flaw noticed was that it takes significantly more strength to push it into the usb port compared to other usb devices like generic usb cables or usual plastic pendrives like sandisk you almost have to fight with it to push it in or pull it out this means its frequent use can wear out the usb port too soon or may even break it if not used carefully capacity gb not will appear as gb in windows it is advertised as gb drive but the actual capacity is gb and yes fully aware of the decimal vs binary calculation difference hardcore linux user to be precise its exact capacity is bytes on both pendrives tested so in windows it will show up as gb drive in linux it will show up as either gb or gi binary calculation like windows for comparison my gb sandisk shows up as bytes or gb or gi this loss of gb in gb pendrive is no big deal for me just technical observation performance read speed about mb write speed about mb tested with collection of iso files ranging from about mb to gb along with few smaller files like pdf or txt total size of the collection was about gb gi did this testing on linux so to be fair the write performance may be slightly better on windows as it works better with fat that the pendrive comes formatted as edit no performance difference on windows either formatted as ex fat on windows to make it multiboot with yumi read write speeds were same while copying iso files to it or reading them to load in memdisk while booting could do more accurate testing with tools like dd command but didn bother as the difference usually isn very significant ups the product is very good mistakenly washed it washing machine with my pants but it is still running like new no data loss problem or data corrupt problems have faced yet downs the only downside is this pendrive is little slow because of technology is newer one and second one is not affact your data at all the silver paint on pendrive is vanishing time by time and it is now turning black product is good but slow storage is good but doesnt work for car stereo gb out of so far so good good product ok

got this for at this price point believe the tv provides decent quality you shouldn expect amazing quality anyway from screen resolution the audio is also okay beyond the audio starts cracking from viewing distance of ft the quality looks good please note you will struggle quite bit to directly add firestick to the hdmi port they have given some other ports right next to the hdmi ports because of which the firestick doesn have proper space to fit properly unless you really shove it in there my suggestion is to get an hdmi extender for it overall say for small room it value for money satisfied with the product till now this led tv low budget good performance but picture audio not good is great but the installation guy asked me for paid installation misleading information but again for this price it good tv don pay installation guy you can do it yourself will give it stars out of bought this inch vw at after discounts picture quality and sound quality is good added firestick to it and it voila became smart tv the connections to attach these usbs are at the bottom part of the tv which is slightly different from other tvs so far working as it should revising this after days the tv is not responding to switch off button this is happening more when watch the tv for few hours and then when switch off the tv with the firestick remote the yellow colour indicator down below does not turn red instead it remains yellow as far as screen is concerned the tv screen changes to black whitish seems to me that the tv goes into hibernation or sleep mode this is fault of the tv as normal tv should swith off completely and the indicator should turn red have called technician tomorrow and if he checks and if he agrees then should get replacement as got still days time to replace it just helping note for people buying this tv if you are going to connect firestick to it as it asks for the brand name of the tv you can select vu and it will perfectly work on your firestick thanks and enjoy

have been using this mouse for like months and this is the best mouse under the mouse has the basic gaming stuff like extra buttons dpi settings but the main thing is the software like you can customize so much on this mouse the rgb is fully customizable you can set many macros you can revamp the keys and also change the dpi values these features usually come in expensive gamming mouses but this is very good for this cheap the design is also very good and one thing you should note before buying is that this mouse is big like it is big as my hand so if you got small hands you should think gaming the high dpi sensor on this mouse is very good their is no drifting the rgb is very goodi have used this mouse for about months and its still intact no problem with scroll wheel or side button the software provided by redgear is also very great and has lots of features mostly used this mouse for fps games like csgo valorant overwatch but the side buttons also help in building in hz which is very low if you want precise aiming in competitive but the redeeming feature might be the looks the rgb looks cool but you cant use just one single color it feels great in hand but my considering its looks and other subtle features fine mouse for what it worth

have used it mainly for boiling water knob turned maximum to right so cannot comment much about lower temperature settings it takes about min for water to boil suggest mfr to release in other colour like light blue etc as see some other kettles it may add to the looks and give warm feeling in the room the stainless steel looks shiny but the material is not very thick but it ok for the price there may be formation of scaling or white brownish spots on the base of kettle in shape due to the shaped half coil at base funny design maybe product created by modifying higher wattage full circular coil kettle the scales are more when tap water is used due to higher presence of salts maybe they seem to get cleaned by usual scrubbing given wide based cylinder shape it is very easy to clean to be aware the kettle does not auto shut off when water boils similarly the kettle temperature will be kept warm at knob setting unless the knob is at the leftmost when it shuts off else the water will keep drying out until it dries out completely and then the kettle is supposed to auto shut off to prevent dry heating haven tested this though these are mentioned in the manual so this can be thought of as warmer boiler so you cannot leave the kettle unattended thinking that it will auto shut off like other kettles when the water has started to boil assume this is designed this way to allow bit of cooking for those who want to use it in that manner accessories cannot fathom what the use is of the plastic bowl provided given that plastics can leach chemicals when heated would not suggest to use it inside the kettle in any way steaming steel rack is given too that could be used alongwith some steel plate with holes for steam cooking but there is none provided with the product itself final verdict if you are ok with somewhat slower heating kettle but with more versatility and easy to clean at reasonable price this will do the job if similar product was available with higher wattage at higher price would have bought that instead wanted to give star rating because agaro forces its customers to give rating and review to get the warranty it is bad practice you cannot force customer to give rating as mentioned it may result in the product having negative rating on amazon despite being good product in my opinion the product itself is good it heats water very fast it is good for making maggie pasta and boiling eggs but need to be careful while making maggie or pasta because once they get dry they start to stick to the bottom the kettle is very easy to clean the cord length should have been longer one issue that noticed that only one half of the base of kettle generates heat everything is good it has been very useful for me there is only one drawback guess the heating is not uniform across the base of the kettle since whenever boil milk or make tea coffee portion of one side bunrs the milk even while boiling water can see the similar symptom agaro multicooker is good and gives variety of cooking boiling options like milk tea eggs maggi etc only negative point is that agaro team promises extended warranty of months by giving asking to give positive review on amazon here is try at review of this product after using it for an year now use case am ncr resident and the air pollution is as we know one of the worst possible if not the worst have it installed in the bedroom about sq ft so well within the advertised max room space while using the purifier the room is kept closed to minimize pollution addition build quality the purifier is sturdy in its built and aesthetically pleasing it has large front grill that acts as the air inlet and an arched back that has larger grill for filtered air outlet the arc helps the air to be released vertically upwards and hence does not add to direct cooling for anyone sitting in front this helps the filters use in winter which is the main season where it is required the top of the filter has dark panel with touch sensitive buttons and decent sized circular led screen the buttons are power night mode fan speed and child lock setup the air purifier is shipped with its parts packed separately thus on unboxing the same has to be setup for use the setup is pretty straightforward the main filter units front can be released and the individual filters aligned in order on the central space the installation order of the filter is as follows first hepa filter the same has indication on top to correct installation you can also go with keeping the phillips branding on the top left corner second active carbon filter the same has indication on top to correct installation you can also go with keeping the phillips branding on the top left corner third pre filter this one actually clips in place and is used to filter out the larger dust impurities so that it does not clog the other main filters thus the filtering order is pre filter carbon filter hepa filter working the air purifier can be set to different modes one of them being the automatic mode that automates the purifier working thanks to the inbuilt air quality sensor the pollution level sensed regulates the fan speed accordingly levels are programmed and are indicated on the small circular led screen by means of circular rings of different colors blue min violet pink red max red level would put the fan in maximum speed and blue would turn off the filter automatically if you are not fan of the automatic mode you can use the fan speed button to move through the option of different fan speed modes they are fan speed indicated by on the screen fan speed indicated by on the screen fan speed indicated by on the screen automatic mode indicated by on the screen allergen mode this can be only added on top of automatic mode it essentially bumps up the speed bit on all the different color levels this is to suit the sensitive people as this improves the air filtration rate turbo mode indicated by on the screen this puts the fan in the maximum speed possible thats pretty much the major functioning of the air purifier additionally the filter has an automatic forced night mode the purifier automatically detects the lighting in the room and once it senses low to no light it automatically goes into night mode the same can be forced by pressing the night mode button the purifier what this does is that if the filter is in automatic mode the fan speed is reduced on all the levels so as to minimize the noise summary so as to summarize my review and add my view here the filter works pretty well for the use case have on regular winter pollution days its able to keep the air quality in control even when working in automatic mode its able to go down from red levels to blue switching on an off intermittently as per the air quality levels on drastic pollution days it has tough time managing the air quality in automatic mode and have to force it in turbo mode to get the air quality in control if not too much of an air change is happening in the room throughout the filter is able to get the air quality to much acceptable levels the air quality indicator is great value add on to the product much that is missing in similar priced competitors am little disappointed in the night mode working as it compensates air quality over noise believe the purifiers task is to ensure that the air quality in room is as good as possible by reducing the fan speed to reduce noise works ok on normal pollution days but is totally useless in any thing even little worse when dont want to use turbo mode just yet durability of the filters has been decent have used it all through the winters last year and intermittently the summer this year but am yet to get an indication to change the hepa or the carbon filter on yes that reminds me the air purifier would automatically sense and indicate when filter needs to be replaced by displaying an error code on the screen it even does that for the pre filter which does not have to be replaced but just cleaned washed that have received times this past year overall still strongly recommend this product good performance with decent price which has been slashed good amount from when it launched good product the product does not stand out notably but it probably does the work it is supposed to it is too late now to return this product and try another make over all good product easy to install well designed product yet to experience filter replacement and consequently the recurring cost the product is working nicely and worth buying product writing after almost years all pros cons everything is good only problem is live in delhi and hepa filter will cost you around and it took only months it become totally black few advice dont run it near kitchen it will catch all carbon pores will blocked if you live in delhi check it after every month clean with vaccume cleaners seal your doors most dirt mosquito come from there open windows only that too seal them and put anti dust and mosquito net on them run it all day as when turn it iff after hour your room will be as dirty as ut was you can clean pre filter only don clean carbon and hepa filter being and indian if your hepa filter become black get some jot water put some detergent and dip it inside all dust and carbon will come out and use it again haha its paper but its so hard you can wash it times keep it under sun light for hours sometimes get error of fo clean all three filter with vaccume or brush careful while cleaning with brush that dust is dangerous can cause problems so wear mask after cleaning hold ur finger on child lock to reset and it will start working bhai delhi pollution bhot so family lie monthly rs padta filter mother wife bachy pura din gher rhty so its must buy to protect them update fan speed got slow down power consumption on st watt nd watt rd watt max watt best is keep it on automatic mode when room will be clean power consumption will reduced to watt and whole night it work in power efficient mode do not left your room door or window open it will continue to be red room should be closed room is still dusty not much functional

hi guys bought this yesterday so havent used it much so an early review but the most detailed review so please read till the end very important points are mentioned looks are cute it looks really nice and elegant am using it with mac book air so far it seems there are no problems using it the scrolling is smooth connection does not drop and there is no lag connection is instant there is no pairing required it plug and play along with the dongle provided with it it sits low on the table feels weighty but not in wrong way the battery adds to it weight but have used heavier mice before and this one feels just right it has good grip nothing to complain about that buttons are nice and clicks are satisfactory not too noisy they are just right scroll wheel doesn feel cheap at all though believe it could ve been better quality body is matt finish and doesn leave fingerprints on it though if you re someone who eats and handles the mouse then it ll show the oil prints and that true with any peripherals the mouse doesn feel cheap overall but it is definitely plasticky though not in the bad sense it is definitely not cheap looks wise there is an on off switch on the bottom which is helpful in saving the battery which is included when the mouse is not in use there is no light on the bottom which is good if you have kids in the house who keep flipping the mouse and staring at the super bright light so that good thing and definite plus the overall shape and size works in the favour of the mouse and variety of users with small and large palms will be satisfied with it now over to major flaw the mouse connects only though it own usb dongle which by the way comes tucked inside the body of the mouse itself inside the battery door which found mighty impressive and not through the laptop bluetooth now this means two things you have to carry around the usb dongle with you everywhere you go which means if you happen to forget it at home while traveling and carry just the mouse then the mouse is pretty much useless in that scenario and worse still if you happen to carry it out of station with you and bring back only the mouse and forget to pack the dongle then you re stuck and don think you get only the dongle you ll have to check that with the seller and then the mouse is left useless in that case now over to the problem am facing which did not see anyone else mention in their reviews use mac book so it doesn have usb inputs which means you must buy connector for it to connect the dongle actually had already bought connector so that was not problem for me but you will have to factor in the cost of the connector which is not cheap because you want to buy only good quality connector for your expensive mac book of course that is problem with the mac book and not with the mouse but consider this point it is very important it will not connect over mac book bluetooth otherwise it works well with the mac book the only caveat found is the tracking speed on level is too slow and on level is too fast you ll have to get used to that thing it doesn feel very natural as the trackpad on the mac book feels because of that speed problem but otherwise the pointer flows smoothly on screen and doesn jump around at least with my mouse also the battery door does make noise when landing the mouse on the pad and feel it could have been made better but guess at the cost you really can complain too much overall think good buy but the compulsion of having to use it with it own dongle is major drawback feel if that doesn bother you then nothing else should keep you from buying this product especially since it is one of the cheapest wireless mice out there at less than bucks which is what it cost me the quality of power button is very low easily it can break nice product works as expected as of now no issues good very smooth works on almost every surface paper table cloth etc there bit rattle sound of the plastic which is just above the buttons right left clicks it will not bother most of you am bit obsessive with these kind of things so personally opened the mouse and stuck paper inside the plastic which presses the click button resulting in no rattle sound now mouse only makes sound when you click the buttons click click click battery life of logitech is known to be very good quality good dpi good good accuracy on off switch available smooth good deal at reasonable price good product on which you can use for long time this is good mouse thanks to amazon for providing this product at reasonable price very sharp and correct working mouse

immersion heaters have changed very little in terms of features or design over the years or so ve been using them and regardless of which brand name is stamped on them they look like clones of each other it was therefore with some excitement that bought this havells model that had at least three novel features an auto cut off facility temperature control knob and protective plastic cover for that part of the heater users could come into accidental contact with but quite bit of my excitement drained away when the heater arrived couldn use it straightaway because it has cord that barely metre long and it just couldn reach the socket it needs to be plugged into such heavy duty sockets are normally positioned high in most bathrooms so that they are easily accessible to any storage water heaters that may be installed havells should have made allowances for this and added at least another foot and half to the cord length for large scale manufacturer this extra length would have made little difference to the production cost the product anyway is priced couple of hundred rupees more than other heaters the mrp being even higher at rs in my case therefore the heater had to be accessorized before it could be used had to buy stool that would raise the the bucket off the floor and thus compensate for the shortness of the cord and no it can be any stool lying around in your home it has to be stool of certain height about inches for me any taller and the bucket can be accommodated under the tap any shorter and you begin cursing havells again for their miserliness with the cord the stool took two days to arrive and inaugurated the heater full four days after it was delivered thank god my old immersion heater was still usable in spite of its heavily calcified condition there is yet another problem with this heater though it helpfully allows you to choose between three temperature settings you don know what value each setting corresponds to what does high temperature mean degrees celsius seventy found out the hard way when set the temperature high and the heater wouldn switch itself off for minutes which is five minutes longer than the time my old heater takes to heat up some litres of water and by then the water had turned scaldingly hot tried the medium setting the next day and again had the nasty experience of having to deal with extra hot water perhaps the right setting is low then not sure neither the product literature that came with the heater nor the havells website has any information that will help you choose the right setting and stop you burning yourself so both the innovative features of this heater that made me buy it the variable heat setting and the auto cut off ultimately turned out to be quite useless still have to depend on my instinct and on my experience with my old featureless heater and manually turn the heater off when think it done its job have question for other users of this product or for the manufacturer can the temperature be set to in between values something between low and medium for instance the way the controlling knob is marked with several lines between the presets suggests this is possible or maybe that yet another useless feature of this fancy heater more trial and error but should such basic piece of equipment be so difficult to use update after week use of this heater like to add word of caution for the benefit of other buyers and users since the heater has its own indicator light which switches off at the set temperature you may forget to switch the socket switch off particularly if the switch is away from the socket as in some contemporary bathrooms that have all switches bunched together at the bathroom door if you forget to switch the socket off and in the meantime have removed the heater from the bucket it will begin to heat up again once the temperature has fallen below the set value this dry heating will damage both the heater and wall if you ve hung the heater up but more significantly it will also be extremely hazardous if your body is wet and there no one around to switch the socket off for you this happened to me twice call me dumb if you want to but please be careful the product is good and does its work didn find any use of the thermostat feature as though it turns off automatically the low temper in itself is very hot it take just to mins to get the water be bath ready further the product says that ilthe rod should not touch the bucket but the product handle is made in such way that it touches but that causes no trouble it not shock proof so don check temperature of water with it turned on product received with some scratches don know how inside package product gets scratches other than that all is okay product is good and it shock proof for extra safety but no recommended to touch water value for money product is good satisfactory one minor issue the cord is little too hard its working as expected no issues found till now but have observed the red light is not coming fully could see only partial red light is visible overall best product nice this product is very good and easy to use but its plug is of amps which should have been of amps
