it been days since using the device extensively bought it on the last freedom sale for rs including instant discount coupon first let me be clear bought fe with snapdragon not fe with exynos and am user who uses phone most of the time this review may be long but it worth to read it if you re buying this product let me divide between the pros and cons first would like like to start with pros of the device pros display samsung has been already popular for it amoled displays but saw some of the reviewers wrote about some display issues here they might have got some defective piece have no issues with my display it been long time saw great display like this with hz it is super smooth also it is very bright on outdoors and can decrease it to very low while using at low light conditions ps no tint issues the in display finger print scanner is very fast and didn faced any issues with it stereo speakers as an extensive multimedia user this is one of the most favorable feature for me believe me you can find any other device with such great sound quality in this price segment it almost like flagship devices both the speakers are adequately loud battery as person who shifting from normal hz device phone was very worried about the battery life of this device at hz but it surprised me very well initially thought would need to switch to hz for better battery life for daily usage but didn even thought this device would give this much great battery life at hz at hz am getting around hours of minimum sot screen on time the maximum sot got at hz is hours minutes didn checked battery life at hz because didn use it at hz even single day the battery life is excellent rear cameras am not very good photographer or something am just an ordinary person who use camera occasionally was very excited to use the telephoto lens which only can be found on flagship devices and it performs very well added some camera samples above pic ultrawide pic telephoto pic may not be clear as it was when taken due to compression of the image while uploading both the three cameras primary ultrawide telephoto performs very well if you re camera guy you should definitely check this out performance ram management not gamer use my device for daily usage of social media ott platforms calls messages etc but use it extremely didn faced any kind of heating issues with the device until now also ram management of the device is excellent am person who uses appsbackground at single time and didn have any issues of closing down the apps one ui was stock android guy but one ui actually surprised me it is very well optimised and very user friendly for single hand usage initial days found it little hard to use the stock menu of one ui but now got used to it ps didn found any kind of ads on my device as didn sign up or used any samsung apps build quality even though its back is made up of plastic the overall build quality is super premium the aluminium frame gives us feel like using flagship device future proof the device has bands ip rating wireless charging which are very hard to find on any device in this price bracket ip wireless charging are mostly only found on flagship devices its good to see samsung brings it at lower price this is the best future proof device as of now so these are the major pros noticed as of now now let move to the cons cons no hdr support on netflix as an extensive multimedia user found it very frustrating even mid range devices offering hdr support on netflix samsungs flagship killer doesn have hdr support it will not be fixed via ota update no gb variant this is actually not problem for most of the people but as power user who uses dual sim found it little difficult but if you re single sim user luckily it have hybrid solution so you can use sim card expandable memory card gorilla glass other competitors are providing atleast gg in this price range but fe has just gg which also not sure as it is not mentioned officially anywhere but at the end of the day glass is glass it will broke no headphone jack it is not any kind of unusual thing most of the phones above segment doesn have headphone jack so we have to buy mm to type adapter type earphones or bluetooth solutions note only buy original samsung type adapter else it may not support no charger it is not actually con for me as prefer low watt charger which is good for battery health and beneficial for long term usage but it may be con for you although the device supports charging only charger is provided inside the box they should have given inside the box didn have any issues with charger but it would be great if they bundle it with as competitors are way ahead in terms of charging speed for the reference of charging speed both will full charge the device almost at the same time but using you can get about within minutes where as with charger full charge time usually takes is hour and minutes front camera am not selfie guy but if you re person who looking for selfie device just don buy it it not like the front camera quality is really bad or anything but it not even near to the rear camera quality and you can find better selfie smartphones in this price range conclusion if you re person who wants device for normal day to day usage with good battery life great rear cameras great performance better software support better build quality and use it for more than years the cons mentioned above doesn bother you just buy it am sure you won be disappointed it been about days since got this phone got it for on prime day sale for the price it good pros camera coming from poco the camera quality on this is amazing according to the price it gives you good colours contrast focus and everything that you want it has ois which is very apparent while recording at the stability is worse but set it to and the videos will be amazingly stable and the main advantage of ois other than stable video is great night mode shots hold the phone stable for while and along with ois you will get great photos with accurate colors and nice exposure attached samples display absolutely best samsung displays are the best hz fhd flows smoothly colors and calibration is top notch brightness is good but felt it little insufficient under direct sunlight it visible but could be better one ui the main reason for upgrading to this phone was software one ui is the absolute best android skin right now it has way too many customisations in it and let you personalise your phone to very high degree like there feature to read out the name of the person who calling if your wearing headphones it took me days to fully go through all the settings and change them to my needs also knoxx security is special mention knoxx security is software and hardware feature in samsung phones which protects your phone from all kinds of attacks and keeps your data safe even if it gets stolen you can remotely delete all your data secure folder allows you to store data in separate storage and many more such good features while being very feature rich and storage heavy skin it still feels very very smooth and fast to use unlike miui or other skins it doesn stutter much and bugs are less there are many other small pros like good stereo speakers nice premium build quality good data and wifi speeds other such features that you won notice but definitely make difference in your experience cons software know said it pro but say this in the aspect of updates this phone was launched in march in india and samsung promises year android version updates and additional year of security updates but there lot of confusion regarding if or not this phone will receive android it will receive for sure there lot of debate on what they will do with because of global version launch date being earlier and yada yada basically the phones life maybe to years if they give but to if not researched on the internet few people say that it will receive while was few say it not it hard to say who correct so assume it not getting if you are going for it battery the battery on this phone is mah and it good enough for days use but that because use it lightly not much online streaming no gaming light social media and other usual stuff if you use it even tad bit more heavily you will run out within day if you re going outside for the better part of day like day trip to somewhere nearby it better keep power bank handy in terms of screen on time numbers once got hours of sot on light usage hr you tube and hr streaming was at home and used wifi all the time got hrs sot when went outside for day trip took many photos and videos and the phone shutdown before could reach home on mixed use day you can get to hours of sot final verdict the life of the phone in terms of software support is not great but you will get on time updates and almost no bugs in the software so if you want to buy it you can and exchange it after maybe years for other models but if you planning on using it for longer than years better avoid it in the upcoming diwali and dussera sales the price might further drop to even am just speculating but keep in mind your requirements and go accordingly as always amazing delivery by amazon

it has been only month since have bought this item so can comment on its durability but currently it is working perfectly sound quality is good fitting in ear is perfect which has been constantly an issue with other earphones have used till now have doubt on its durability because its wires are kind of handle with care if it is durable then it will be among one of the best earphones have used till now unable to hear after months good budget earphones for taking call and listening to music watching videos once in while be careful with the wire though as it can get tangled easily and is not that strong best buying in these range the hi is budget friendly in ear earphone and it really comes at great price but the next version of these si has more value for money factors like hi has angled mm jack whereas si has the normal one and am not supposed to say this but trust me si has the best best best and superior sound quality if compared to hi though it doesn have great durability but if your previous earphones were si and you are switching on these then one can definitely notice the difference between the si and hi although you can adapt the sound of hi in nearly about week if you are switching from si to be honest the si is literally best in all circumstances such like gaming listening to music and professional editing the vocals mids highs lows are perfectly balanced in si but not hi in hi mostly when listening to sing the bass was not up to mark and the vocals were so loud that the bass was literally fading main point is that whenever we hit the full volume both of them never distorted any single beat hat off to harman good earphones short time usage its good with very clear voice and average bass clarity am not giving stars because certain bass can be improved bit more overall its good one was looking for budget earphones with voice clarity jblc hi does the work except for bass quality there nothing else to complain about

its really good product for gamers would recommend it good mouse overall price is little high have been using this mouse since and have to say logitech built quality is second to none have throwed and bashed this mouse on my table during my gaming sessions yet this mouse still survives even the rubberised grips are still there go for it without any hesitation for those having button issues have so far replaced my left click and middle click button started developing these issues after years it simple soldering job to fix it you can get replacement switches from tanotis now they work as good as new so ve been using this mouse for quite long time and believe this is the best mouse so far ve ever used but the problem is with the cable as another customer said the cable quality is not good the outer portion of cable from usb and from mouse side coming out and the inside wires can be visible even though mouse runs good but this is not good for long term usage other than this is pretty good mouse we have at close to it is ridiculously heavy for fast paced gaming for chill rpg titles it ll do fine but if you wanna play something like apex legends on this forget it the shape of the mouse is super comfortable only mouse ve owned that didn give me any wrist pain even after hours continuous usage cable quality is what you expect like it not even braided since it an older generation mouse it doesn have the double clicking issue logitech is infamous for after all that would say in just don buy it it too old to justify spending any money on you know and love logitech this is one of their best products say this is hands down my favorite budget gaming mouse it nice and comfy works properly and also has multiple buttons to assign them to various actions which is not just limited to games you can assign them to windows actions as well have been using this for the last years and have absolutely no complaints although my brother thinks that it looks like beetle

chinese like the cheap chinese headphones her voice volume level is not very high either bt pairing turn off the headset press and hold to center button but keep holding the same button the headsets voice will say bluetooth pairing once connected it will say bluetooth connected if bt disconnects the voice says bluetooth disconnected next track press and hold the button for seconds and the headset will make cute chime and load the next song in the playlist of any app like this feature of the chime because this way know the headset has accepted the command and loading the next track however holding the button for second everytime you want to change songs can get annoying and painful if you want to skip couple of songs of just skipping endlessly waiting for the right song to play buttons aren very soft but do have tactile click to ensure you feel the click when pressed power off just like power on hold the center button for seconds and the headset will turn off volume up down no audible feedback just volume increase or decrease status led blue when on and slow blinking when connected to bt when in pairing mode the same light blinks quickly in the same blue colour orange while charging solid on green off and above physical clues tiny nub on the left ear plug to denote left side only reputed brands have it same tiny bump is made in the volume up button on the controller to denote volume coloured dots on the plastic controller to denotr left and right channel ear plugs are colour coded and fit very well in my ears most of the ear plugs fall out of my ears while talking these don use the smallest one what does sony offer very neat guide on how to insert the ear plugs in your ears the most comfortable way and ensure the best seal for clear audio ve never known that you can pull you ear up from the top corner and gently place the ear plug into your ear canal once placed comfortably drop the ear and let the ear canal seal in audio app it basically music player designed to detect the sony earphones if you use spotify you can use this app to setup an equaliser it plays mp from your storage too my phone already has built in equalizer don use any eq because the sound stage on these is flat so all types of audio sounds great faqis it flimsy no but feels like you might damage it if you re not careful does it really last hr yes ve tested it sort of and never managed to run out of battery how much did you spend on it audio lag none tested it with android tv lg web os android phone ps and pad no issues of lag or disconnection or audio drop on super quiet moments of the song bass very decent and controlled vocals very clear treble sharp and crisp loudness you can listen at full volume without much discomfort but suggest not to compared it with jbl wave my isp provided modem router combo is in another location in the house and was getting speed drops on ghz when was across the house as was expected so decided to buy this router to use as an access point the setup is pretty straightforward provided you know what you are doing as is mentioned on the product page this router comes with two modes router mode and access point mode if you are using it in addition to your isp provided modem router would suggest using it in the access point mode only the range and the speeds are working better than expected for the price certainly better than the router that the isp provides the router does come with lan cable but the quality of the cable is not very confidence inspiring the leds on the front can be configured via the tether app to switch off at specific times which is neat feature apart from that have found tether app to be pretty useless it doesn specify the device identity for some reason just shows the ip and unknown until you rename the device yourself sometimes it doesn even list all the devices connected guess it is better to use the router settings from the browser itself if you want to dig into the settings would like to add one more thing in the end this router looks pretty slick and don think it has gotten enough credits for that kept on the table or even hung from the wall it looks and feels premium for the price and that is in addition to all the amazing features it has router gets sometime auto disconnected even though it is connected to internet don have any issue with router but sure with amazon packaging method bcz no paper bag or anything were used it was only the box good product for that price good range so far everything looks good ill update the review after few months of usage awasome experience go for it with out any hasitation assistance also very good highly recommended to purchase overall good purchase you will never regrate after purchasing it signal strength can be improved further so far good to go

my lg smart tvs magic remote went kaput and since lgs magic remotes are super pricey decided to give this one try besides the air mouse and motion gestures everything else works absolutely fine also the lightweight remote and its form factor feels really nice and cozy in hands however the buttons have no dots or rivets over its buttons which sometimes makes you forget which key you are pressing other than that its great remote controller this product is good for work from my box tv having my original magic remote go kaput was not sure if this remote would work on my inch lg smart tv however huge relief it works and works like smooth operator using the keys no need of any set up etc it doesn have voice or scroll button but anyways was not using that feature in my original magic remote since that consumes batteries to great extent forcing you to change batteries every days don waste money buying expensive ones go for this functionally very good and it is good replacement for the original remote on which the power switch had stopped working haven had to use most of the other functions good performance cheap and best alternative for your lg remote magic mouse option is not there but works fine with my lg tv works as expected the response is little slow but that still fine

my only concern is longevity so let see how long this one lasts otherwise it quite quite useful especially during winters good looking but light weight not easy to clean nice product bought this as it is made in india it is light weight which is good and does its job well the lid must be manually opened and must be pushed all the way up to hold initially it fell back but it needs to be push back to hold upright position am happy with itafter using it for two days except for the cord length of the kettle which should be bit more otherwise thank you for good product very nice good working heats well less noisy and looks elegant cord is short and partially opening lid makes it difficult to clean has worked well so far

my review of using new vacuum mop pro for days the product is bit tricky to setup with the app and you have to follow you tube videos to get it setup wish xiaomi provides video tutorial links in their user manuals they don mention it but we need bluetooth and wi fi connection to be setup for the app and robot to work together this tip is missing in user manual wi fi connectivity does get lost sometimes but that is because my router is far from certain places in my house that time the robot needs to be brought back to the wi fi range ghz connection does not work with this model the robot takes anywhere between minutes to completely vaccum my sq ft house battery life is really good in the new model or more is still left after one complete sweep or mop cycle of my house charging is also not bad it took hrs for it to charge full the first time couple of times it got confused in specific area in my house and had to reset the entire house map for it to work properly again once the map was created and the device has sweeped and mopped that area for couple of times it would not repeat this behavior dusting is of quality each time the amount of dust collected is staggering we never knew we had so much dust in our house mopping is average would call it light wiping and not mopping hard stains or sticky stains or dry stains are not affected by the mopping only light dust or weak stickiness gets wiped out adding bit of floor cleaning liquid or vim liquid in the water helps vacuum mop mixed mode is limited in its effectiveness in this mode mopping sometimes wets the floor and causes dry dust to stick to the floor which the vaccum is not able to pick up recommend vacuum and mop as two separate cycles keeping mop extension attached to the robot all the time causes mopping cloth to accumulate dirt and when it gets dragged along the floor it causes wet dirty mop to be wiped around the house this is not ideal so it important to remove that extension from the vacuum bot when you are only vacuuming and not mopping the mop works horribly on door mats main door or bathroom mats it gets very dirty when it moves over mats and then that wet dirt spreads all over the place so please remove all the mats esp during mopping session noise levels are pretty low in medium mode sometimes we don even know where it has gone it gets so quiet pros battery life suction power noise levels vacuuming cons mopping is average it at best can be called as light wiping setup is bit tricky user manual is insufficient xiaomi does not contact or send any demo person at home you have to figure it out using you tube videos can see old people or non tech savvy people will highly struggle with this thing once the device is confused it doesn correct itself automatically it needs map reset door mats make the mop even dirtier so please remove them or other items on the floor before mopping such tips nobody gives you and you have to learn them on your own but still recommend this device as it is very effective in sweeping the dust in the house clean pros for cleaning dust it is very good we can set daily schedule even if we forget to do so it will automatically does the work by setting schedule cleaning the box after its work is also not very hectic brushes are providing we can set restricted areas cones most of the hairs threads are stuck through the round main brush little difficult to clear the brush it has been more than year iam using this one time the movement is low when ichecked so many hairs are stucked in its wheel it was little difficult to clear the hair strands mopping it is average only only takes very little amount of water so oily things will remain in the floor once or twice in week we have to do mopping with plenty of water and lizol it can reach the sharp corners also once we create restricted area by the time of using it couldn detect the proper area we marked so it enter those area and get stuck most of the times it is main thing hate about this product remaining things are okay then we have to reset the map and set restricted area again it is bit annoying overall it is very good for me my brooming is almost completely replaced by this once in week do the complete cleaning with broom to all areas that didn covered by this machine in all other aspect like price battery app feature suction and cleaning its really very good product find it very useful and nice to have product so will directly make note of some drawbacks improvent area observed sometimes it gets confused or leaves specific section of bedroom even though there has been no obstacle its little noisy or will say not silent thing in standard suction power though that with any vaccuum cleaner xiaomi could have provides extra hepa filter with it vaccum mop doesn clean properly and rather sticks dust to floor because of wet brush so do vaccum and then only mop subsequently is best option charging is super slow if compared with any ah battery with mobile fast charger its times slower despite such big docking charger am bachelor and do not like maid coming to my house this solves the purpose it is great at vacuuming my sqft house it can do it on turbo mode with dual cleaning in single battery life was surprised with the vacuum power and battery life it collects way more dust than the manual brooming it can skip corners and narrow places once in while just broom the corners and bring the dust in the middle before turning the robot on for navigation and room mapping mopping is equally bad mop does not cover whole area and it leaves trails it leaves the floor looking worse than the un mopped floor also water tank broke in just few cleanings recommended for vacuuming purpose very good product very helpful product in my home we purchased the product in april and now it is not working after charging it is running for less than one minute and getting stopped easy to use and working well little bit of noise is there but acceptable helping hand more reliable than maids does the job well once in days you need to mop yourself good suction power

nd purchase review purchased on july dash charge stopped working on september within months but when contacted them on the given whats app number they right away sent me new cable the very next day stars for keeping the promise and professionalism first purchase review writing after months of usage everything happened as expected and written below after purchase after months cable stopped pc connectivity then after month it started showing problems in charging it used to charge in one position only and charging used to stop with little movement finally had to replace it with new one after months since the price is now reduced to so will say good product in this price not long lasting if you want reliable long lasting long length cable go for original from oneplus showroom initial review written just after purchase yes it supports dash charge and no heating issues using it since days one negative point is short length it is meter long original cable is meters so it is difficult to use my phone while charging other negative point can figure out is that cable is really hard in my experience hard cables break more often than soft pliable ones it is not easy to put hard cable in my bag without putting strain on it for daily commute to office this makes them to break easily before time hard cables are also not easy to use when the mobile is charging it puts strain on both the points the charger side and mobile side which again makes it vulnerable to cracks this raises question on longevity of the cable let do some calculations my original one plus cable lasted for years cost of which at present is rs it was soft easy to bend and keep in my bag while traveling daily for work the rs cable online is meters long which makes it easy to work on phone while it is plugged popio cable costs rs at present but they show it which means price may rise so even if it lasts for months it will be more costly to me than an original cable in years popio cable is meter long against meters of original cable so effective price of popio cable is rs for meter cable popio cable is meters long against meters of original cable which makes it not easy to use the phone while it is charging using short cable while charging puts strain on the cable and phone charging port which is damaging for both and also decreases life of both the cable and charging port they say you have to consider cost while writing review but you should also consider cost on long run not just the immediate cost so if are thinking of changing your phone in coming future and don want to spend too much on cable popio is the best option available but if you are looking for long term solution and you can afford to buy rs cable will suggest to go for the original one it has more length it is soft non returnable so now using this as it is bandwidth control is must for this price range model was archer great delivery from amaozn it was easy to setup as extender signal is also good but not that great it can cover flat well signal breaks if moving upstairs or downstairs overall great purchase must buy need little better customer support good expected much stronger signal meter away its okay working but not as expected tp link is good product good product decided on buying this router from tp link after days of research reading reviews and talking to many people regarding different models was on mbps connection with netgear router since which used to suffice for moderate usage till now however with increase in the number of devices like smart tv pads and laptop etc it necessitated an upgrade also considering the current work from home scenario which is bound to continue for the foreseeable future as well the internet usage was being stretched to it limit and the trusted netgear router simply couldn match up to the increased bandwidth demand to capitalise on the current situation our current isp came out with interesting fibre broadband plans and we opted for mbps connection that in turn needed new router to utilize it optimum potential finally zeroed in on the tp link archer after reading some horror stories of other available routers was also tempted to buy the ax considering there barely any price difference but then came across few reviews which stated that wifi is not entirely successfully implemented and might prove to be an hindrance to use with our current range of devices order delivered by amazon within day full marks for the seamless delivery as always prime has truly been boon installed the router today installation via tether app was seamless isp guy helped with the pppoe sign in process and released the mac id which was bound to our old router the whole process was done in mins and we were online the dual bands are truly boon have divided the devices at home equally between and as per usage as the router is close to the tv unit have connected it to and also alternatively connected via the ethernet cable just in case speed tests started off by streaming content simultaneously on devices connected to played seamlessly even with other devices like mobiles etc being connected have attached few pictures for reference sitting near the router download speed is mbps and upload is mbps speed tested in the bedroom with wall in between download mbps and upload mbps speed in the same room as the router is download mbps and upload mbps this is quite surprising as few reviews mentioned mbps will be the threshold for used to get maximum of mbps download on my old speed test via the ethernet cable provided in thr box connected to the tv download mbps and upload mbps couldn have asked for more really this seems to be totally ideal build quality of the device is decent and the antennas seem well enough to do the job however would have preferred that they were placed like other tp link models like the archer so it would have been easier to move them in preferred directions the led lights are little weirdly placed and not bright enough maybe used to the prominent lights on my old router these are blink and miss sort and you have to bend little to check in case there an issue one big element missing in this device is usb port which is absolutely essential in today age and expected to be included for this price range wonder what the reason behind giving it miss have sealed the extra lan ports with tape to protect from dust or moisture it good practice the outer design of the router is quite sophisticated and stylish however little worried of dust accumulating in the intricate design on the top portion functionally though this seems to be real good offering from tp link hope this device lives up to expectations in coming days all in all seems to be worthy investment for the next few years considering an internet plan upgrade if any hope touched upon major points which might help other interested consumers in making choice this product is recommended

amount if you want to get quick overview of the device then read below else scroll down for detailed review firstly its budget friendly only smart tv under in the current market has most number of output port av hdmi usb has android out of the box along with inbuilt bluetooth has dual interface mi patchwall android tv mostly prefer android tv interface remote has bluetooth voice search with sleek profile has better processor compared to predecessor along with gb ram gb storage gb actual speaker output is low need ir cable for using set top box with android interface amazon prime netflix is not preloaded but can be side loaded native display is only hd though even videos from youtube works well check images attached can install play tons of high quality games like rr etc check images attached finally smartphone mirroring works fine most of the time full detailed review built quality has combination of plastic and aluminium for the main body its not great but above average table top stands looks bit flimsy but are workable the screws which are provided in the box does not fits the tv perfectly so bought new from local store it has averagely slim profile not the slimmest in the market speaker placement is inconvenient since they are placed at the bottom so when you keep it on table top the sound tends to dampen and bulge has good ventilation for electronics and it hardly heats up overall built quality is above average display quality it has very thin bezels which looks great video resolution is but videos works fine on it videos on youtube runs smoothly as well viewing angle are good compared to price check the images attached contrast is above average brightness is good and colours are quite vivid display quality is also above average not very great remote control its very sleek and compact has only buttons and is easy to operate fortunately it has volume buttons which is handy have couple of android tv boxes without volume button on remote so know the pain of using mouse to adjust the volume placement of voice search button is improper its just below power button and end up pressing power button lot finally its bluetooth so no need to point it towards tv for operation other features it has dual interface patchwall and android tv has tons of content many games can be installed till you have memory left including multiplayer games google voice search is very useful if you don want to use keyboard processing speed is fast and haven detected any lags yet lags in streaming can be due to slow internet speed not due to hardware bluetooth and wifi connectivity works perfectly cons speaker output though rated is not upto the mark my jbl speakers has better and louder sound placement of speaker is inconvenient as in table top position speakers face the table and sound dampens internal memory is very less no netflix and amazon prime pre loaded though you can side load them miracast not supported even normal smartphone mirroring lags sometimes native resolution is just hd though the videos works on usb on youtube screen is slightly reflective its similar to almost all the other led tv mixed experiences of after sales service customer care firstly the installation is joke my installation was scheduled days after my product delivery and the fun part is there only days replacement window for this product company only takes replacement if the product is opened by their representative so there no point of return window time frame mi has mixed reviews for repairs and services though have not encountered any problem with any mi tv yet have had issues with other mi products and service center near me is always very helpful verdict considering all the facts if you are fine with above average display quality want smart tv and if you have tight budget then this the tv you should certainly go for trust me you won get any better deal than this least for coming couple of months if you have higher budget then certainly explore brands like sony samsung etc this is not perfect smart tv but for the given price and years of warranty its no brainer to choose this its certainly worth the investment this television is definitely perfect balance between price and performance especially during flash sale at an exceptional price of performance the processor in this smart tv is powerful enough to play bit hevc videos right out of the box vlc or mx player can be installed for enhanced media support picture quality many people complain about the overbright screen but it can be compensated by adjusting the display settings these are my preferred settings backlight to during night even the lowest value of is bright enough and can watch content without hurting eyes during day time adjust it as per your requirement depending on your ambient lighting conditions maximum of would be enough setting backlight to minimum improves black levels reduces power consumption increases led life and reduces eye strain especially during night brightness brightness setting controls black level increasing brightness reduces black levels and hence reduces contrast brightness at pictures looks washed out with poor blacks and color saturation at black looks deep but lots of details at dark areas are lost while watching movies is an optimal setting to my eyes with good blacks and not so lack of details contrast to contrast setting controls white level contrast can be set anywhere between and increasing contrast too much may cause highlight areas in picture like bright skies or shiny objects might look overexposed as the screen itself is very bright increasing contrast further makes whites look over bright also colors gets washed out while increasing contrast saturation to color saturation can be set anywhere between to at colors look more natural at colors looks bit punchy but still its personal preference at the above settings the black levels and colors were pleasing while watching demo videos of oled tvs on you tube at the following youtube videos help you to check the black level quality of the tv lg oled beauty of black demo lg oled eclipse demo lg hd demo art nouveau full hd and videos looks sharp in this tv downloaded sample hevc video named life untouched and also hevc sample of the movie elysium both of them played smoothly on the tv with very good details screen quality think this is va panel the quality of which sits right in between tn and ips panels the screen is glossy and hence reflective this might be problem if the tv is placed in room with windows facing it like all other lcd panels this also has also got uneven screen uniformity but that only noticed in plain dark grey backgrounds while watching movies or other content it not at all problem screen non uniformity is common issue even with high end tvs of big brands like lg samsung etc luckily there no backlight bleeding in the unit received viewing angles are average with some loss of contrast even at low angles but that common va panel characteristic ips panels with good viewing angles can be expected at this price point all lcd panel technologies have their strengths and weaknesses ips panels have good viewing angles but has poor black levels va panels excels in black depth despite it average viewing angles and this tv has got very impressive black levels sound quality bass is bit weak think bass is improved following some updates so giving stars from it very loud even at low volume midrange and treble are very good even minute high pitched click and tick sounds in movies can be heard very clearly edit in previous review have mentioned these eq settings sounds good but it isn hz hz hz hz hz high value of for hz actually make the sound muddy and muffled the following settings sounds much better and here the reason hz bass frequency setting for deep bass male vocals and instruments like kick drum toms snare etc hz low midrange enhances bass and depth of male vocals increasing hz too much makes sounds muddy and muffled reducing clarity of high frequency sounds hz midrange imparts metallic tone increasing makes sound tinny and unpleasant hz upper midrange vocals especially female sounds best at this frequency value of enhances vocal quality increasing too much makes vocals harsh hz treble adds crispiness and sparkle to vocals and instruments enhances tinkling sounds of metallic instruments human ear is sensitive to midrange and upper midrange frequencies here it and hz setting these values too high can cause listening fatigue even increasing hz is disturbing great sound performance especially bass is not even expected from television in this budget but considering its midrange frequency clear treble and loudness it deserves stars remote control minimalism is great but minimalism with less functionality is not so great addition of mute tv settings and video input selection buttons would ve made the remote more functional app support update when the tv was released there was no support for netflix and amazon prime but now with pie update it supports both netflix and amazon prime now the tv deserves stars for app support pros and cons pros powerful processor for media playback app installation via usb built in chromecast bluetooth remote voice command cons update previously the main issues with the tv were the lack of autoplay function and standby option but in the latest update both these issues are solved now when the tv is turned on it will automatically go to the previous input source to enable it go to settngs inputs enable stay on the previous source option screen off feature is also added in the new update long pressing power button will show screen off option the only disadvantage left on the tv was lack of miracast but on latest update build pi miracast is included and now its perfect to sum up overall considering the picture quality powerful hardware and the price the tv definitely deserve stars devoid of it average audio quality and the glossy screen because there are no other tvs in market with such features at this price point also xiaomi now has got very strong service support across india new brands like ffalcon blaupunkt thomson etc might provide better options at competitive price but when it comes to service centres it dead end am very much satisfied with the purchase it good product good if you like best tv on your budget ll recommend you this stunning picture quality and dts surround is osm but there was few lagging problem and miracast is not good build quality good sound and bass excellent product is very good sound quality is crisp worth buying brought it years back still working fine good quality

note its ready to go mic which doesn need any sound card and can be plugged and used directly even with smartphones has mm jack connector built in you can use connector if needed it has very long cable which measures upto feet so note that it has absolutely no noise isolation and normal smartphone earphones does better job of noise reduction compared to them in stock condition but with simple editing this mic works just fine check the review below for detailed settings there are literally thousands of review on this product but none explained the best possible settings for it when used with smartphone with audacity software or even in general so took the risk of ordering it and it turned out to be nightmare right out of the box as the sound output was worse than my smartphone earphones so went to search for best settings on amazon other sources but in vain fortunately myself in experiments found the solution and now its working just fine first am mentioning all the pros and cons considering the settings that found and then listing those settings pros built quality of the complete mic and cable is good for the price given length of cable is insane feet personally didn find it useful as use it with my smartphone which is just couple of feet below in my pockets but for some users it can be very useful if using in rig setup with camera has universal mm jack which is handy its easy to use just plug and play device which doesn need any sound card or external device to work has support for multiple device right from smartphones to dslrs and computers it comes with carry pouch which is very handy since its mess with such long cables cons biggest con is the sound quality right out of the box its just garbage quality and even normal ears can bear the background noise collection so forget about audiophiles my normal smartphone earphones record much better sound quality compared to this length of cable is way too much for me and guess for many users think there should have being multiple option on length to choose from as keeping feet cable wrapped and hanging or in pocket while recording is not comfortable it comes with button cell for recording sound for devices other than smartphone and there no way to know whether the battery is dead or what its charging level only way to check is by plugging it to digital recorder or computer and test so if you are carrying it with recorder which doesn has playback feature or if you are in hurry and in case of dead battery to record all the sound then only way to find that your efforts are in vain will be when you comfortably sit to edit it and trust me its very frustrating am mentioning it as this scenario have happened with me once hence am very cautious about batteries now use it with smartphones or digital recorders think price should have being couple of hundred bucks less considering the sound quality best setting using audacity software these are the settings when you record with smartphone or any other device and there are lots of background noises and you use audacity software which is free open the software and open the audio file you recorded with this mic select entire audio clip and open effects and then distortion start the playback of audio clip in the software so you can listen to change in effects that you are about to make now select distortion type option on the top of box and select soft clipping or select hard limiter and do the settings as it sounds suitable to you take the clipping level cursor to extreme right end or so until you hear soft pleasant output adjust the make up gain cursor little bit if needed keep it on here you can select which ever type which you feel is suitable for you now just click apply now is noise reduction for that select short section of audio which does not have your voice but only has background noises that you don want open effects and then noise reduction click on get noise profile now select entire audio clip and again open effects and then noise reduction finally click on ok and that it now you are good to go with soft slightly lesser noises and more pleasant sound output after these steps you can amplify the sound from same software or any other end user software verdict personally am very disappointed with the sound quality though the audacity tweaking gets it to bearable level but its satisfactory enough plus price seems slightly more on this wouldn recommend these are someone looking good sound quality specially if you live in noisy environment buy this only if you live in very silent conditions it not great or best out there for beginners but good use budget mid range phone and the boya mic is better than in built mic of phone record it in wav format it good you gotta use software apps to pull the best of this like audacity or some other editing app it pretty long and that good as you can extend the cable to good distance say if connecting it to the camera on tripod overall it decent for beginners see high end phones have good recording capabilities but if you have budget phone then this one is deal microphone looks very well built it supports both phones and cameras there are some phones that does not support external mic please check before buying as one of my phone did not support it they claim noise cancellation however did not notice major difference it also captures great amount of noise only cancellation is because of foam padding around the microphone could not observe noise cancellation at least while recording on phone overall package is well bundled wire quality is decent however the dongle quality is excellent even the small clip to hold the microphone feels solid wire is to long but good if quality of wire is improve in future then stars from me but now star good sound low price star for wire quality but over all nice product think it good for online teaching like do but yeah some problems like very long cable length mean someone might need but it should be optional or detachable price of the mic itself is not much anyways am okay with this mic for sometime until am sure need quality rode mic to upgrade don expect noice cancellation under this budget but audio recording quality is very good nice product decent

once you start using bagless vacuum cleaner you will never turn back using it on weekly basis since nov so its long tern review coming from another vacuum cleaner that had bags this one is truly hassle free cleaner at least you are away from the hassle of maintaining cleaning replacing bags which is truly mess and you would understand only if you have used cleaners with bags further devices with bags tend to get chocked now and then leading to less suction inside box vacuum cleaner unit flexible pipe with integrated retraceable brush and suction adjustment knob turbo brush nozzle multi clean nozzle high suction flat inlet nozzle telescopic extension pipe user manual warranty card the power cord is mtr and device comes with mechanish to retrace it back into the machine it has normal amp pin top which can easily fit in or pin sockets both amp or amp but better to connect it to amp ones only considering its power consumption observations pros device has high suction power and can be cleaned easily with bagless design where dust collects in chamber and you can empty it in the dustbinno hassles of cleaning and replacing bags components are high quality such as the telescopic extension is metallic though it also con for this attachment even plastic components are of good quality device easily moves around owing to its big and smooth wheels you don need to pull it by force default flexible pipe itself is long and has an integrated brush that can also be retracted its highly useful attachment considering it attached to primary flexible pipe and is easily available for use each attachment here is multipurpose when you open the package you feel like very few attachments are provided but when you start exploring you discover that all attachments are multipurpose details below attachments are easy snap fit and remove active lock in the company terminology once you insert the attachments it click locks and can be removed by press of button or release lever both the turbo brush and multi nozzle have flexible neck and wheels on the bottom for easy movement and effective cleaning dust collector can be opened with one press and has removable filters attached to it these filters can be washed once in while to prevent clogging the main unit has filter system to filter fine dust dust mites etc and is equivalent to hepa as per the company this filter is accessible from the backside for cleaning purposes device obviously makes sound but is not in the range of causing irritation to the ears it in the bearable range observations cons telescopic extension is metallic and heavy so it bit of trouble to use for longer durations especially when you are trying to clean ceilings reduction of suction power is via bypass valve built into the flexible pipe and has no way to reduce the power of the machine to reduce suction so effectively this valve makes cleaner suck in air from in between to reduce suction at the end but then consumes the same amount of power if there had been control mechanism to reduce power it would also save electricity device comes with amp top but its pin so if you are going to use it with modular power sockets with self closing mechanism for holes it will be trouble to plug it in everytime miss the blower system in this cleaner which is handy at times was there in my previous cleaner they could have easily implemented it for the cons reducing star but its definitely star device attachments flexbile pipe comes with an integrated brush and you can easily retract it back onto the pipe multipurpose nozzle has button to increase its suction power and with one press it goes nearer to the floor turbo brush nozzle sweeps the floor or mattress with rotating bristles along the length and if you want to turn off the rotation of the brush there is button to lock it main unit has system on the back and botton side to attach the multi clean and turbo brush nozzle primarily for easy sweep or for storage purposes final verdictthis bagless vacuum cleaner is hassle free device and requires very less maintenance but it comes at cost and if you are willing to stretch your budget it definitely worth it have had no any issues so far in the past year when using it regularly this is nice bag less vaccum cleaner with rotating brush that does great job of cleaning it also comes with good set of accessories found it also cheaper to order it online compared to the croma store two drawbacks not deal breaker found and hope philips addresses them were it comes with two pin ampere plug and you need to buy an adapter to use with normal ampere plugs in the house was afraid to use the adapter thinking that it may heat with the use but had no issues with heating of the adapter or the plugs in the wall during minutes of cleaning each room in the house do not see point in having that plug during the use one just pulls it along but it has no handle to lift the machine believe that one can use the handle of the dust canister to lift the machine but am afraid that repeated lifting like this will break the click on mechanism so ended up lifting the machine as whole all the time while moving the machine without the hose as mentioned earlier these are not deal breaker but enough to take one star off and can have the star back if philips addresses the issues on this great little machine suction power is good suitable for cleaning carpet window curtains floors and carpets cleaning the dust container is also very easy only concern have is if some length power cord is not pulled out from machine the power wire that still reamins inside the machine is getting heat from suction motor after using the machine for nearly hour and pulled out the cord that was in the machine it was actually liitle hot to touch not sure is it safe for the live power cord to warm up like this would have been even better if this had blower functionality also good product cord length and suction power is satisfactory good quality heavy noise this is the first vacuum cleaner purchase for me and can say that am happy customer bought this back in august and it is serving me well it comes with attachments that are convenient and reach high places it has three modes of cleaning tiled floors carpets and sofas and with pets in the house it has made my life that much easier thank you phillips for good product and thank you amazon for smooth transaction well built top notch quality suction power is too high

everything is good the camera supports gb of memory card while the online storage as mentioned in the details of days rollover in india is missing remember nothing is perfect xiaomi has already released home security cameras using other brands such as yi and the home security camera market is yet to be adapted in large so you can expect lot of misunderstanding on how everything works together in home security camera in general initial setup it is breeze for some but pain for others see the star ratings if you want proof had trouble getting this camera recognized by its own app mi home it took about hour to recognize after trying with different lighting conditions the camera got disconnected from the app after switched the ssid of the router so had to pair it again this time it took more than day of trial and error had to keep the camera under bright sun light in order to get recognized by the mi home app lesson learned in hard way bandwidth requirement this camera requires connectivity with solid internet connection and with good upload bandwidth even if you have mbps connection this camera can only be connected via wireless so longer the distance from the router shorter the bandwidth this camera hangs up if it doesn have enough bandwidth if you add nas storage you need even more bandwidth between the camera and the router the camera is very sensitive if you set up any conflicting configurations it just hang and would not record anything at all even in the on board sd card storage if the camera hangs for particular reason you have to restart it it is pain to troubleshoot things when you are miles away from home in another city mi home app requires almost all the permissions from your phone but was able to disable most permissions except location and storage what more you get ads in the app right after opening it on the dashboard where you see the list of devices since version released on dec wish xiaomi released dedicated app for home security cameras like other companies have done google assistance isn compatible with this camera if you are into that sort of thing some other cameras from xiaomi not released in india are supported though once paired to the app and once you have the perfect setup with nas and good wireless bandwidth to from the camera you may become addicted to use it under different conditions such as with total darkness if you are technically sound and have around budget raspberry pi based home security is better option if you are on budget and if you don want to spend lot of time on technical things then xiaomi mi home security camera is the best home monitoring camera you can get good enough it works as it shown nice camera and easy to install only issus is motion censor doesn work it good but price is high and sometime it not working so good can take motion recording not up to mark

ordered this phone based on specs it was providing later saw flood of negative reviews coming up on amazon which made me test few of things that was mentioned if it was true calls getting disconnected had call with my brother last night and we talked for min and call did not disconnect in the middle heating issue while in day to day use never faced heating issue but it gets little hot while charging can understand because of massive fast charging which is understandable every phone with fast charging heats little camera quality it has decent mp samsung camera module which is justified at price it comes you can judge the camera based on how well it performs indoor with artificial lighting conditions and this has done good attached pic of cake which clicked indoor only bright light source was candle it performed well can say to people who complaint about camera just cannot expect picture clarity of apple or samsung high end devices have to set my expectations right for the price we have paid an tu tu benchmark score while company claim of while tested got score of again cannot complaint here because don know what was the testing conditions and criteria that company had followed while testing is pretty decent score can say phone lag in two days of testing it has not lagged at all with multiple background apps running battery drain revisit few of the settings on your device like animation transition effect etc to get most out of your battery if your batter is set of monstor mode set it to normal or battery saver to make most again battery depends of usage of individual and cannot blame company while started to write this review my cell phone was at now it almost min typing till now it now showing have set my screen at full brightness fell its decent also tested charging speed to in min build quality it sturdy and decent plastic is used can say at this price point they should have provided glass build but again considering all price benefit you have got while buying this phone no complaint card discount exchange benefit etc still would take out star here black colour issue did not face any problem with screen leak or black colour it amoled screen black is highlight of amoled in case you were using ips fhd panel on your previous phone you will have trouble distinguishing have samsung as secondary device and see black similar on both bgmi played few rounds yesterday and did not face any frame drop or lag two year warranty they calaimed to provide two year warranty on this device but during registration it shows only year have personally wrote to iqoo team and amazon team seeking an answer with screenshots waiting for answer btw majority of phone manufacturers provide year warranty only even phone here would say fight for you justice and seek answer from iqoo or amazon team video call lag did not face any did multiple video calls yesterday with different people did not get any complaint from them about my video lag for all of them my video popped up instantaneous overall would say had great buy and can recommend this device to others for all the folks bombarding negative reviews would say first set your expectations right and you will be satisfied in case even still you are facing problem then you have every right to complaint and get justice overall give this device star as of now since am yet to test this device long term like months or months please excuse any typos or grammatical errors if any entire review was typed on my phone iqoo neo have been using budget phone realme since dynamic black gb gb it served me well but it was time for an upgrade was looking for midrange model this time that would have almost everything wanted within my budget did get one lets dig into it the good price after discounts got phone with practically all the features wanted iqoo is basically from vivo an internationally recognized brand hopefully dont have to worry about software updates for at least years iqoo is already doing good as have received security updates so far for the android that came out of the box will keep an eye on the security updates and os upgrades as it will make me decide whether to go for vivo iqoo for my next phone dual sim support which is futuristic with the call quality has been superb so far amoled hz nits peak pixels display with contrast ratio hz touch sampling rate and hdr netflix hdr supported huge upgrade from my previous phone the photos ott movies look too good easier to read contents like messages emails or documents mp main cam with ois ois was must have feature for me since could be taking lot of low light photos ah battery with flash charge technology in min in min works as claimed the battery life has been satisfactory sd cpu not one of the flagship processors today but highly capable and fantastic at this price inclusion of gb ram has made this phone buttery smooth one for running apps android is quite ram dependent os unlike os up to gb of phone storage can be used for extended ram currently have apps installed mostly productivity apps but no gaming apps the cascade cooling system seems to be working gb rom with ufs since phones nowadays tend to ditch dedicated micro sdxc slot and this phone is no exception did not want the gb variant fast large internal rom is better than an external card as the latter loads the apps files slower the in display fingerprint reader works well the stereo speakers are reasonably good infrared port ir blaster have not tried using it as remote but must try usb port with usb to usb data cable that connects to the phone charger some of us prefer usb to usb data cable instead as it is more friendly to the modern devices but can see why iqoo decided to provide usb to usb most laptops still come with usb ports even my recent hp laptop from the company work for does have usb port without power delivery and two usb ports my powerbanks dont have usb ports either screenshots lock screen virtual buttons must as using physical buttons frequently for these functions can potentially damage the buttons the bad google backup fail since did not have usb to usb cable had to choose the wi fi data transfer option from my old phone to this one although selected all the files google failed to transfer many files especially the pdfs dear google this is unacceptable spam handling my realme lets me block any sms want but this one does not in my opinion every modern phone must have native app that can identify the caller and help block number or an sms as needed have stopped using rd party app like truecaller which has become truly rogue app no mm jack plus when you don have bluetooth earphone or don prefer one but iqoo thankfully included usb to mm adapter in the box the absence of gorilla glass protection is not good thing but do not mind as barely drop my phone and the phone came with an already applied tempered glass screen protector and transparent back cover really appreciated the plastic body does not bother me moreover the dark nova color feels cool ymmv in my realme and not in my realme which means it is custom feature from realme for specific os versions if try turning off the daily wakeup alarm it gives me options like turn off on the next day for which the alarm is active do not repeat any more or cancel this is fabulous feature as it allows me to turn off the alarm for particular day say an upcoming leave or holiday without turning it off for the following days unfortunately this artificial intelligence is not available in my iqoo neo always buy recently released model if you are going for an android phone this will make sure that you get software support for long enough time moreover avoid buying the variant with lowest ram rom and fast charging is necessity as you see that you are hooked up with your phone all the time have used this phone for months and will update this review as keep using it till date am quite satisfied with iqoo neo also liked the funtouch os and recommend it to anybody who has needs like me

original rd jan this is my first smartwatch have bought couple of honor fitness bands earlier for family but this is my personal first have been keenly following the smartwatch space for the last months or so and aware of most of the products in the budget range while can afford slightly more expensive one gts gtr or honor gt pro oppo watch fitbit etc with calling feature wanted to get the feel of smartwatch in the budget range first gave lot of thought and finally bought this one as it included gps and amazon alexa yet to be included but must be available through an ota update have loved to buy amazfit bip pro as it has almost the same features with an lcd display has gps and alexa in the global version named amazfit pop pro it still isn released in india coming to the watch performance the typical features tried today first day are heart rate hr spo stress monitoring and gps have pulse oximeter from dr trust at home and so could compare the hr and spo the numbers on the watch aren very accurate to my surprise heart rate variation by bpm and spo percentage off by points at times but still feel it more to do with calibration and the way these numbers are measured than inaccuracy of the hardware etc gps was breeze as walked on the terrace of my rural town house it won surprise me if don get the same performance in metro city with lot of high rise apartments etc the compass worked fine when compared it with my phone music controls worked fine bluetooth data transfer or sync was good couldn control the phone camera as couldn get that feature to work refer to image and help me if you can didn face any issue with watch vibration during calls and app notifications the readability on the watch screen has been really good tried couple of workouts while the step count seems to be fine not sure of the accuracy of the stats on other workout modes to conclude wouldn say that this watch is disappointment but it needs improvements on the accuracy of the fitness stats probably should give it more time but fitness brands have done better in terms of accuracy at least the honor bands ve seen eagerly waiting for alexa update as curious what all it can do would love to update my review after using the watch for few more days let see update th jan the battery is clear disappointment as many other users pointed out hardly getting it for days with always on display and an occasional workout limited watch faces both on device and the app not many out of these do justice to the good display waterproof nature of the device is good didn dip it in water but it got wet when was bathing my kids and it seems to have waterproof coating which was in action got the camera shutter to work hope amazfit provides updates to fix battery drain and enable alexa notifications didn have an issue but could not clear individual items clear all worked review of amazfit gts mini smart watch model hello everyone since the new model of amazfit gts mini arrived am going to review the old model of it pros display inch amoled display really good look pros battery coming with ma from percent to percent it takes days to drain and it was expected to last day longer normal use but if you are light user it can last it for days pro ip rating ip water resistant which is cool pro heartbeat sensor it has heartbeat sensor and it is real but it may not show real accuracy at all the time but it performs good pro comfortness it is really comfortable wearing this watch and the band is silicone material pro work out modes there are nearly workout modes and tested out some since it is built in gps it works nearly accurate but the measure is not that much accurate but it works well pro can track stress has pai feature to progress your workout with better experience alexa assistant but need phone connection to activate this has other modes like breathing menstrual cycle tracking to do list inbuilt alarm pomodoro timer sleep tracker timer in built compass camera remote find the phone controlling music etc notification system you can get notifications call control system you can accept or reject calls but you cannot able to talk through watch cons build quality it is told that this watch is completly aluminium frame but it is quite disappointing that only half frame is gun metal aluminium and half is poly carbonate con watch faces the inbuilt watch faces are quite depressing at initial impressions but there are some watch faces that are really good con spo don know how much accurate it is but coming to technical part the sensors are failing most of the times sometimes cannot able to sync workout history con verdict it is not bad idea to spend money for this watch due to immense features and real sensors but you should compromise on sensors efficiency and build quality the incoming call notification disconnects if you re away from the watch even though other notifications are displayed in the watch have accidentally hit the display of the watch while walking in walls and steel doors even though it not damaged water resistance is good used to wash dishes wearing it no use of alexa think it good buy after months of usage all over amazfit gts mini new version is good but price is high and also calling features not available that is the biggest drawback apart for this other things are really nice sleep tracking is fantastic but there is some bug after the update is that the sleep traking track itself even we not wear the watch rather all thing are fantastic and battery life is day in normal uses

products named aquasure delight the product is pleasant to look and comes with capacity of on paper but holds only liters of water equipped with reverse osmosis ultraviolet radiation lamp and manual drainage of litre from the drain pipe please collect the water and reuse it for washing utensils or bathing shaving or watering plants the drained water is same as tank water just with higher tds the water taste varies according to the level of tds you choose very low tds will give good taste to water but at loss of the mineral content of water which will not recommend the default tds after purification is set somewhere between drinking water should have tds below manufacturer reviewrating the manufacturer of this product is eureka forbes am giving rate of because the product that is now lights to their original position so that the led indicators were now visible outside the replaced product valve is functional and now operating without any hassle service review don expect to have very comfortable installation experience its going to be heartache the reasons are the people eureka forbes has employed as technicians are thieves am saying this because aquasure delight comes with integrated diverter valve this is stainless steel structure that is fitted to water outlet coming from the wall so that it can act as converter to be joined to the aquaguard inlet as hadn opened the taking the precaution didn open the box so was unaware that diverter is included in the package the technician after fitting the diverter charged rs saying that he fitted that from his side and it to me at rs which is available at amazon at rs but then if had ordered it from amazon have to install it by myself don have drill etc so had to pay him rs so loss of rs on the technician my opinion on this is that eureka forbes should sell water purifiera with pre filter even though it raises the cost of the product by rs to rs platform review the platform in which bought is of course amazon am
