static frame static back frame of webcam cover screen frame the laptop screen frame the product is sturdy invisible for the mutual color theme for device and product and well manufactured if the device has the same matte black theme this webcam cover can easily be merged and becomes part of the device body as you can see my laptop has matte black screen frame and astonishingly the product has merged with it the little plastic container in the package will act as storage for the rest of the webcam covers it is ultra thin as described by the company with acquiring about millimeter thickness this thickness can cope with the windows laptops as they are having the rubber buffers on the top side of the screen frame because those buffers act as spacer between the screen and the lower up body keyboard of the laptop to avoid any harm to the screen this spacer is advantageous to the webcam cover as closing the lid will not harm the screen screen frame and laptop lower up body but still don put pressure on the location where the webcam cover is installed as the thickness of the webcam cover is slightly more in the micrometers than the rubber buffers of the laptop itself the sliding function is very smooth but be sure to push only the slider part and not the whole static part as it will make the grip weak over time of usage the device can be used with any phone and monitor as they have no issue with opening and closing the lids now for the mac laptop users it is not product for your laptop and never try this product for your mac laptops as the mac laptops have stunning plain glass screen that is covering the whole screen frame part and has no spacers that is there no space left after closing the laptop lid and hence upon installation of this product will damage crack break the plain glass screen installation is easy remove the blue tape and carefully stick the cover as sticker using the scale for support or else you could stick it little inclined after sticking rub your palm for heat generation and grab the screen frame from both palms and apply the ultra light pressure and hold the position up to good to minutes and there you go for your satisfied invisible life important even if not in use slide it times once week and clean it as per your device cleaning schedule to avoid jamming due to debris or dust overall it is good product for me it has worked awesome green signal from here thank you suggestionsto the manufacturer notice the static frame of the webcam cover and make its edges the edges close to the slider smooth rounding off or fillet so that upon sliding the slider with fat finger it can easily slide over the edges of the static frame hence do not put an unnecessary force on static frame to the seller well packaging to the consumer check for the rubber spacers buffers provided in the laptop like windows laptops if it is then you can use the webcam cover if not like mac laptops it not the product for you even for windows laptops after installing webcam cover try not to put pressure on the webcam cover location for long slide it times once week to avoid jamming disclaimerthe review and rating has ve been made upon personal usage experiment experience perspective for specific product acquired delivered usually don trust my webcam so thought of giving this product try it was delivered within days after placing the order received it on th june first impressions were really good always had fear that it would crack my screen when close my laptop lid after reading the reviews but it been months and there not even single crack in my screen build quality you will get webcams covers in the package it extremely thin so it won cause any issues when you close the laptop hp pavilion gaming used here but it might cause issues in the case of laptops with thin screens like mac book air asus tuf asus rog while closing the lid due to the pressure on the screen at the end it your choice adhesion am sorry to say that the adhesion of this product is quite weak it literally falls off after week of applying it had to throw of it as it became useless only had the last piece remaining solution for adhesion eventually was able to find solution for this problem remove the stock adhesion by gently applying isopropyl alcohol then apply strong adhesive glue used fevi kwick apply it only on the back edges of the webcam cover since it extremely thin used thin needle to apply super glue gently on it or else the superglue will spill out and make mess immediately you have to place it on the webcam of our laptop and then you re good to go its been months after using the super glue technique forget about about falling it has not even moved bit no effect on the quality of my webcam the cover won interfere when you are using your webcam in meetings and fully covers it when you want privacy overall its good product except for the fact that it has poor adhesion good product wish had known this before ordering luckily friend made me aware the very same day had applied it apple urges people not to close their mac book mac book air or mac book pro while such camera covers are applied because it can lead to cracks in the screen when closing your mac book it may also affect the ambience light sensor but that is the lesser issue as compared to potentially cracked screen and high repair costs mac books are designed in way that when closing no foreign object thicker than an average printer paper mm should ever be between the screen and the body of the laptop this item is inches thick that is mm six times the recommended thickness if you are going to use it on your mac book be sure to completely remove it before closing your laptop you can use it without worry on mac as it desktop and doesn get closed you can also use it with any normal laptop where the camera isn embedded inside the glass screen if you have laptop where the camera is embedded in the plastic frame around the screen it should be okay for disappointed mac book users like me there are two options one is you trust apple who are saying their camera is hardwired to the green camera light according to them one cannot work without the other so even if someone hacks your camera you will know it is on because the green light will be glowing if you re not sure about their reliability and you still want to cover your camera use piece of thin tape apple does advice against anything which could leave adhesive residue on their screen but frankly if you just clean it with some screen cleanser after removing don see how there could be an issue why am still giving this product stars it reached in good condition is easy to install and use and it will still be useful to people with other laptops or desktop screens with inbuilt camera it not bad product they just need to stop advertising it for mac books

purchased from amazon for full price under no offers still beat competitors by rs order was placed on thursday late in the evening at pm was to be delivered on thursday but arrived early on monday at am quite satisfied with the delivery packaging condition of the item and also happy with the early arrival along with the vacuum we received basic instruction manual and warranty card the invoice was missing from the parcel so it had to be downloaded from amazon to register your warranty you require to scan the bar code on the invoice and whats app the details without any delay excitedly we got to assemble the unit which was fairly easy task took approximately minutes which guess is ok for the first time while getting familiar with all various attachments etc first impressions the vacuum itself looks sturdy built wise but some attachments could be little stronger especially the extension pipes could be stainless steel same as the drum and telescopic in feature operation the main vacuuming head attachment used for floor hard surfaces could also be stainless steel as it gets used the most and gets banged around quite bit would extend its life its pin plug instead of pin which could have been better with surge protector fuse the cord is of decent length quite impressed with the quality of the cord also the cord which has no autowind and cannot be inserted within the body of the unit after use can be rested on top of the drum in winding fashion it kinda works and does keep in place without being nuisance hose same solution the side latches are reasonably strong wheels are easy to install insert and work fine it would be absolutely fantastic if the various attachments could be stored latched to the main unit while not in use storage wise but can understand the limitations in this regard first demo was for the vacuum noise average not too loud or unbearable reasonable with any other domestic vacuum of similar power inside the lid the dust bag clings on to its inlet would be better if it could be secured locked with clip in vacuum suction mode the air gets forced out of the blower outlet this outlet is directed on the opposite side of the unit and is directed straight onto the floor level now imagine if you had not yet cleaned that part of the room and that dust gets thrown around or blown onto the already cleaned surfaces it would be an unending job like dog chasing its tail if this outlet had removable or having the ability to rotate something like flap or adjustable ac vents like in cars then it could direct the blown out air upwards while vacuuming the surfaces and this could have been of great design sense suction is at par with as described or claimed in the adverts nothing too exciting but definitely not disappointing does the job which is important then follows the demo for the blower this feature should technically be equally as strong as the vacuum because the force of the air sucked in while vacuuming is supposedly the same force leaving the blower outlet to make things interesting there are fish gill like vents on either sides of the lid these vents are the fixed kind cannot be closed or opened one of the vent very faintly can be felt taking in air while the other vent blows out air at significant force this particular phenomena am bewildered with cause as understand the escaping rate of air through this vent will weaken the force supposed to leave the blower outlet so make of it what you will still does the job if you re looking at blowing leaves or scaring the neighbours pet finally the demo for the wet performance is at par with as described or claimed in the adverts and as other customers have described in their video demonstrations again nothing too exciting but definitely not disappointing does the job which is important may need to dry mop even after using the wet function in closing definitely do purchase it use it often as required and also helps keeping fit do not allow dust to settle on your vacuum blower also ordered extra american micronic replacement dust bag for ami vcd wdx ami vcd wdxii rodak mm mattress and upholstery nozzle for vacuum cleaner wet and dry cleaning eu import it have the best suction power among the wet and dry vaccum cleaner even better than some of the dry vaccum cleaners bought this for my mother in law she likes it for being easy to use it simple and easy to connect and remove dust covers and pipes extension pipes are little loose though it easy to clean those cat hairs now and don have to worry about accidentally sucking the water from the floor because it wet and dry vaccum cleaner hope the customer care is good one incase of any needs arise they send me already opened package but not used think they could have send us fresh unopened perfectly sealed package no complaints untill now liked the reusable dust cover feature also it easy to connect it inside easy to handle don have too much weight it would have been better if there was an auto winding of power cables with switch this is domestic beast great suction only thing that should had been ther is speed control noise level is high but with such suction is ok as long as it cleans it all without ne to redo it again and again am ok rest how it will stay with time will be something to see it is very easy to clean as the suction power is great very powerful machine indeed have been looking for good vaccum cleaner for long time now recently came across this and read the reviews etc some were good and some were bad but at the same time couldn find any better specifications in any of the other vaccum cleaners in this price segment so finally bought it it came in big amazon box well packed and secured unboxed and it was as perfect as in the stock images here is the list for you to understand the pros and cons as easily as possible very good quality steel and plastic build the suction kpa is really really good even with the thick carpets etc the wheels are really good too they move effortlessly you get lot of accessories to clean different surfaces and they re good quality the blower function is really powerful the bag inside which collects the dust dirt is big and can be cleaned washed easily the noise level isn much its okay not loud the cord length is mtrs which is enough the overheating protection is good all the accessories can be stored at the given spaces on the base cons the only thing that think should be improved is the locking mechanism of the extension pipes they are good and fit well but if its carpet or some other mats you re cleaning you need to tighten it well otherwise it loosens and needs to be tightened again and again overall product which fits all your needs wet and dry cleaning of course better than any other vaccum cleaners in under price range go for it ve tried some other vaccum cleaners too which are in the and above range but this is the all in one op vaccum cleaner good suction with great built quality good durability good suction power and quality product vacuum cleaner is very fine suction power is quite good drying power is also just ok noise level is high as expected cost is high as compared to other brands overall rated it four star

really liked this router for smallish space the coverage never dropped and was mostly consistent however it suddenly developed some snag and stopped connecting to the internet apparently the ethernet port got damaged somehow tried calling tp link service center numbers and realised how bad their service is it the first time in my life that router has broken and that too after just over year usage and to make it worse there dismal after sales service tried to buy replacement from tp link but that router came with problems as the connection wasn stable think ll finally look towards other router makers and avoid tplink product until maybe they start caring more for their costumers hopefully ll find good maker good router after researching lot settled on tp link was looking for better range router this router really worth the price dual band guest wifi upgraded from tenda and performance is really good range for gz is not that good as gz but which is accepted and no other routers in this range can provide better than this was using tenda ac router since for mbps connection from local isp mach broadband mumbai most of devices mobiles laptops firestick at my home work on ghz except cctv camera range of tenda ac was good and used digisol ac repeater for farthest room of my bhk home in recent lightning strike in mumbai power adapter of tenda ac got burned out and performance issues creeped in with replacement adapter was searching for router with good range and speed within my budget tried routers mercusys ac mr tp archer ac before this both routers didn meet my expectation range and speed of these routers were poor than my earlier tenda ac amazon accepted returns without single question thumbs up to amazon after some more research zeroed on tp link archer as per comparison on tp link website both are identical routers after doing some more research on blogs and reviews found that archer is the latest model and had slightly better processor both from qualcomm hence purchased archer feature of onemesh is added advantage for adding onemesh repeaters in future separate wifi ssid with same strength on both ghz as unnamed wifi can be seen on wifi analyser as per tp link support page this is dedicated wifi link for onemesh repeaters now for router router is same as tenda ac for coverage it can not cover farthest room in bhk on ghz ghz band can cover bhk house but speed is around mbps on mbps plan however speed on archer is better that tenda ac getting mbps upload and download consistently on devices feet apart in ghz tp link archer is better than costlier ac routers just for info received us version of router instead of eu version mentioned on tp link india website hence firmware on tp link india website will not match with device firmware however this device has auto update option directly from internet also router can be managed by tp link tether app remotely on internet even tough not connected on same wifi by login using tp link account on both router and tether app by trying so many routers understood that ghz range will be week even with costliest router instead of using digisol ac repeater installed my old tenda ac in repeater mode for ghz ghz disabled now my complete home is covered by ghz signal in the farthest room receive download upload speed of around mbps also tried old tp link archer which had purchased when abroad performance is not good in terms of speed and range as it lacks gigabit ports beam forming mu mimo my isp has connected my link on gigabit port of their switch in my society however cabling is only pair cat which supports max mbps full duplex will try to get cabling changed to either pair cat or cat from isp and check the performance will update review after cabling change so in the nutshell would recommend to go for router with gigabit ports beam forming mu mimo even if your internet speed is less than mbps as it is future proof tp lnk archer is good router meeting all requirement within the budget hope this review is useful in search of good future proof router edit my isp tried to replace my connection to ftth and this router was connected to fiber onu using gigabit port it worked only for mins max speed was mbps isp was not able to resolve the ftth issue and changed cable to pair cat which supports gigabit transmission now net speed is around mbps my internet plan is mbps happy with the speed have asked isp to change my connection to ftth at last tenda ac is now working as wired repeater connected on gigabit port of archer using cat cable now complete home received stable wifi of mbps on ghz band will update once again when ftth connection is successful good product till now month am very satisfied am really satisfied with this product as earlier my phone is keep getting wifi disconnected and used to reconnect it and the same way vpn is keep getting reconnecting in my laptop hence my teams call used to disconnect during the meeting now am happy with this product where my vpn is not reconnecting even internet goes down and if any flatuations in the network as well finally am not seeing any issue with this router it is helping me during work from home please go ahead its easy to use easy to install more function to control the router

realme buds wireless design and specifications truly wireless earphones are becoming very popular and we could very well see realme get into that space in the coming months however for now the company has taken on wireless headphones in an affordable form neckband style earphones the headset has flexible neckband with metal modules at the ends short cables that lead to the earbuds and the plastic earbuds themselves we quite liked the yellow and black colour scheme of our review unit the design is simple and the build quality is decent the device is light at just and comfortable to wear and use for long hours at stretch like earlier realme earphones the realme buds wireless have magnets in each earbud while they don serve any purpose on the wired models beyond keeping the two earbuds together the magnetic clamp serves as the power switch for the realme buds wireless separating the buds turns the headset on while attaching them powers it down there is no power button so this is the only way to control power on the headset in theory this sounds good but the weak magnets meant that the earphones separated easily when placed in bag or pocket this would turn the earphones on and automatically connect with our paired smartphone even when we didn want it to which was bothersome calls would be automatically diverted away from the smartphone earpiece without us knowing the battery would run down and the phone wouldn automatically connect to other devices such as bluetooth car audio system what you do get in the sales package are three pairs of silicone ear tips ear wings that are pre attached to the earbuds and micro usb cable for charging the charging port is on the underside of the right module which also has the controls for playback calls and volume the realme buds wireless earphones are powered by mm drivers with bluetooth and support for the sbc and aac codecs the earphones have claimed battery life of hours on single charge and are said to offer minutes of listening time on minute charge when the battery is drained we were able to get around hours of use in our testing while full charge of the headset took little under hours to complete realme buds wireless performance the realme buds wireless bring refreshing change to the budget segment offering great combination of design and sound quality for the price also fans of electronic music will be happy to know that the realme buds wireless have been tuned with inputs from popular dj alan walker and the sound does come across as geared for this genre the wireless earphones with use aac bluetooth codecs we listened to streamed music from spotify and you tube music as well as our collection of high resolution tracks starting with take five by the dave brubeck quartet we immediately noticed that the soundstage was considerably wider and more detailed than what we re typically used to hearing from products in this price range some of the percussion instruments sounded crisp and well defined although the deeper elements in the middle of the track the double bass in particular was bit soft and not quite as distinct as we have liked still we found the sound to be detailed and rich on the whole next we listened to bit of indian pop with an unplugged rendition of amar arshi kala chasma apart from some gentle aggression in the low end we also quite liked the inoffensive nature of the mids and highs as demonstrated with the familiar vocals of the track the sound of the realme buds wireless is tuned for comfort and near universal appeal and sticks to that brief we heard just about as much detail and clarity as we could have hoped for from pair of wireless earphones that cost less than rs the realme buds wireless as hands free headset for voice calls and results were mixed in some cases we found that voices on the other end of the call were soft and our callers reported too much background noise crow cawing about feet away sounded as if it was coming from right next to us for the person on the other end on other occasions no issues were reported so call quality seems to be largely dependent on your surroundings and possibly the strength of your cellular signal verdict more expensive pairs of earphones such as the one plus bullets wireless and more stylish dual dynamic driver might offer much more by way of sound quality but the realme buds wireless does capable job for just rs this is product worth considering simply because it is everything you need for the price this headset is built well has decent battery life and is very comfortable to wear the only significant problem for us was the magnetic power switch which often led to the earphones automatically powering on at awkward times that aside the realme buds wireless is pair of earphones that does exactly what it supposed to no more and no less with unwavering consistency and we like it for that pros looks good light and comfortable detailed rich sound for the price cons magnetic power switch is troublesome inconsistent performance on voice calls ratings out of design comfort audio quality battery life value for money overall go and purchased first of all if you are electronic dance and hip hop genre kind of enthusiast than your search for good quality earphone still continues it not like these earphones are worthless for these genres and cannot be listened on these surely you can listen and enjoy it but you just could not get the vibes you get while listening those on deep base earphones from my music listening experience from years can tell you that the depth and that vibrating surround base effect is not in this it surely has some thumpy bass which is required for perfect balance in every genre but due to lack of that deep base you will definitely regret your purchase if you re hip hop edm lover the mid tones of music are little low in this earphone which also ruins little the experience of these genre song listening experience this wanna makes me think everytime is alan walker really tuned this for trap hard dance genre it good but not the best can tell you such differences because am also using wired earphone namely mi earphones pro rs which is excellent and produces very great sound for every genre and definitely have that deep base effect rather than for those genre song these earphones are really good for every other genres if you re fine with the above listed drawbacks then only head towards the detailed review upsides the material quality is good its plastic but feels like soft silicon layer is applied over its top layer both on the neckband as well as the wires of the earplugs these are extremely lightweight and doesn feels like extra load on your neck at all noise cancellation is really very good really impressed mic quality is also the best that can be offered in range no complaints the earplugs fit is good but advice you to remove those removable angular paddings for more snug fit and comfort is fine but could be more better as my wired one are really more comfortable and if you have also experienced something more comfortable than this then you can also complain about it comfort for long use the blutooth range is really good still works if rooms are in between the magnetic on off control is like cherry on cake and works like charm when you seperate them it takes seconds to connect with your phone if already paired before and if phones bt is on and if you attach them together they go to standby mode and goes off if not opened again within minutes it really good that you re getting this magneticfunction in this price sound can go really loud but prefer to use it on micro usb cable pair of extra eartips small large are provided in box medium is pre applied and is perfect nearly for everyone battery backup is good expect hours of continuos playback on volume charging speed is also good you can easily get hour of playback on minutes of charge and can fully charge it around minutes if fully empty did not get to experience its splash retention property downsides the outer cover of earphones are of plastic good quality but they would have given aluminium frame in this price the wires should also be given as braided one for rough and long use no realme branding permanent anywhere on the earphone confuses us but there tag attached on the neckband the cap on the charging port should have given to prevent dust from entering small carry case or pouch should have been given to make it travel friendly when connected to the device when there is an incoming call it doesn recites the number of caller and it sometimes doesn notifies at all but no major con is there sound quality the vocals are really amazing now definitely understand the lyrics of pop songs the lows and highs of the songs are really great but mids are little supressed and you would definitely miss that in edm and hip hop songs as that evary low details are not required in dance songs the mids highs are more important the base is adequate and keeps the song alive but not produces that well deep and surround base that youngster love but it definitely has that amount of base required in any song to feel it also younster and fine with it as ve bought it as secondary earphone for watching movies and series on tv silently without disturbing my family so this fulfills my purpose the beat and sound produced feels natural and clear like high quality headphones and in this respect alan walker and realme team had surely done great work based on types of music lovers would recommend this to pop indie pop acoustic rock and soft rock trap hard dance nearly all kinds of genres except edm and hip hop as ve bought it as secondary earphone so do not had any great expectations and can surely say that it exceeded my expectations and very happy with my purchase please read the whole review it will surely help you decide more clearly have good purchasing experience thakyou for recently purchased the kodak tv from amazon and overall my experience has been satisfactory the picture quality is good and the streaming capabilities are convenient the user interface is easy to navigate although it did take me little bit of time to get used to it however do have few issues with the tv the sound quality is not the best and have noticed some lag when switching between apps these issues do not significantly impact my viewing experience but they are worth mentioning despite these issues would still give the kodak tv stars out of it is decent tv for the price but there are certainly better options out there was offered an additional months of warranty if wrote review but am not particularly interested in extending the warranty at this time it is not appropriate or ethical to write false or misleading review in exchange for incentives such as an extended warranty or other perks doing so goes against amazon guidelines and can lead to consequences for both the customer and the company it is important to be honest and transparent in your reviews and to only write about your genuine experiences with product this helps other customers make informed decisions about their purchases and ensures that the review system remains fair and trustworthy if you are not satisfied with the kodak tv or do not feel comfortable giving it high rating it is perfectly okay to give it lower rating or to not write review at all it is always better to be honest and genuine in your reviews rather than attempting to manipulate the system for personal gain issues with chrome casting did not believe such good feature would be available at this price liked the feature of supporting the ethernet port and earphone jack kodak tv for the amount being charged this is acceptable tv the kodak xpro model is same as thomson series despite being big this was lighter than my previous bravia tv and easily mounted to the previous wall mount note the wall mount holes are plasticky and dont have any metal insert the remote sensor is separate module projecting from the underside of the tv and does not look integrated with the main body the two usb ports are side by side which dont interfere with each other the audio out port is good feature if one wants to watch tv without disturbing others when first connected the tv to my set top box over hdmi there was only picture and no sound the person at the service center whose number is listed on the tv warranty card said that they dont support this and need to call the tv manufacturer so much for printing service center number on warranty card this was fixed after changing the hdmi cec settings in the set top box not tv fault there is no user manual given with the tv most people based on their experience with phone should be able to ultimately figure out the connections the only included leaflet book whose pages were all stuck together talks about the android menu there is no info on the tv input jacks like what the hdmi arc stands for got multiple calls after the purchase to enquire about delivery and if needed installation as already had previous wall mount on which this could get attached with no hassles opted out of installation service all is welllll good tv picture quality is very good

recieved damaged product the first time the seller is very good and quickly replaced it for new one go for bassheads if you are spending this much they are charging more for the metal enclosure and the braided cable the angled jack is plus but the sound quality is so so infinity zip and their own bassheads are way better for sound would like to start by saying not an audiophile therefore my review will be less about the audio quality of the product and more about the over all experience regarding the product first off this is my second time buying the product and you guessed it it good enough that will buy it third time if need be upon unboxing we are greeted by the presence of pair of extra ear buds there is also pair of ear fins in the packet containing the extra ear buds these ear fins are used to keep the ear buds snugly in your ears during strenuous periods of use where there is chance of lots of movement more on this later coming to the ear phones itself it among the very few ear phones that genuinely feels premium in hand it is very durable specially the plug part that connects to your phone many time my ear phones stop working because the plug part malfunctions and causes problems in the functioning of the ear phones this is not the case with these the wire itself is made of rubber silicon it feels good in hand and the only thing can think of that could be improved here is to braid the wire but so far the wire hasn showed any form of wear and tear common with most other ear phone wires another thing to emphasize is that the entire cable is flat through out this genuinely decreases the number of instances where find myself trying to untangle the wire this is truly one of the best features of this pair of earphones remember said something about the ear phones being made completely of metal well it continues to the mic and the left and right splitter both these pieces feel very premium because of the signature cold feeling of metal against skin don know about you but attention to small details like this always brings smiles to my face it is to be noted that the mic piece is universal single button type and hence cannot control volume personally this problem didn affect me much but the might be potential buyers who might find this to be deal breaker mic quality is subject to individual bias therefore can tell you my personal experience in my opinion feel that the quality is average it won blow anyone mind but it will deliver most of the time common complaint heard from most of my callers that they find it difficult to hear me when there is significant amount of back ground noise or wind rustling in to the mic these are common issues even with ear phones price significantly higher than the bo at bass heads finally the most important part of the review the sound quality of the ear phones as said earlier won be going into the technical details am bass lover and that is what led me to buy this pair in the first place in my opinion found that the bass is indeed good but not over powering for the average consumer like how the extra bass versions of the sony line up of earphones trend to be the volume gets sufficiently high and more often than not use it at less than half it total volume when listening to music the clarity of the bo at bass heads are above par and easily betters even ear phones in the inr price category this is one other reason why love this pair so much point to remember as the entire covering of the ear phones is made of metal it is significantly heavier than other ear phones this becomes double edged sword on the one hand the metal makes the ear phones feel very premium but it also makes it significantly heavier than other earphones made of plastic this causes it to easily fall out of your ears if the supplied fins are not used the find unlike the ones find in let say the newer bose ear phones aren as comfortable and can hurt your ears if used over prolonged time last but not the least there are multiple color variants of the bo at bass heads including red black and blue found myself opting for the black variant both the times this may be personal opinion but find it to be the best of the three that said do see most corporate consumers opting for the black as it is neutral color this leaves out the red for reasons unknown the red variant is sold at lower rate on most sites perhaps due to shortage in sales therefore if you are short on cash and just want great pair of ear phones then grab these while they last pros no metal build excellent wire quality and trendy durable above average sound quality cons metal build in the earphones trend to make them heavy and thus falls out of your ear easily supplied fins are uncomfortable to wear over prolonged time supplied clip piece is removable and tends to get lost easily hope everyone who read this found it useful and can make an educated decision to buy or not to buy the bass heads all suggestions are welcome thanking you dwarakesh best quality like boat earphone saund quality only disadvantage noticed was this can be use in usb phones mm jack is provided so it can be usedin jack phones only nice good used this headphone for travel very lite and easy to carry in pocket colourful sound quality is good the wire is thin so feel cautious while taking it from bag or pocket gd one only thing is covers sleeves comes out easily if not gd fit however additional covers sleeves are provided

review overview average the boat today launched the boat xtend the companys latest budget smartwatch with price tag of rs the boat xtend smartwatch comes with stylish design resembling the apple watch moreover it has built in amazon alexa support sp tracking stress tracking and much more coming in budget segment is it worth it should you buy this smartwatch if you too have such queries then there is nothing to worry about it is detailed review of boat xtend smartwatch which will clear all your doubts about it contents box content design build comfort display watch ui and features alexa support watch faces boat wave app accuracy battery final words buy now box content boat xtend box content smartwatch in black gold colour charging clip user manual and warranty card design build comfort when buying smartwatch one always thinks about its design and look apart from features design and build is another major aspect one should take care of when buying smartwatch the boat has worked on its design this time which brings it to premium side in terms of look the design is inspired by the apple watch but it cannot be compared to that obviously in every aspect apple watch would be much better than the boat xtend smartwatch redmi watch as well as amazfit bip pro has the same shape and design but the build quality is much premium on this one boat xtend design and build personally dont like the color scheme of this boat xtend smartwatch the black color variant comes with golden color metallic frame believe the gold color would fade away after some time there are three other color variants which also dont look stylish as this one however that is my personal opinion on the color scheme so maybe you might find the color scheme to be good boat xtend design the watch has atm water resistance it has silicon straps which are quite comfortable the straps are good quality straps which you will find comfortable with regular usage display coming to the display the watch has mm square shape display what you see on this one is tft panel the screen has big bezels however the good part is that the screen goes completely back when it is off so you wont notice the bezels and the screen quality wont feel cheap at all it doesnt have an always on display but we cannot complain about that the watch offers screen on time of up to seconds and up to levels of brightness control boat xtend display quality find the display quality of the boat xtend smartwatch to be better than the previous smartwatch from boat view angle is good on this one and you can clearly see content on this smartwatch even in the sunlight the color on this one is not very saturated but this isnt something that we can complain about in this price range watch ui and features the ui of this smartwatch is clean and easy to use there is single button on the watch which works as the power off button as well as the back button moreover the display is touchscreen display that works without any problem there isnt much animation on the bar menu and the navigation is simple so you wont find it difficult to use however the watch may lag bit the company has done cost cutting in terms of the processor thats why you may find it to lag bit but it is ok and not big deal at the price point you get it boat xtend ui the watch offers all the basic fitness features such as daily activity which includes total steps walked calories burnt and time heart rate sleep tracking stress tracking breath training sp training meditation find my phone and music control apart from that there are different support modes on this watch tried few of them and they worked fine the watch notifies you of the incoming calls messages received and various other notifications in detail boat xtend smartwatch review alexa support the main highlight of the boat xtend is the amazon alexa support the watch has an in built microphone and you can access it by long pressing the back button do note that you can only do some basic tasks with alexa on the watch like setting an alarm setting timer and such well it is good thing to have alexa on watch but you wont find it very useful probably you will use it for day or two out of excitement and then you wont prefer using it because it only does some basic tasks so even if boat missed this feature it wont be problem boat xtend alexa support watch faces the next cool thing about this boat smartwatch is the watch faces you get on this one you get more than watch faces on the watch and probably more watch faces will be added to it moreover you can also set custom watch face as well boat xtend watch faces boat wave app you will have to download the boat wave app to use the watch the app is available for both android as well as os devices you wont be seeing bugs on the app and it works perfectly havent noticed any problem with connectivity like frequent disconnection the interface of the boat wave is clean and simple you will get all the fitness related options and all the watch settings on the app itself boat xtend boat wave app accuracy accuracy is one of the important aspects that one should take care of when buying smartwatch so talking about the accuracy tested everything on this watch from normal walking to running sleeping and much more and find the results to be accurate boat xtend accuracy test compared to realme or redmi watch the result was the same on all of them so there is no problem with the accuracy dont find the results to be accurate on most of the budget fitness trackers but yes this smartwatch is accurate in terms of fitness tracking sleep tracking and everything it does boat xtend accuracy comparing it to the noise watch which we tried recently the stress level as well as the sp tracking is much more accurate on this one it also has the option to track the menstrual cycle in women boat xtend accuracy battery you get to see ah battery on this one which the company claims to last days however if you use most of the features of the watch then the battery will last about two and half days if you keep the brightness low then the battery will last about days find the battery life to be downside of the watch it comes with magnet hook charging support final words boat xtend smartwatch is decent smartwatch from the boat it offers all the basic fitness features you will find on budget fitness tracker good display alexa support good design and build and much more the smartwatch at this price is quite good personally what didnt like about this smartwatch is its color scheme however if you like the color scheme then would recommend you to go for it overall the watch is good with nothing to dislike about it except for the battery life the battery life on this one is quite low the company claims it to have battery life of days but with regular usage it will last for days if you are looking for good smartwatch under rs and you can adjust with the battery life and you like the color scheme then would recommend you to go for this smartwatch it offers all the features that should be there in smartwatch under rs pros premium build quality with matte finishing sturdy polycarbonate frame good soft silicone straps that absolutely flush with the body of the watch attractive trendy colours heart rate except heart rate spikes in weight training pedometer steps counter are accurate but spo is off by when compared to pulse oximeter readings but most smart watches offer the same accuracy sleep tracking is accurate only for bed time wake up time duration but stages of sleep are inaccurate light deep sleep waking detected but no rem sleep detected sleep data from the watch synchronises smoothly with boat wave app issues warning msg if watch not worn on hand properly and does not detect data of surfaces large clear bright sharp lcd ips display even in the sun touch not smooth experienced jitters ui also lags at times after attaching the tempered glass sometimes some functions require taps to work but acceptable scrolling response if finger moved diagonally instead of vertically in app gps works superbly excellent route tracking on the map this feature is not advertised in their description bluetooth connectivity is good if mobile is kept in close proximity the boat wave app must remain running in the background at all times definitely splash proof though did nt take the risk of submerging the watch all notifications are working no problem with call alerts or sms msgs or social media app notifications no lags at all though there is provision for sec lag which can be turned on alexa works superbly but since there is no speaker info is displayed on the screen my wipro smart bulb fire tv stick can be controlled easily using the inbuilt alexa on the watch alexa can do mathematical calculations currency conversions even foreign language translations apart from supplying info on anything under the sun but ofcourse alexa cannot make calls alexa can set alarm timer also sedentary alert drinking water reminder stress alert menstrual cycle alert alarms timers function well boat wave app connects easily no lags observed data syncs smoothly with google fit app excellent health reports and motivational rewards system in the form of badges but settings can be changed only through the app and the watch needs to be restarted for the new settings to be effective training sports modes good guided breathing mode is also good find my phone works well extremely stylish light weight comfortable for all day wear watch faces available in the device with preset which cannot be deleted the rest can be changed from the boat wave app cons lacks vibration intensity control lacks camera control shutter but can figure out its use as my handset accepts both voice commands gestures to click pics no quick reply messages for notifications call alerts no call acceptance or silencing feature work around can be if bluetooth handset is connected at the same time spo is not accurate and sometimes freezes at but this is common in all smart watches battery does nt last more than days if continuous hr measurement is turned on otherwise easily lasts for days watch faces are very childish expected better quality designs company can easily improve on this in their next update amazon prime only replacement no refund policy is not good at least colour change should be allowed once music control feature does not display the title of the song no bp monitoring or temperature monitoring feature smart watches usually do not provide reliable bp data no calling feature but it does nt matter as most don want conversations to be public bit large for narrow wrists band mm is bit wide company should provide tempered glass protector no mention of protective glass on the display mentioned have attached scot tempered glass purchased separately there are actually only sports modes boat has bloated the list with indoor outdoor combi of sports walking running swimming cycling there is no light sensor auto brightness is only time dependant but works well was wedding anniversary gift for my wife who liked it very much even the colour the evergreen classic gold black san disk tb extreme pro portable ssd mb winitially set up the disk with inbuilt san disk software the speed was pathetic and after some debugging found culprit in ex fat default format reformatted to apfs encrypted for similar secure features without comprising features surprised to see drastic jump in performance ex fat gb write failed after mins apfs encrypted gb less than mins pros portable secure sturdy speed large volume cons default software and filesystem will deliver speed in range to mbps on mbp as thunderbolt will only function as gbps usb mode instead of gbps usb good sandisk is always excellent though this review is about sandisk extreme which functions excellently it is painful to note that this cannot be used in my ipad pro costing more than lac rupees whereas this responsed to my samsung tab of rs without any aid of computer or pc flawlessly shame on apple am using this device for the past month and the read and write speed is mind blowing especially liked it portability as well as it is easy to carry and you can use this device on the even on your mobile or laptop it waterproof as well rugged use this device for my daily use thank you san disk for making this device had it been up to rs the middle family would have been able to buy it easily speed is very fast but it corrupts video file when download video files direct into this drive from internet files get corrupt perfect travel partner with taking no space at all in my bag

seller cloudtail india private limited price price can drop as low as delivery one day prime bangalore package big carton box with air pack no damage recommended yes returnable yesroom heaters which one do you need before my review will let you know which one should you buy an oil heater is best that you can buy but that is worth spending for places where the weather will be colder for more than months and well below deg for normal winter uses recommend buying convection type heaters with fan and thermostat please avoid conduction based ones they can consume less power cheap but they are very slow plus burns oxygen also note whichever you buy make sure it has thermostat setting product review this product from usha is convection type room heater and have listed the below features and information twin blade fan thermostat built in like ac will turn on off as per temp changes operation means faster heating fan only mode for normal table fan type can adjust speed on off power led when it operates fan noise is high and bit annoying if your room is very calm power plug and cord length retracting stand to elevate height about inches year warranty for the product the room heater uses powerful fan to spread the heat no swing option very directional you must position it correctly and securely the thermostat option is good to have and suggest buyers to buy with thermostat as this will help reduce your eb bills as well as give comfortable weather inside the thermostat is not very accurate like in air conditioners but works the user manual gives clear information about using it how to set up power on select the switch is not easy to operate set to thermostat switch to max anti clockwise let the heater run till you feel comfortable warm inside reduce the thermostat slowly till the point where the unit turns off leave that setting undisturbed and let the heater on till morning note if you have mistakenly set it wrongly turn off and turn on once again follow the same step above use this for my sleeping room which is about size in bangalore it is about deg at night and can drop low in another few weeks and it took about minutes to bring it deg with in almost closed room please note if your place has room temperature not outside temp well below and it not exposed to sunlight then it will take long time to reach comfortable temperature in such cases only use setting it does not burn oxygen but reduces relative humidity which can cause dryness so keeping bucket or better tray of water will help but you must keep your window slightly open never use it on closed room or see this as main problem as in many of our houses we only have for washing machines and ac socket which is not easily reachable this unit can only be plugged into socket the reason is when you operate unit with socket you can only draw maximum of watts from that socket however since this unit operates also at it requires as that could only provide up to like acs etc however you can safely use this unit from normal socket only if you are using at always just buy to converter socket and use this do not worry it will work just fine but never use though if you house has mcb tripper then it much safe tips always keep some space from all sides of the heater unit first try with fan unit for minutes before using for heater using after long storage keep window slightly open for fresh air air can feel dry after sometime can cause nose irritation and dryness room must be ventilated adding water tray can help drawbacks fan noise sometimes unbearable in calm room average build quality and finishing final words recommend this product cheap and effective unit for small to medium size rooms and it does not burn oxygen but makes dry air which can easily be overcome the prices could drop around sometimes so please check price before buying thanks for reading this if you have any doubts comment below on first day had faced some minor problem in this product but day after that day till now it working with no minor and major issues am happy on this product good purchased this usha heater which got delivered to me on th dec we use it moderately for just hrs in day it was working fine for days however on th day on jan night after around half an hour of running it suddenly started making khad khad khad sound and all its coil were red hot since we were awake just switched off the power from main switch it could have resulted into burning or fire if would have delayed for few more seconds when picked up the heater in hand it looked some part was loosened inside then on the next day on th jan lodged complaint with usha customer care na di was told the technician will visit within hrs however no one came in hrs so called up the technician on the number shared to me by usha on th after that technician visited me upon checking he found that out of fans one fan has loosened completely and fallen inside that is why it was making sound and coils were getting too much heated was relaxed that it not big problem and would be fixed quickly but to my surprise the plastic coupler to which the fan was screwed is not able to hold the screw tightly there was problem with the coupler what kind of quality it is that within few days of usage screw automatically loosenrd and coupler not able to hold it anymore adding to my surprise the technician was not having the new coupler for replacement he said he will check tomorrow and come back of part is available but he didn came back when called next day he said part is not available and has informed the company but can say when it will be available so called usha customer care again and they said yes techinician has reported part is not available na dwe are forwarding your request to service team to arrange the part asap since then have been calling usha customer care as well techinician everyday and both are throwing the ball on each other usha customer care is worst saying everytime that they are forwarding the request to concerned department and as soon as the part is available it will be replaced asked them how many days it may take as can keep on waiting for month they just said they can say when it would be available since it is too cold nowadays and heater is not working what is the use of purchasing this usha heater if they will replace it after month winter would have already passed by then this is worst after sale service from big brand like usha and it was not expected from usha if they don have the basic parts available with the service center what is the use of sending technician empty handed from now on will never recommend usha to anyone and if any usha representative is reading this post request to them to service my heater asap thanks go ahead the cord is very short and required amp plug point it eats up available oxygen in closed room using since one year found fit for house use

so got this keybaord few days ago and it came in package that can be best described as being mauled by bear it was totally beaten up and inside the batteries of the keyboard ha come loose alsothough could just pop it back in no problem thankfully it works fine tested all the keys and they are functional so let get to the meat of the subject or paneer if you re vegetarian think this keyboard performance will vary according to your use case for me the primary objective was to get an android compatable keybaord since had shifted the majority of my wokrload from my laptop to my tablet checked the internet and settled on this little guy becaue of teh glowing reviews and from my friend who had the ink variant of the keyboard bought it along with the logitech pebble wireless mouse since it came in bundle and honestly don regret it both of them fir very well into my work type and they ve made my life lot more easier this is of course bluetooth keyboard and it does not have any wireless dongles hidden away in the chasse checked the keyboard has no backlighting as expected from wireless eyboard that runs on regular pen torch batteries and from my friends experience this battery will last you long time the major feature of this wireless keyboard over the other brands in teh market is the ability to switch between bluetooth capable devices with the press of button now personally thought that wouldn be using this feature all that much since was plaaning on using this keyboard for my android tablet but then realised that could set up my laptop as second device and switch between my tablet and laptop without any issues making it easier to type out papers on my laptop and responding to texts emails on my android tablet at the same time nowadays can stop using this feature since have my phone tablet and laptop paired to this keybaord and my productivity has become much more efficent it is honestly very neat the keys are rounded which is much more pleasant to type on than let say square keys and the slight inclination of the keyboard serves as good angle that reduces finger fatigue while typing this comes with no wrist rest so people who have had hand injuries should either look for another keyboard or buy the wrist rest seperately teh keys are membrane keys and they feel bit stiff in my honest opinion but nonetheless it has good feedback and the typing experience is very comfortable it does not have number pad as you migth have seen from the product images so if you are someone that crunches lot of numbers ine excel you might want to skip this keyboard the latency is quite low from my perspective don think they have that crispy logitech lightspeed tech built into it though but you won be using this for gaming and if you are planning to then please don this keyboard performs horribly in gaming and mean it terrible this is keybaord targeted at people who do lot of typing across multiple devices and it is built with portability in mind if am ambitious enough can probably stuff this keyboard into my pocket because of how small it is like my friends say have small hands well this keyboard was probably designed for rat because my hands are huge compared to this keybaord sometimes while am resting my hand on the homerow my ring finger accidentally presses one of teh mushy media buttons at the top and everything am doing goes into stasis but that is more of me problem than problem with this keyboard it does come with arrow keys which is very surprising they actually managed to squeeze it in mean that pretty much it for this keybaord don buy it for rs suggest waiting for discount because this thing is certainly not worth that much would say this is like rs keyboard but that just my opinion if you are buying this for the android experience then suggets buying it bunded with the mouse because both of them kind of complete each other with that being said going to conclude my review mouse came turned on apart from that no issues discovered till now it going good its one of the best budget keyboards have ever used the membrane keys are very soft and easy to click not lift off weight easy on the fingers its been around yr since bought this keyboard and iam using it ever since no issues so far and iam highly satisfied with my purchase definitely gonna recommend it very good typing experience so far caps lock indicator height isn adjustable no backlight the key travel is very very less please keep that in mind otherwise decent product at the price range bought this in combination with logitech pebble bluetooth mouse for the sole purpose of using it with my pad it has made my tasks easier and with recent pad os updates there are tons of shortcuts that make pad experience more productive since was going for retro looking device chose sand color makes me nostalgic about the old school computer devices that had similar finish connectivity is fast you just switch it on and it connected to your primary device in matter of seconds even less they keys are not silent but at the same time not loud enough to disturb your environment you can connect upto devices and switch between them seamlessly with the push of button also using the setup for gaming will maybe update later about that experience final comments ergonomic economic portable and lovely recommend buy for all who need to get work done fast this keyboard is awesome it has flawless connectivity and great size for portability just that it is not fitted with lift at the back and miss the backlight design but it is value for money product works flawlessly with mac as well as windows

somehow amazon sucks when you want to select an electric kettle there are no options to filter your choices based on the parameters that matter it is easy to fall into the trap of an ongoing deal and end up buying something that falls short of what you need in this review will answer your questions about the pigeon amaze plus electric kettle can trust the reviews for this ad are they genuine probably yes but know that the seller lists several types of pigeon kettles in the same ad unless the review refers to this particular model you could well end up seeing review of product and buying different one the ratings are also an aggregated mix there could be negative review of the product you are seeing and positives for the other products the page will show you neutral review that the game sellers are playing these days to avoid negative reviews have posted picture of the stove am referring to in this review wattage important because this tells how quickly the water will heat up this one is meaning that you can switch it on brush your teeth and find the water is boiled great time saving my earlier one was and it used to take minutes of patient waiting the gas stove boiled water faster this one takes about mins to heat mugs of coffee cable length most of these kettle makers skimp on the cable length have purchased kettles to find they have only foot long cable and had to return them this one has cable length of slightly more than one meter which is allows comfortable distance between the kettle and the plug connector this one uses plug which is most common in india technical specifications here the technical information of boat bass heads in ear headphones the information provided below is as per the manufacturer boat bass heads have frequency range of hz to hz it features mm drivers rated impedance of ohms comes with meter flat tangle free cable mm gold plated shaped audio jack degrees sensitivity built quality design was not expecting metal built at this price range but to my surprise boat bass heads are fully made up of metal it has diagonal grid like texture on the buds which feels amazing on touch the metal construction gives boat bass heads premium feel attractive appearance the cable used by boat on bass heads is flat with rubberized coating it is tangle free cable does it job well by decreasing the chances of the cable tangling despite the metal construction boat bass heads are very lightweight comes with microphone shaped mm audio jack which is again made up of metal overall the built quality is excellent for the price seems very durable the ear buds have proper labels and are clearly visible boat bass heads comes with medium sized silicone tips already installed out of the box audio quality to ensure that can test the bass heads at their uppermost limit used high quality mp files of kbps lossless audio formats like flac wav for smartphone listening used poweramp music player tweaked settings every now and then to see their extreme capability for the computer used tunes player vlc audio player also tested these earphones on apple pod phone sony mp player all this went for more than days finally had my results boat bass heads promised what they claimed they really are very bassy as compared to others during my tests with them found that the audio quality is very good for the price the bass output is amazing and overpowers the vocals by default by tweaking the equalizer settings bit saw good level of improvement in the vocals they were clearer than before but overall average the treble was again very good the high frequency sounds were clear pleasant to ears the mids were average but overall the audio experience on boat bass heads was decent when listening to music the overall sound quality is amazing you can easily distinguish between different instruments sounds which is good thing for extra bassy headphones noise isolation comfort when it comes to noise isolation boat bass heads are very good at it they come with medium sized ear tip pre installed which seemed perfect for my ears once the earphones are on wasn able to hear outside noise they sealed my ears completely delivered an immersive experience make sure that you have the right pair of ear tips on for better noise isolation comfort overall boat bass heads are comfortable but they seem bit stiff somewhat awkward when used for longer periods since the housing is made up of metal you may find them popping out every now then when used during running jogging or any other sport or physical activity this didn happen as often for me but for friend they keep popping out every now then while running maybe the shape of ears has something to do with it an easy solution to this will be using the ear hooks which came along with it when using bass heads with ear hooks they were bit uncomfortable initially but as got used to them they were fine plus this stopped popping issue since the hooks keep hold on them flat cable microphone the cable is great personally prefer flat cables and this earphone come with perfect flat cable which is tangle free comes with rubberized coating the cable does its job well the microphone is again exceptionally good it records voice with clarity with less to no disturbance or background noise during calls the person on the other end can clearly hear the voice with no background disturbance there is one button on the microphone which helps to pick up reject calls on the go without taking your phone out it can also be used to control music which is again good to see in budget friendly earphone like boat bass heads warranty price boat bass heads comes with standard one year warranty so make sure you keep the purchase invoice safe in case you need it for warranty final thoughts ve personally used boat bass heads in ear headphones for more than two weeks average daily two hours of listening before writing this review and pretty much impressed with them personally fan of extra bass iem and currently my primary iem is sony mdr xb ap which again falls under extra bass category comparing sony mdr xb ap with boat bass heads will be unfair since there is big price difference between both of them but would still like to add that bass heads did great job and didn disappoint me obviously it doesn stand chance in front of sony mdr xb ap but still looking at the price of bass heads the quality they offer was really very impressed boat bass heads turned out to be exceptional earphones after testing them for more than two weeks with different devices music players can say that they re amazing for the price pure steal deal the bass output is amazing and is very intense ll recommend using correct size ear tips good quality music player like poweramp android for better bass output the treble is good vocals are average somewhere feel that bass overpowers the vocals but by tweaking the equalizer bit you can achieve better results the mids are again average my rating out of the verdict taking everything into account overall very impressed with boat bass heads the built quality is amazing the performance is exceptionally good with powerful bass good overall soundstage tweaking the equalizer bit can bring drastic improvements to other areas like vocals mids highs overall the vocal highs are good mids are average but still good for the price ll recommend these iem to bass lovers budget conscious people who are looking for high quality durable earphones at reasonable price genres like edm rock hip hop sound really great on them boat bass the camera is good phone is quite respponsive fast charging there are some niggling software issues and do not forget password pin there is no way you will be able to get it back to factory settings this is my second iqoo pro and my humble advice to all the users and purchasers out there is that please do not update your device to the latest software version doing so will definitely cause serious overnight battery drain issues speak from my experience my first iqoo pro gb is updated to the latest august security patch update and drains battery at the rate of percentage overnight for no specific reason the idle drain is very pronounced however my second iqoo pro which purchased is still running on the original software version and has excellent battery back up with negligible idle battery drain so think it best not to update till iqoo rolls out better update resolving the battery drain issue above average performance no heating issue fastest fingerprint reader face unloak good battery life ok camera quality light weight comfortable on hand all the features of this mobile was good no doubtly anyone can buy this but nor for games withinh the budget only it was available for me dual tone flash light is not working think it only single led light two things missing pin hole camera earphones jack overall camera excellent but battery life not good maximum hours as this price limit its good mobile with camera battery screen quality

the earphones have good clear sound quality it lacks base battery backup is good anc is myth in this earphone it might hurt your ear if you wear it for longer duration depending on the shape of your ear eat easily fit in ears and light weight and sound quality is good too over all its worth to by this samsung buds ita connects well to the samsung mobile too bought this solely due to its form factor to try how samsung has made them to sound in this open bud style to be true samsung has managed excellently to give us an unique tws this is not an inear style tws but resembles somewhat earbud style tws only of its kind in the market as far as my knowledge goes they are held very good in my ears gives me good seal and does not fall out strange as can use earbuds because they fall out frequently it seems that samsung has finalised the shape after good homework however it doesn mean that it will fit everybody as there are many dissatisfied users around the globe the finish build and all such generic factors are top notch the size of the buds and the case is very small now about the sound if the buds fit in one ears with good seal the sound is full bodied but if the seal is not perfect it may be tinny the sound signature is very bassy for my taste and have to eq it to my taste the bass is so pounding that sometimes it becomes difficult to get taste of the treble listen it in treble boost mode adjusted through the app anc works strangely and noise reduction is not very decipherable in contrary anc on somewhat opens up the sound don buy this for anc strangely to me these buds sound better on my phone mini than my galaxy spotify and apple music the buds have app support for both android galaxy wear and os galaxy buds live but the android app is more feature packed and works better the os app couldn update the firmware although there is menu in the app and always showed the device to be on latest firmware however as soon as connected with my on pairing the first thing it did was to update the firmware love these buds solely for their form factor and they are pretty good for against an mrp of the do sound very good but does not suit my taste persons loving bass may love them don get them for anc battery consumption not yet fully tested but seems ok it has wireless charging too if your ears are too small or too large than normal better not to buy as they may either not go in the ears or will fit loose giving improper seal best call quality noise cancelling could have been improved to best but still wotks good descent battery life music is good not to that top notch but good in this segment overall worth for buying with good call quality very little to compromise but good am using this for like months it is good and productive if you are in the samsung ecosystem if you are not part then do not buy it its not worth its price bluetooth range is not that good the sound quality is extremely good for tws and the sound signature is almost flat got these for rs it almost felt like steal deal for me until faced one cardinal flaw in the design of these buds the bluetooth antenna has an absymal performance it feels like am using bluetooth the range is so poor that even if you put the phone in the pocket the audio starts stuttering the mic quality is hit or miss inside the house it works very well but outside it performs poorly think it has more to do with poor antenna design than the microphone quality if you are thinking that maybe the faulty product is an exception then do google search about its range issue and you will find hundreds of people complaining about the same thing samsung has poorly implemented the design and is reluctant to admit its fault pity those who bought it at around for such flawed product even at rs it is not worth it because of the range issue it is better to buy wired iem atleast it will sound better than this in this price samsung brand is good easy to wear and good battery backup hardly support the meter bluetooth connectivity
