the mi earphones sound great for the price the cable is covered in kevlar fiber the mi earphones are priced at rs xiaomi has garnered well deserved reputation for producing high quality smartphones with powerful specifications at affordable prices the same applies to the company diverse range of accessories as well these are priced quite competitively and usually provide tremendous value for money xiaomi recently launched two new pairs of budget earphones in the form of the mi earphones basic and mi earphones and we have the latter for today with three button inline remote and mic kevlar fiber cable metal sound chambers and right angled plug the mi earphones seem pretty promising on paper we have put this pair through our tests to see whether that promise actually translates into real world performance xiaomi mi earphones design and comfort as expected from pair of earphones in this price range the mi earphones are made entirely out of plastic that said the build quality is actually quite impressive with high quality tpe surrounds near the mm plug and earpieces the box is as basic as it gets there is no case and no extras to be found inside just the earphones short and sweet user guide and two extra sets of tips large and extra small the cable though is far from ordinary it is braided in kevlar fibre which not only prevents tangling but also looks and feels premium the box is as basic as it gets there is no case and no extras to be found inside just the earphones short and sweet user guide and two extra sets of tips large and extra small the cable though is far from ordinary it is braided in kevlar fibre which not only prevents tangling but also looks and feels premium search homeaudioaudio reviewsxiaomi mi earphones review advertisement by shobhit varma updated april isthighlightsthe mi earphones sound great for the price the cable is covered in kevlar fiber the mi earphones are priced at rs xiaomi mi earphones review subscribe xiaomi has garnered well deserved reputation for producing high quality smartphones with powerful specifications at affordable prices the same applies to the company diverse range of accessories as well these are priced quite competitively and usually provide tremendous value for money xiaomi recently launched two new pairs of budget earphones in the form of the mi earphones basic and mi earphones and we have the latter for today with three button inline remote and mic kevlar fiber cable metal sound chambers and right angled plug the mi earphones seem pretty promising on paper we have put this pair through our tests to see whether that promise actually translates into real world performance xiaomi mi earphones design and comfort as expected from pair of earphones in this price range the mi earphones are made entirely out of plastic that said the build quality is actually quite impressive with high quality tpe surrounds near the mm plug and earpieces by taboola sponsored links mederma stretch marks therapy cream gm pharmeasy buy now the box is as basic as it gets there is no case and no extras to be found inside just the earphones short and sweet user guide and two extra sets of tips large and extra small the cable though is far from ordinary it is braided in kevlar fibre which not only prevents tangling but also looks and feels premium xiaomi mi earphones inline xiaomi mi earphones inline while the mi earphones look pretty nondescript overall there are few design flourishes such as textured metallic finish at the back of the earphone housings and the aforementioned kevlar fibre cable that stand out promoted in the stores bestseller one plus nord gb ram gb gray ash one plus nord gb ram gb gray ash amazon buy xiaomi mi true wireless bluetooth earphones white xiaomi mi true wireless bluetooth earphones white off amazon buy xiaomi redmi earbuds wireless bluetooth earphones black xiaomi redmi earbuds wireless bluetooth earphones black off amazon buybo at bass heads wired earphones taffy pink bo at bass heads wired earphones taffy pink off amazon buybo at bass heads wired headphone black bo at bass heads wired headphone black off flipkart buy trending poco gb ram gb power black poco gb ram gb power black off flipkart buy at just the earphones weigh next to nothing and are extremely comfortable the housings are ergonomically shaped housings and angled at degrees they do not fall out of the ears easily even during intense activities the silicone tips are nothing to write home about but that is expected considering the price there is three button inline remote with mic located right below the right earpiece which can be used to answer calls control music playback and trigger the voice assistant on your smartphone the buttons themselves are quite mushy and difficult to distinguish between by touch alone xiaomi mi earphones performance xiaomi claim that the mi earphones feature rd generation balanced damping system that creates transparent sound and metal sound chambers created via step process marketing fluff aside how do the earphones really sound simply put surprisingly decent for earphones that cost less than nice dinner for two while most earphones in this price range have over inflated bass that dominates the rest of the frequency range the bass response on the mi earphones is controlled and restrained it doesn overwhelm the sound signature or smother the highs that said bassheads will be left slightly wanting it surprising to hear that highs are present and distinct in the sound mix although they do get overpowering sometimes the mids are slightly repressed which is evident in vocal heavy genres such as blues while the clarity on offer is decent for the price songs with many layers of instrumentation do sound muffled and noisy this is most evident in complex genres such as rock and metal in which the earphones sound harsh and the mids get buried by the treble and bass this earphone set is fantastic and highly deserving of money used it for while last in and now buying it once more in in my perspective the mi headset has good music and is easy to use good good nice product gentle bass no loud sound product quality is decent don expect heavy music experience it sometime uncomfortable but it fine can adjust seriously if you are bass lover then you can go for it but it built quality is not good it will damage automatically after months it is not suitable for rough uses got it for less than rs not disappointted at all if you compare it with other brands like boat the sound quality isn as good as the contemporaries but for the price paid not disappointed at all the bass is solid noise cancellation is average and the earphones are little low on volume could ve been louder good value for money product for earphones under very good product as expected

this is aesthetically the most appealing digital kitchen scale out of the available choices though it is also by far the most expensive it is value for money considering the followig pros functionality it has only two touch buttons which integrate all the functions like units of weight volume multiple tare weigh with overload indication and off on it can give volume idications for water and milk two of the most frequently used liquids while other liquids can be also measured if glass of water is calibrated for certain volume say ml ad same is marked on the glass the plastic food grade bowl fits snugly on the scale and also doubles up as cover when the scale is not in use duraility because of its squat oblong shape and sure footing the scale wont topple also since bowl fits snugly on the scale upside down when the scale is not being used it prevents dust from entering the display and buttons material is tough plastic with recessed top which seats the bowl firmly and there is no exposed space for ingress of any spilt liquid with all this theres one year warranty extendable to two years which speaks about the confidence of the manufacturers in their own design battery life the device has an auto power off and digital display which consumes very less power hence battery is likely to last longer only encountered two cons scale is very sensitive and takes some time to settle the display backlight goes away after some time and the lcd reading is difficult to read in bright ambient light overall this device serves my purpose of practical diet management very efficiently and effectively and am sure it will grow on me recommended if you want to get much more utility and eficiency at slightly higher price litt to adjust all time ok price wise it didn last long

this is my first product from boult wanted wired earphone and when searched on amazon found boult in such low price and ordered it recieved it today checked it by connecting to my phone and was surprised by the audio quality this is nice product in this price range and the mic is also good the build quality is average and you can complain considering the price it also has clip to attach the earphone to your shirt like the good old nokia days it has total pair or ear tips in zipper packet and already attached to the earphone the manufacturing date is march so it quite new actually not an old stock it also has that anti slip ear hook which is an added advantage in general it is good product for this price was looking for reliable bluetooth earbuds on budget and settled on these personally am pleased with them have been using them for almost four months now including one month when they saw around hours of use per day pros comfortable elegant and sober appearance reasonable battery life would let the earbuds recharge at for example mealtimes decent range going few meters into the next room with concrete wall in between was no issue the battery status of the dock is shown by series of led blinks simple and practical cons mediocre phone calling quality in particular the microphone the few conversations had using these went successfully so this was not deal breaker but the clarity was not the best for sure the touch controls were initially drawback for me but got used to them also this product does not come with charger either charge off of your computer or buy charger with the recommended electrical output as for the sound quality it is acceptable not superlative have listened to music and have watched films and you tube videos with no problem as final note prefer this type of earbud over the in ear type because find it more hygienic wiping with clean cloth after each use and leaving the lid of the dock open for some time should help to slow fungal growth very good product nicely fits in the ear and comfortable the volume seems to be little low at the highest but good buy sound quality is good everything is balanced but bass dominance is too high and couldn hear the treble and other notes very good bass quality and worth for money earphones ever buy also product quality is awesome it doesn fit as snugly in my ears maybe it is cause of greasy ears but the product is good highly recommended bolte audio bass is very good

this is my first purchase of scarters product this is good easy to clean deskmat the mouse glides nicely and my keyboard holds the position both are required conditions for my kind of usage it was packed and delivered well in good condition with both sides usable one can use this mat interchangeably feels like premium desk mat compared to the other mats had tried from amazon and the color scheme is also well thought out very easy to clean as well since the surface is kind of slippery and not very soft its been few weeks now hence posting the review this desk spread was available in my budget and looks great so went for it and now while its in use its work as expected went for the yellow and blue one as of this moment am using the yellow side up as its in contrasts with my desk love the feel keeps my desk clean and free from scratches also easy to clean just go for it bhavneetapproved good quality mat initially had to flatten it out properly but once set it is the best looks elegant on the table and does the job well feels good in terms of size bit smelly in the start looks very high quality and elegant proper thickness allows it to use as writing base and also gets back to original shape after prolonged laptop usage overall extremely satisfied very durable and easy to clean and looks great on the desk does fade but overall good mat

this is my third time which purchasing lightning cable though this is my first time iam using amazon basics lightning cable its comparatively looks more durability than other brands normally other brands are worn out with in year and tested product theres no flaw in charging and bending of the cable one of the cheap solution for apple users useful product for those wanting longish cord length reasonable charging speed feels premium the wire quality is good and overall not bad cable would be my very next order if apple cable is too expensive was looking for sturdy and reliable cable for my phone without any compromise on quality to be used in my car for apple car play this cable delivers the quality expected and works like charm stopped working want to claim warranty how it can be done value for money item excellent product

this is review is primarily focused on sound quality the term bass is used losely one doesn expect true bass from such small drivers shorter version boat stone very loud loud and somewhat uneven bass mids are bit supressed somewhat muffled midrange decent treble loud bassy speaker nakamichi speck barely louder than the stone mids clearer than bass much much lower than if looking for vfm rule this one out unless this is on big discount and others aren overall fairly even sound at questionable price and volume boat more bass than expected of tiny speaker but lesser than speck and way lesser than excellent midrange and terble much lounder than what you may expect of speaker amazing speaker in tiny package with insufficent bass longer version have had the for years and many have asked me to order it for them it is an excellent tiny satisfying package the midrange vocals and treble is excellent and matches speakers several times it price if bass is not what you are after you are unlikely to find better package even at much higher price point especially if you care for even sound by even sound mean all relevant frequencies produced fairly well no major suppression or enhancement checked the others as usually hear music on semi pro system and the insufficent bass lower mids bothered me nakamichi used to be japanese company making very high end tape decks in the so the benchmarks were high now it is china based company the raised expectations further as said it is barely louder than the stone it is fairly even sound but not significant enough improvement in bass over the if you don care about the money and want something better than the with even sound this could be it the mids and terble are tiny bit better in the speck also has larger battery giving substantially longer backup and better water protection useful if you use yours in the smallest room of the house the stone is miles ahead in bass and loudness if that is what you care for amongst the your choice is simple the bass is uneven however all three speakers have memberanes in the inner shell acting as passive bass radiators one should not expect much nuance in bass from those if thump is what you care for yes it is certainly there for the size with somewhat uncontrolled bass the midrange is compromised somewhat suppressed and somewhat muffled no it is not major and many mgiht not even really notice it much the transiton between mid and lower mids bass isn great one usually doesn expect as much from such speakers but the boat stone set the bar high very high keep the boat stone at an angle such that the drivers speaker are in the direction of your ears it makes the midrange bit better reduces the bass bit but makes the sound more even tough it is impractical to keep it so it makes the sound lot closer to what desire some extras placement of these speakers makes big difference keep them about away from wall ideally corner for enhanced bass and fuller sound if you look at teardown videos you ll notice that the has much bigger magnets than the others it is heavy speaker like that since it keeps it stable and the rubber on the side helps further it is well designed except the and volume buttons should have been interchanged for intuitive use the can also be placed vertically that too changes the sound lesser bass and possibly bit clearer on the whole reduced bass less intrusion into the mids in such speakers speaker characterics change subtly over odd hours of use often quite prominent in the first hour so do not form an opnion before running them in for about an hour conclusion nakamichi speck more even sound than the other two not at all as loud as expected better waterprof rating bigger battery high priced despite chinese buy if you don care for the money volume and are okay wihtout much bass boat stone it is star excellent even sound however the lack of bass as compared to the others pulls it back if you are on budget or if you don care much for bass especially for lectures documentaries or vocal music this is brilliant have used it for long boat heavy loud lots of bass if you can deal with the somewhat and it is not big unevenness and slightly muffled sound it is good package for my needs added the to my equipment list while keeping the ps this was my way of giving back to the community for the numerous reviews have gained from sound its okay to buy sound is not much loud its below my expectations low price awesome sound battery life should be more so cutting down star but overall good gives feeling of home theatre multiple connectivity is also good loved the product

this machine can easily brew coffee for family of members at time some people asked whether this can be used in cafe the answer is simple no reason is that this isn sophisticated machine like professional commercial grade coffee brewer now my experience with this machine was good and bad thing was that did not get the steam pipe sleeve except that everything was well packed when you buy this machine make sure to rinse the internal passage throw the first water from the machine thoroughly wash the caraffe puck filter and measurement spoon remember to never use dishwash gel or soaps to wash carafe puck or anything such it may ruin the coffee aroma method efficient as per my opinion fill the water in tank no need to measure it as it can be controlled with the selector don run it dry it may damage the heating element or pump switch on the machine after that pour the ground coffee powder inside the filter level it and press it to compress use ratio spoon of coffee powder to spoon of water at output before changing over to drip mode open the steam valve and check if sufficient pressure is built placing carafe under the puck slowly move the selector till europa and quickly back it to steam icon this will let the coffee bloom inside after seconds slowly move the selector upto espresso the decoction should be not too slow or not too runny wait till your desired quantity is reached and quickly change the selector to steam mode take milk in tumbler which is slightly larger than the level of milk place the tumbler under the steam pipe such way that the tip should immerse just slight under milk meniscus slowly open the steam valve located at the side steam it as per your need mix the milk and decoction that it remember to not uncap the top lid after usage as there may still be pressure inside open the steam valve and let all the pressure get released coffee used bombay island espresso grind medium roast use only espresso grind or maybe south indian filter grind don use aeropress or any other grind as it may not produce desired taste personally like this machine for the price it good and build quality is moderate please watch some you tube videos if you are new to coffee machines it very very easy to ruin coffee without proper knowledge you may also watch james hoffmann he is world barista champion and shares tips about coffee fan of espresso every time go to coffee joint tend to order doppio double shot espresso but those prices are way too high if wished to drink cup of espresso twice everyday so ve decided to buy this machine one thing to say the quality and durability depends on the user if you take care the machine would take care of your cup of joe so how do you properly clean this thing is the question raised by many guests after seeing always rinse the drip tray use dish washing liquid with water to clean the carafe do not hit the filter basket to drop the used grounds run water over it forcefully to loosen the grounds this is crucial because dents can affect quality before and after your brewing activities make sure that you clean the internals to do this fill the carafe till the mark with bottled water assemble an empty perma filter switch on and set the strength to max in about minute you can see steaming hot water flow into the carafe check its color if it yellow then rinse and repeat if it is white dry everything and switch it off then either do your coffee brewing or assemble it back and call it day always let the steam out when you froth milk immediately wipe off the residual milk with lint free cloth warning never ever use hard tap water it causes serious lime scaling issues which can greatly affect the taste quality of your coffee it may also cause digestive issues always use soft can water the water must not taste salty or sweet take this seriously please do not post misleading reviews stating that my machine broke the steam knob is the worst part of this machine the machine was used just for days then the steam knob decided to loosen up and fall off called the service center they told me to bring it there the problem is just and cant drive and the service center is far away so removed the rubber casket and fixed the knob directly it comes off but think ll use it only to ease the pressure because always drink it black but this issue makes me reduce startips for using the machine use fine grounded coffee use narasu pb or royal elite bold currently using phalada pure sure organic coffee powder for the best results you must grind the coffee on your own if you can make sure the coffee is fresh mind that using instant coffee powder or using coffee mixed with chicory can lead to disaster both for the machine and your stomach respectively you can also go for lavazza but it makes hole in your wallet deeper than the mariana trench only use good quality bottled can water maintain good cleaning discipline in case you ve used hard tap water immediately do descaling refer your instruction manual always tamp your ground in the filter you must apply about pounds of force this is about kg of force hold the force for about seconds and slowly rotate the tamper before removing it make sure the filter lock is up when doing this as you can see this is real espresso maker it produces crema provided that you use fresh and the correct coffee for me it produced about mm crema for double shot this is good for steam driven machine note that this is steam driven machine you can never get the finish of coffee joints because they use dual boilers powered by thermoblock pumps although the tastes would be similar provided you use the correct beans please look at the pics to see the finish the cirrus clouds like crema was from coffee powder week old the brown and rich crema is from that organic coffee powder ve just bought can you notice the finish being directly proportional to the freshness this applies even to taste the white crema cup tasted bit bitter and left bittery taste in my mouth the brown crema cup tasted like coffee at its best leaving crisp and nutty taste also after did some research came to know that an espresso must have three layers bitter crema sweet middle and nutty acidic bottom you must mix these before drinking to have the best shot if you see the glass picture ve attached you can clearly see those layers overall this is great espresso machine for beginner it makes great espresso and it is economical too as said if you treat the machine well the machine would treat your cup of joe well being coffee enthusiast the product fits in my requirement easy to use time taken is reasonable adjustment of intensity works well frothing tool is very good though prefer black coffee frothing helps getting perfect creamy coffee for my guests nice product the coffee strength nob is myth but itne paise me itna is good very happy with the machine works fine and easy to operate unfortunately it wasn packed very well buy the seller so the plastic spoon that came with the machine was broken everything was packed in the original box with only one tape to secure the box it makes the whole process of making coffee more difficult also was shocked to know this is not covered under amazon return policy my bad didn check and now am stuck with this life is no better after you buy this coffee maker delivered without warranty card instruction manual

totally worth it product is quality is good and beyond expectation in such price range wish company has added other features and some add on in quality and more megapixels to it best buy for students and working professionals but don consider it for buying if you are into content creation and for your organisation my overall rating is out of value for money google meet par chalaya tha photo thik thak aa raha hai used for online examination good product good pic quality image and video call quality improve afterall its hd camera gives better output than laptops original basic camera inbuilt mic quality is nice and noise cancellation working fine paid rs for it on on sep the cam design is streamlined and sophisticated and the plug and play feature is quite useful it was great option at price of in but now there are better options available don fall for good reviews most of them are old be smart you can use the droidcam software to configure your android phone as webcam if you have brief video calls such as an interview or exam lenovo fhd webcam with wide angle vision and stronger mics makes more sense if you want to invest little money spend the money on logitech or if you really want to start live stream or tutorial videos that are more professional you won regret if you already have point and shoot camera or dslr at home get cheap capture card so you can set it up as webcam pros simple plug and play is available the camera offers regular mode and wide angle option the universal clip prevents the robust cam from toppling the green led indicates whether or not the camera is active cons incompatible with bezel less displays the picture and mic quality is poor face recognition is too bad the image will be grainy and noisy seriously no conclusion choose it if there is no better choice available between and it will assist you momentarily you need enough lighting and you shouldn rely on the webcam microphone does the job

update after months of use the tv is still going strong all the good points mentioned in the original review below are still true and very happy with the tv it as if one plus have been listening to their customers after recent firmware updates the issues had mentioned have almost disappeared we can now arrange and move apps you tube netflix as per our wish on the home screen itself am finally able to put you tube first as it is the most used app for my toddler there is no more wifi disconnect issue noted earlier prime video still shows errors sometimes though think that an issue with the app and not the tv strongly recommend this tv original review took leap of faith in purchasing this tv as there were mixed reviews for it however after using it for months the following are my observations good the picture quality is fantastic there is no lag while watching forwarding videos saw youtube review which said its brightness was low compared to other models the brightness is more than you would ever need from tv have never needed to run it on full brightness till now up to works for me for my toddler to watch rhymes set brightness to and even then it is more than needed there were few reviews that said the sound quality was average and you need soundbar disagree have watched movies with up to sound and that is good enough for sqft hall voice command it is quite accurate and am able to change nursery rhymes for my toddler while working in the kitchen which is around feet away being able to control the tv from app is also very useful feature no need to look for remote being able to cast from the app also helps lot it would be even better if everything on phone not just pictures and videos could be cast using the app not so good if the tv goes to sleep screensaver for more than minutes it often gets disconnected from wifi have to restart it againb prime video fails to resume displays error and have to restart the tv againc on the home screen you cannot rearrange apps to have your preferred apps first you can do it in apps window which is useless as you need to navigate to it first easier to navigate to your preferred app in the home screen itself only cons till now got fast moving object looks blurr which was known before buying by other user review but got this tv in ao over all satishfied only minus that too critical is the installation remembering that paid just bucks for these mostly will be using these while my walking and workout sessions so think my mind won be nitpicking then ll soon be upgrading though overall really very thing else is fine best at price and require some button for operation call pick up rejection function next song play function not working on single touch product is good but battery not as expected

update as on the power cord has developed twists beyond repair and the seperate cores are now visible the insulation pvc of the cores doesn look very durable don know why such standard manufacturers can provide decent durable cable the iron however is performing flawlessly still disappointed as in coming weeks ll have to change the cable for sure reducing one star for compromising upon the cable quality by such big brand name how it started the need for an iron recently my previous bajaj make dry iron which received as gift from somewhere started giving problems after two years of occasional use with not so careful handling and care initially its wires insulation inside was found rotten around the iron entry point which repaired myself and later its thermostat started giving problems finally its on indication went off and decided that it was time to bid goodbye to it and find new one hence my search for reputed brand make best value for money device began being from electrical engineering background occupation fairly summed up my expectations from the power device as below dry iron vs steam iron this was fairly simple if we consider the explanation that steam iron could perform as dry iron but vice versa was not possible also almost always you find some or the other stubborn wrinkles and crease distortions that is hard for the dry iron to overcome and you need to use water for the purpose on the contrary as the steam loosens the individual fibres of the clothes the steam iron pressing action smooths out wrinkles hence it was better to be equipped with the facility in the first place in the device itself brand reputation warranty as an average consumer we are not wrong in generally assuming that products of bigger established brands have higher quality and perform better rightfully so brand which has been working with product for decades has plenty of experience research regarding the possible points of failures of the product and can be surely trusted upon following the same footprints thought not to take bets upon power devices like iron and go with the super brands like philips having decades of expertise in this field our product comes with two year global warranty which is quite decent in my opinion steam output steam burst vertical steam feature during normal usage with steam delivery of anything above grams min is okay but some ironing jobs such as curtains or quilts require much more supply of steam in such cases the steam burst feature comes in handy users can push button to receive burst of steam when needed more holes in the sole plate add to the effectiveness of steam supplied vertical steam feature in theory can direct clouds of steam in and around vertically hung garments or curtains which eliminates wrinkles without the need for pressing force however in practical scenario and by virtue of its design and water tank limitations steam iron is virtually incapable of addressing the wrinkles like that and hence paying more for such feature is not advised use dedicated garment steamers for that purpose our philips gc comes with variable setting for steam output with continuous delivery of up to grams min which is quite good additionally it can provide steam burst too for stubborn wrinkles vertical steam feature is not available though electrical related features wattage cord thermostat etc the simple maths that more watts means more heat or more steam or quick heating is not as simple as it looks surely more watts means more heat generated but more wattage limits our ability to plug the iron at any socket in the house as for any power above watts would suggest to only plug in to the power sockets going for more power demands must be backed up with careful examination as to whether you really need that much heating if its normal clothes only that you need to iron most of the times surely more heat developed is capable to deliver more steam but that depends upon the number of holes in your sole plate for it to be really effective your water holding tank size and lastly steam delivery settings generating too much steam without delivery can be dangerous as it can pressurize the system last but not the least more power doesnt always mean quick heating as heating of the sole plate depends upon number of factors like the material thickness of the sole plate surface area of the heating element used inside the soleplate etc most of these intricate details are variable in nature and cannot be specifically mentioned by the manufacturer our product comes with decent watts of power good enough for routine casual use along with occasional use on heavier fabrics comes with volts amp max rating of plug is always extra to actual amperage pin top which can be easily plugged into our casual amp sockets as well without any damage to the socket hence enhanced mobility performance the cord length is around meters which is good enough for any practical lengths any more than that would be cumbersome to handle the cord is braided with an insulated cotton sleeve which is useful for twists as well as insulating during cable damage however in due course of use the cord often develops rigid twists turns beneath the cotton braiding which is hard to straighten out so not so great on the cable quality terms the cable only comes with degrees of swivel movement which is quite disappointing and would have really wished if it was degrees of cord freedom the thermostat knob for temperature selection comes with regular settings but going with reputed brand like philips always assures of good quality of thermostat after all the thermostat is the heart and soul of modern day irons and must be highly durable and reliable lastly our product is an isi marked product which is quite an assurance for sure soleplate material shape this is probably the toughest part where each company claims to have the best and easy gliding soleplates variety of soleplates are available in the market today like non stick teflon coated aluminium plates with american heritage coating steel plates with alloys or ceramic coated each has its pros and cons teflon coated plates are easy to get scratched and gather dirt over period of time american heritage is similar to teflon and glides over the fabric even better stainless steel is the most durable and easy to clean however may stick to clothes on higher settings adds weight to the device metal works better than ceramic for pressing in sharp creases on sleeves and trousers good for smooth gliding and even heat distribution but biggest advantage is to eliminate static charge at high temperatures which may cause clothes to stick when ironing on synthetics and fabrics blended with spandex ceramic iron will suit your needs best as ceramic does not stick to these fabrics but the coating may peel off on rough handling aluminium soleplates heat up quickly but are prone to damage and may stick to clothes our product comes with linished soleplate which is quite inadequate detail as linishing is process of grinding or polishing surface to make it perfect flat however apart from linishing stuff can surely say that the soleplate in our device is decent gliding but not the best gliding its heavy but doesnt stick to the clothes yet for that matter trusted the brand reputation and went ahead with this linished soleplate stay away from teflon coated ones though as its bound to wear off fast regarding the shape honestly wanted it to look like american fighter planes with sharp beak design and dark colors lol however those models with my looks were weak in overall specs so had to settle down with this still decent looking model features like anti drip anti calc grip to tell you the truth these are more of fancy terms rather than actual purpose for most of the users presence of these features isnt problem though as in areas where the water comes hard anti calc may stir and clear the calcium build up if any in the water tank however if you use proper water drain it out timely do not fully fill the tank allow it to heat before using steam follow all procedures correctly you wont actually need to use these features regarding grip many iron nowadays have some unique design which is set ergonomically to give better grip our product comes with the anti calc function and is decent to grip though think not ergonomically still nothing for deal breaker and these are minor features to discuss upon price vs performance even though did not have any preset price tag in my mind but still going over would have definitely felt extreme for thing that dont make use of that much bought it at price of around bucks for all the features and performance it delivers think it is worth it final verdict all in all would just say that even though our product might not have the best appealing looks or the best soleplate or the best burst of steam or the best swivel of the cord still what it has is complete package of all the individual features clubbed together in decent right performing way which is hard to come by in an individual model got this one on demand from mother for few days she was insisting on buying one iron for daily chores was already researching iron for one of my friends so this search did not last long deven earlier philips was the only name that came to my mind due to its consistency product quality also had bajaj usha morphy in the list but trust in philips did not let me go for any other brand got this iron well in one piece and without any scratches on the soleplate inside boxsteam iron inside poly pack instruction leaflet warranty card aboutwattage watt weight kg water capacity ml cord length meter indicator on off based on temperature setting max water level marking warranty years pros good quality iron with effective ironing steaming body is solid with good finish overall at this range linished teflon coated soleplate for easy gliding on all fabrics gliding is somewhat limited in steam mode due to moisture sufficiently long cable with swivel joint at iron for easy movement and usage capacity of the water tank is sufficient for average steaming operation min or more in one fill spray function is well designed it evenly sprays water and not just throws fine jet of water the spray function produces fine mist that evenly moistens the fabric making it easier to iron out tough creases wattage is sufficient enough for home usage and can easily cover tough wrinkles and heavy clothes easy and fast filling of the tank owing to the huge filling hole easy and complete emptying of the water tank owing to the large hole and the sideways opening door weight on the ok side not lightweight but not even heavyweight some weight is useful as it helps ironing by applying pressure on the cloth empty iron is lightweight only cons steam control knob looks loose at first but it works well in the long run water movement during iron creates jerks and affects smooth operation but that the way it will work you can do anything for regular lightweight iron users it will appear bulky at first but you get used to it in few days no steam burst function in this model gc but you get what you pay for cons are temporary and don affect functionality in the long run so device buttons knobsspray button push to spray steam knob off no steam low less steam high high steam calc clean mode calcium deposit cleaning more below temperature dial rotate to set temperature cutoff for different fabric types linen cotton woolen silk etc usage guide keep knob dial in off position fill the tank to the max level if planning to use steam function connect to mains set the temperature control knob to the required position let it warm up until the indicator goes off now operate steam knob to low or high steam enjoy ironing or steaming without interruption till water lasts use water spray function as required usage tips use ro filtered water if possible as it low in hardness and will ensure the longevity of iron without choking the vents or orifices let the iron heat properly before use leakage has been observed if one uses the iron without heating properly as water will directly pass from vents without getting converted to steam gently clean soleplate and don use any hard material or chemicals emptying water tank every time after usage is recommended to avoid scaling problem as calcium deposits are more in standing water untangle straighten the cord once after every use before storage as these cords tend to develop sharp irrecoverable turns over time and those are hot zones for cable failure when not using steam function keep the steam knob in off position use calc clean mode once in weeks if using normal tap water with medium hardness if water is very hard increase the frequency or if using ro water decrease frequency once in few months clean steam control needle using vinegar to remove the needle rotate the knob to calc clean mode and gently pull it out last but most important use properly earthed wall socket for iron to avoid shocks calc cleaning modethis iron has calc cleaning mode to descale it to do so follow the steps below keep knob in the steam off position fill tank to max level rotate temperature dial to max position and wait for the indicator to go off take out socket from mains and move iron to sink turn the steam knob to calc clean position and pull it up few cms let all water be used up steam and hot water come out along with calcium deposits the principle behind this function is sudden change in temperatures of inside zone which leads to contraction expansion resulting in scaling shredding and flush out clarification damage to body or plate other issues concerns raised by other users several users posted about the damaged product or soleplate on arrival and other usage issues let me put my insights into those had no issue with the quality of the product delivered it arrived in proper condition without any damage anywhere as proper care was taken for this using air cushions maybe their seller was careless enough and that resulted in damage during transit soleplate had no marks on it yes here philips can provide protective sticker or film on the plate which will reduce the ratio of complaints for the damaged sole plate on arrival temperature dial works properly and markings are intact after months of usage slight difference in color tone maybe there across different zones as different materials are used as per requirement say hot zone near plate vs cold zone at back leakage will be there if the steam knob is in steam position and iron is not sufficiently hot to convert incoming water so it passed directly appears as leakage philips has explicitly mentioned this in product details remember to order it from reputed seller check seller ratings reviews and amazon verified tag to avoid any issues like the faulty product duplicate product etc don get confused there no steam burst mode here some of the photos displayed are with steam burst function symbol on the button even some users have mentioned this in their reviews but it is not present in this model models with the said function have two buttons for spray burst instead of one here for spray only also steam output at one place is min another place min its actually min final verdict if you are looking for good quality durable steaming iron in the range philips is the name you should seek for this model of philips has got good build quality features which are more than enough for an average home user so at any point you can go for this model if on lower budget range you can go for philips gc or bajaj mx but both are low power and philips one misses steam spray function too but still both will cover most of the usage pattern of home user heavy users may go for philips easy speed plus gc or black decker bd bxir in or morphy richards super glide in range note unlike regular lightweight irons steam irons generally don go easy with repairs unlike regular iron if the coil is damaged in the steam iron whole of the bottom plate needs to be replaced if you are out of warranty it will cost you lot in fact for the cost of the plate plus few bucks you get new iron so check your requirement for regular vs steam iron choose wisely tried removing hard wrinkles of jeans but it couldnt remove them properly they were still visible even after using the steam easyto use but it leaks water very good its good product iron is good and the best delivery with few hours just this iron doesn have stream burst rest is good simple cloth iron

update it been months since first got boat rockerz some of the dislikes ve mentioned earlier in my review are no more dislikes said the sound is more or less on flatter side but quite used to it and loving it the second point is said if you are an audiophile then you may not like it but was wrong you might ask why here is why after long gap visited my father who is an audiophile he has numerous high end headphones but unfortunately he got the attention of my headphone and he just wanted to try it said yes regret it he paired it with his device and played song boy you got to see the grin on his face he said keeping it you buy another one poor me was forced to buy another one few days back got another one one thing noticed in two of my purchase is the audio cable is no good both my audio cable had the same issue so the moral of the story is hide it from your audiophile dad or brother they will unceremoniously snatch it from you jokes apart people you can go wrong with this purchase it worth every square inch happy shopping end of update got this product days back and got it for rs lightning deal of course this is an honest unbiased review keeping in mind the price of the product three days might not be sufficient time to review this product but sorry can help the excitement likes good built quality it is sturdy for the price the build quality is great it is not flimsy the ear cushions are good enough sound quality if you are an audiophile this is not for you bass is decent nothing to go overboard as noticed in other reviews bass is deep enough for the price connectivity pairing is easy connects like breeze dual mode wired and wireless boat rockerz comes with an aux cable if you run out of charge you could always connect the aux cable and use it as wired headphone couldn find substantial difference in the quality of music between wired and wireless though absolutely loved this feature battery backup impressed with the battery backup of this beast ve been using it for days for hrs day still its running so guess the hr backup per charge is not marketing gimmick presume it true so far so good will update it after month usage dislikes sound quality is more on the flatter side when you compare it with budget wired headphones like sennheiser cx street ii bass is not too deep you won get that ambiance boat website says don just be loud be loud and clear nope sorry ve to disappoint you on this when it loud it not at all clear lot of distortions are there when you are loud comfort believe me it not at all comfortable for prolonged usage your ear will beg you to take it off after mins if you have high fortitude you can push it till hrs if you could go more than that without taking it off for minute then you are superhuman range boats says meters range in my experience if you go beyond meters then the voice will break you will never ever get mtrs range trust me on that and experiencing occasional breaks in the streaming nothing intrusive so far but don know whether it will be problem down the line will let you guys know about it later if it problem flimsy aux cable can complain too much about the aux cable keeping the price in mind remember paid only for it but with certain devices the aux was not working properly mi note had issues mi also had issues with aux not sure whether it the problem with my device but it worked flawlessly on my laptop wafer thin service centers boat gives yr warranty but what good is it if you can find any service centers near you this is hit or miss guys voice cancellation didn find this effective maybe it just me not sure microphone is pretty much useless you can make calls with this headset some alternatives these are all wired headphones comparing them with wireless may not be good idea but still compare it with them because boat rockerz comes with an aux cable and if you are looking for an alternative irrespective of wired or wireless it might be of some use to you sennheiser cx street ii don think boat can beat this one quality the sound is incomparable the base is deep nice fidelity nice ambiance and for price of this is unbeatable budget wired in ear headphone own of this beauty total value for money if you are an audiophile and are on tight budget then can better alternative than this sound magic in ear headphones with mic black gold this is another tvfm earphone sony extra bass mdr xb on ear headphones don buy it if you are an audiophile obviously audiophiles will go only for wired headphones if you intend to use it for long hours buy it if you are looking for budget wireless headphone with decent built quality and performance if you require wired and wireless package in one verdict give this headphone score of if you are on budget and you want to enjoy hassle free bluetooth headphone with good performance then close your eyes and buy this beast trust me you won regret it you won be disappointed in this price range couldn find any other headphone with such performance we don have many options do we pthe actual price is rs and amazon claim they are giving discount pls don fall for that would not recommend paying more than rupees for this headphone note not an expert in this field this is just lay man review thank you for reading the review and hope this will help you with your purchase decision my boat wired in ears were giving out after hard use and wanted new pair of headphones and wanted them to be over the head types like this one also wanted one with both aux and bluetooth options since would be using it for the tv laptop and my phone have fumbled with this strata of the headphone market previously and after buying good for nothing ones from motorola chanced upon this value for money good bass nice sound quality good build but not premium if you can get it below rs then it is very good deal its difficult to let go of my boat headphones bought this on for price on sale the bluetooth was working fine but it went off after an year know this would happen and thats when the legendary aux cable comes in ive been using it with the aux cable for almost years again but later the top headphone band broke off used fevistick to stick it up and used it stretched it even further but it broke again but there is no difference in soundquality what so ever so far its been soldi years since usage of this product still trying to stretch it further if it doesnt work may hvae to say good by to this beast of product and its sad to note that the current boat products on offer fail to deliver this robust quality they ve become the company that focuses on quantity over quality nowadays evolutions aside gotta respect this product for what it has given me so far genuinely reviewed after years and it still working but once head strip was broke fixed it by using you tube video overall it very good purchase for me dont think about specs you can blindly buy because it worth it recently purchased the bo at rockerz bluetooth headphones they have great sound quality and the soft padded ear cushions are very comfortable the battery life is also impressive with up to hours of playback overall very happy with my purchase and would recommend them to anyone looking for good pair of bluetooth headphones under rs it is best head phone sound quality super bass good noise cancelation not bad product weight not heavy nice headphone nhi bole to jhakas sound quality is very good and bass is also good but was expecting more like theatre bass but not like that hhh laalach karna buri chijh hum sudhrenge nhi kabhi think bored sum of this headphone mast hai enjoying good quality easily connected my lg smart tv

update returned the drive with money reverted back seller was cooperative reverted without hassle or communication about the brand sandisk san disk is an israeli american manufacturer of flash memory products including memory cards and readers usb flash drives and solid state drives as of february it is the third largest manufacturer of flash memory san disk was founded in by eli harari sanjay mehrotra and jack yuan with sanjay mehrotra being the president the ceo on may san disk was acquired by hard drive manufacturer western digital in us billion deal why dual drive why gb why sandisk before we proceed with the muscle merits or the key features of the device lets have quick look upon my personal selection process dual drive apart from my need for basic pen drive with sufficient storage chose to go with dual drive that could work with my mobile devices to offload it of the memory burdens and play some stored media at instant whenever desire crosses over could have gone with basic pendrive with usb to otg adaptor cable but then realized in todays comfort seeking world whos will keep track for the tiny adaptor cable or moreover take the trouble every time to fetch it then fit it in event of sudden mood swing for any mobile media requirement gb this capacity seemed to offer decent compromise between storage price future proofing as with modern mobile cameras photos and videos shot are mostly of high resolution and larger size gb ensures that you wont have to empty it out any sooner or on regular basis sandisk in the recent few years sandisk after becoming western digital brand has witnessed tremendous growth in market capitalization quality and brand image offers the best value for money deals for an average usage moreover could not find much reputed brands in the storage with otg feature note speed enthusiasts though should refrain from this version should try its designated speedier extreme versions or other brands like transcend samsung about our product the device comes with the title san disk ultra dual drive and is the newer version of its previous iteration here need to quote that the term ultra came quite as surprise to me as found nothing in lines with common understanding of ultra we will discuss it in detail in upcoming columns of speed with micro usb connector on one end and usb connector on the other the drive lets you move content easily between your android phones tablets with micro usb ports only or laptops both the connectors are carved out of metal the usb connector is backward compatible with usb ports size the size of the usb is quite small which can be good for easy storage in your pockets but might be tedious to find if misplaced the usb fares around an inch in perfect closed condition and inches when expanded at usb end construction the device has plastic body the overall construction of the drive is just average the retractable plastic column seems to the weakest link of all and would surely break if you accidentally step over it however the actual drive storage portion is built of rigid plastic and wont give up so easily both the usb ports are built of metal which again is quite relief fit finish being equipped with retractable mechanism being too small the drive is not so smooth to use slide in or out in single shot and needs some getting used to but then most of the otg drives are designed small and hence have some or the other odd way of conserving size the usb ports fit comfortably in devices and pulling it out too is fairly easy storage format since the previous fat version had limitation of file transfer size of maximum of gb for single file ntfs was not compatible with mac os so with increasing file sizes ex fat format was devised which doesnt have size limitation like fat yet is compatible with mac as well so our drive has only ex fat ntfs formats to choose comes in ex fat by default with kb file allocation size increasing the file allocation size may increase the transfer speeds little but will affect the storage capacity little too changing it from to kb increased my write speeds from mb to mb if thats relief to anyone the format would surely work well with most of the tvs tablets and mobiles though check it with the car audio head unit and try to change to ntfs if it doesnt work speed the de merit detail have been flagship gadgets freak all my life preliminary to my purchase had doubts regarding its speed as quoted by fellow buyers but then did not have speed in my mind as primary motive for this there were not many options for dual otg device so took leap of faith and went ahead with purchase my basic intent was to load bulk movies from my laptop into it and watch it over my tv or mobile however when was transferring movies of total size gb it started showing minutes which kept on getting higher it felt like waiting forever for it to happen even for single movie of gb it took minutes sec by stopwatch to transfer the write speeds started with mb sec and went down down to mb sec even with my older kingston dt elite gb the write speeds were in excess of mb sec admit have usb port at my laptop yet was never used to such low speeds ever the tagline ultra and mentioned speeds of mb sec which suppose is the rated max speeds at usb ports felt like dream and beyond exaggeration finally with every passing minute it became all the more unbearable and annoying even in ntfs format speeds were the same had never expected it to be this slow in this modern era of thus finally decided to return it but suppose will only get replacement not reversal know that read write speeds depend upon lot of factors including transferred file type format configuration of drive configuration of host destination device etc benchmark crystal disk mark scores for file transfer of mb size were mb read mb write which looked like mere consolation transfer between my samsung mobile tablet too was not fast verdict yes my friends all other reviews about this being slow to the point of being unbearable are absolutely right and maybe san disk should retag it as ultra slow storage out of the total name plate rating of gb the actual allocated space for usage is around gb which is ok enough warranty the product comes with year limited warranty which is one of the segment best offers price bought the device for bucks which was reasonable to me given the storage size dual drive brand image mrp over the pack was printed bucks it was tagged made in malaysia only if it was bit faster final verdict all in all in my personal opinion given the brand image ultra tagline modern day technology advancements even if you try to be too generous or lenient upon the transfer speeds yet its hard to spare such low read write rates even for routine tasks it will keep on reminding you of the compromise you made for full price it could have been great all rounder device coupled with the good brand reputation of sandisk years of warranty had its speed been any better covered here actual storage space heating mobile phones tight fitting on mobile phones speed formatting file system value for money free app company brand seller about company product seller san disk ultra is brand of western digital which is the same company that sells external hard disk storage devices under the brand wd elements and wd portable about to years ago wd elements portable drives of tb and tb were priced rs less than current day prices they were sold by cloudtail seller on amazon now san disk and wd drives are sold by appario retail seller on amazon for best prices on san disk and wd products in india the current seller has the lowest prices for authentic brand new products reason for higher prices for same brand same capacity storage devices may be various such as import duties taxes manufacturing costs higher demand for the brand etc review san disk ultra dual gb usb otg pen drive gold storage space just as in external hard disk drives the actual usable storage space will be less than what is mentioned on the product same as others for the gb pen drive actual storage space available is gb this is normal and not some fraud or fake advertisement this is because it has fat file system also the device uses some space for its functionality and use in linux os laptop the available storage space on this fat pen drive is shown to be gb so that gb more than what windows os calculates using their ntfs file system heating even with just minutes of use you can touch and feel that the metal part of the pen drive is getting heated but the performance of the drive has not got affected by the heat this heating does not happen in wd external hard disks and seems to be unique to small pen drives of various brands mobile phones the pen drive works with android os of mi phones such as redmi note running android including old android version as well too tight for phones the pen drive is tight fit on mobile phones tablets so be careful when pulling it out so as to not damage your phone because this is also the charging point for your phone if you feel that your phone is too tight for this pen drive then it is best not to use it for phone data storage management value for money even if you don use this pen drive for mobile phone it is still the best price for gb pen drive with usb backward compatible with older usb ports on older laptops and computers speed the speed is extremely good for windows os laptop linux os laptop and android mobile phones file system formatting the pen drive unless you are sure you won use your pen drive on particular device don format the pen drive to change its fat file system but for example if you have decided that you won use it on mobile phones or tablets because the fitting is too tight and you don want to risk damage to this point which is primarily used for charging then go ahead and format the pen drive for your laptop with ntfs formatting you will see an increase in available storage space in your pen drive with your linux system file format you will have better storage space than any windows file system beware that if the pen drive has ntfs file system then it won work with mobile phones tablets laptops which don have windows operating system same way if you format the pen drive for linux os file system it won be recognised on windows laptops android phones tablets etc if like most people you will be using this pen drive on laptops or other devices of friends or co workers then leave the existing fat file system as it is free app memory zone app for android is bundled free in this pen drive it is easy to install and doesn take any phone permissions other than storage access it is very useful app with easy user interface app takes mb storage space on android phones features include cleaning junk files that you may not otherwise know through your phone file manager app enable or disable automatic backup to your pen drive add cloud storage such as google drive or microsoft one drive and add micro sd card storage to manage all your files from just one memory zone app restore backup copy move delete files as well as clean up whats app related files see available storage space on your phone see data sorted into photos videos music documents beware users of memory zone app should know that they agree to terms of use which include that if some government agency requests the company for information against piracy such as illegal copy storage distribution of movies music software books etc as per dmca copyright laws then the company will provide the user data to the government investigating agency to protect the intellectual property of content owners overall best product in the market at best price in indian market with features not offered by other companies for similar specs value for money may be desig can be improve for the sliding and handling it was good with compatibility and storage of data but its slow in data transfer it take so much time for moving and copying of files good quality good quality product pendrive quality to aacchi par storage gb ki jagah gb hi milta gb kam milta par accha hai original pandrive good

updated overall you really get what you pay for they serve the purpose of decent pair of tws for basic quality calls and music listening main problem noticed was with the pairing and connection strength as they routinely lose signal for no apparent reason once or twice had issue of only one of the buds getting paired and had to reset the other one to get it paired if you have paired these to one device and try to pair to another one without disconnecting from first it simply doesn work this is starting to get annoying but maybe ll get used to it we ll see this is just day review of these got them for rs on some offer on amazon ll post updates later on hope this is helpful for anyone interested package the packaging is quite decent for such low price comes with the tws earphones fitted with medium earplugs fitted inside the case also included are very short usb cable and two additional earplugs small and large package includes some noise stickers and pretty good user manual and warranty instruction card build was immediately dissapointed with the plastic case as the lid was rattling and not confidence boosting will use it for while to see if my worries are unfounded the earphones themselves are rather sturdy feeling in hand they fit very snuggly into the case and there is no evident feel of them coming lose or rattling within the case comfort this is very subjective and each ear is different it one of the reaonss wanted to get cheap tws to see if ok with the form factor for long hours the prefitted medium size earplugs were not comfortable so switched to the small size ones and after about mins forgot was even wearing them the earbuds are very lightweight owing to the plastic build but upside is that they don cause any strain even after an hour of continuous use one thing to note is that if you have gandhi ears then the fit might be little awkward should know my ears covered the touch areas of the buds so had to fiddle around bit if wanted to do any of the touch actions ymmv sound quality liked them no audiophile but they have decent volume and satisfactory levels of bass and separation tried my usual test at and they fared quite well the treble maxes out at khz post which you hear nothing at all but this is to be expected at the price point there was noticeable vibrations creeping in at below hz but the and drivers seem to be matched well and all of the panning tests were quite decent feel this definitely punches above its price point call quality in low to no outside noise environment the microphones were very good there was no lag and the person on the other side said my voice was very clear but things take steep fall as soon as little noise is present and you start sounding like you re inside well seems the mics can figure out how to filter out your voice so they end up trashing the call quality overall you get what you pay for here range max got was around not sure how they tested and got as advertised any disruptions like wall will simply break the connection but they connected back automatically every time so far so guess that passable pairing update on th aug major issue here is that if already paired to device like laptop they simply are unable to be paired to another device like your phone you have to unpair from the first device and then try to pair again had issues like only one of the buds pairing as well have to fiddle around to get it to work and is not convenient don have phone to test the fast pair features actually not even sure these support it anyway the earphones go into pairing mode as soon as you remove them from the case and was able to pair with no problems on multiple phones they will auto pair post this initial setup to previously paired devices could not find any way to control the pairing mode though you have to live with what it comes with as there is no app or anything to control what it does they switch off pairing mode once you put them in the case so hopefully that means the battery would be saved little battery life way too early to tell anything will share my experience post one week and one month but they came around charged in the box and have stated to charge the case box says it will take hrs to fully charge it and there are basic indicators like flashing red led for charging which turns solid red once done the earphones also have leds that blink red white to indicate pairing low battery etc sync issues none so far but have seen many such reports and reviews wherein the and earphones seem to go out of sync on similar low price twses so will see if face any such problems these are the primary areas that am concerned with while evaluating any tws so will share how my experience is after while so far happy with them hi my name is akshay used this product and this is very good in sound and valuable money good in calling also everything is perfect good sound quality buds are very good quality with great noise cancellation feature when we received this order box is already opened like this was not expected at all what don like is the earpads sometime it came out don know the reason even tried different fits rest is great amazing sound it is the best choice for the product

used it to keep the air inside as clean as possible this model does provide clean air over reasonable sized space if the windows and doors are kept closed great product with capability to reduce dust by approximately if atmosphere pm is ppm it will be reduced to upto ppm inside room only if minimum ventilation is provided to take care the co we generate in my case have found in my area that the ambient has co at ppm if we open one window door to only by mm clearnce the co is being maintained from to ppm with adults inside the room based on wind velocity and direction this adjustment mm clearance was achieved measuring with calibrated stand alone co cum pm measurement meter one more example with above ventilation arrangement the machine is in auto and ambient air pm at ppm room also at ppm the fan speed reached medium sound audible it took some time to reach ppm and then it took min from ppm to ppm now fan speed changed to low speed in auto sound is inaudible this ppm starts increasing gradually to ppm in minutes now fan speed increases to medium again and the cycle repeats as long as outside pm is ppm similarly the fan speed so it sound can be very high if ambient pollution is very high it needs external cleaning of it hepa filter every month based on pollution the sensor may need cleaning every months for accurate readings if sensor mal functions it is to be cleaned first and check before taking to any service center it has simple filter element with spare availability and capable to give atleast times the specified life if we clean the hepa filter element externally with vacuum cleaner regularly it does not have ozone producing uv rays or ion generators which if not properly designed specified to customes not worry may pollute the air with ozone it has particulate count pm meter which is very accurate in addition it change display colour according to pollution zones to know the condition of air in the room the readings were authenticated with above calibrated stand alone meter co pm pm and pm we have to keep it on auto to facilitate to change flow speed based on pollution level it stemperature and humidity meters are also useful update still under warranty it developed some abnormal sound just audible when we go near to it like kitch kitch kitch at lowest speed doubt was on loosening of bottom locknut of fan and sound is ruled out from fan bearings this diagnosis also strengthened by the observation that the above sound disappeared when it is made upside down bottom cover opened side covers opened the bottom grill was moved down by lifting lock with columns and it was found that the button lock nut was in slightly loose condition as anticipated the abnormal sound and mild vibration problems are resolved after tightening the nut with mm tubular spanner already available with me holding the fan nut is self locking type and assembled back but opening of side covers is tricky and risky job some locks may be broken use hand gloves to protect hands from sharp edges they may open in jerky motion have made some top grill locks bottom side open by cutting modification so that can open the panels easily in future however another mi air purifier is working almost continuously without any problem from last years update high abnormal sound observed this time want send it to service center but while lifting some material flied off from grill so when run it upside down many foreign material came out like some bodies of flying ants their wings and one baby lizard now again it is working normal actualy ther is no need of any smart features for an air filter in practicality we just plug and use it yes air quality is improving but it does not reduce any allergic issues really liked the product like how it shows the current aqi has auto mode night mode that is super helpful with baby the air purifier is is quiet filters well and quickly will wait and watch for long term reliability plus the replacement filters are expensive but the seller shipped an item in an open box turned out to be used product filter says remaining meaning it had been used to good extent earlier not sure why second hand items are sold as new works well since months more comments will be updated sooner like because the performance is good and effective very easy to install it works well but pollution level indicator is not reliable and keeps changing number very quickly in vide range so in night you can use night mode

useful for dark colour delicate dress what an amazing product was quite sceptical before buying it after reading all these mixed reviews but glad did smoothens out the creases from dresses coats woollens and any fabric which is otherwise non iron able of course you cant expect it to crease out the cotton shirts but it is very handy product especially if you are travelling also the steam sanitises the clothes making them odour free the water tank is small and needs to be re filled again after about clothes but bigger tank would have made it heavy and difficult to operate overall good purchase loving this product while using it does the job pretty well the cons according to me are you cannot use it with clothes placed on horizontal flat surfaces because the water doesnt reach the outlet in the tank if the tank is half empty the alternative is that the dress has to be hanged to cloth hanger and then use the steamer be careful while steaming as it may burn the skin keep you palm at safe distance while steaming the dress this may be an issue when you try to steam the sleeves of the garment and also for flowing dresses not all fabrics can be completely wrinkle free it sometimes leaves more steam and water at times leaving your garment with wet patches the garment feels wet after using the steamer you have to keep filling the tank twice for using it on one top easy to use sturdy and does the job only thing is that it takes time to cool rest of all good its an amazing product and easy to use just hang the cloth somewhere and start using this great product easy to carry foldable and results great an average product but the cost is too high as it doesnt completely satisfy your purpose
