verdict solid buy for this price segment in and even for early there are reviews in this section review is days after purchase typos in the review has rectified now and review is days post android beta update these reviews are based on my own personal experience of the device purchased here in amazon on august before oos update only for jio was enabled via another update is still not available in my region hence related parameters are not covered in this review review after about days of oxygen os beta update android update received on dec note after the beta update no new issues popped up there were no heating related issues no fast battery drain no change in the charging time no annoying bugs no change in camera performance beta update is mostly like stable update oos android update review delighters no new apps added absolutely not system storage consumption remains the same gb animations are more fluidic more customization ui features added scout widgets in home screen enlarged folder lot more daily data usage is available in the notification panel and need not be reset daily unlike earlier slight improvement in the front ambient light sensor ability to play videos in the background screen off as well even for you tube really welcoming longing feature which other brand uis have not or only with screen off stand by battery life has improved substantially disappointers brightness at lowest level is brighter than before no improvement in sound levels still initial is too silent no dolby atomos which was mentioned for oos perhaps to wait for stable update auto brightness latency is higher than earlier response time is tad increased haptics have become tighter than earlier but still not stronger review verdict good buy in this price range in note this review is after month usage received updates during the course of time recent update was of gb system consumes gb space gb variant is pretty adequate for normal usage band is missing for the unit bought does not have any sort of heating issues or fast battery drain issue shifting from hz to this hz mobile no noticeable difference observed in non gaming aspect nothing great or noting worse in the unmentioned parameters things that are delighting exceptional signal reception especially carrier aggregation very fast download speeds insane fast charging to in mins to in mins excluding trickle charge no heating of the mobile just slight warming during charging stand by charge and so is fantastic even more than hrs for videos yt and general tasks and calls even in mobile data always on and aod set to battery saver oxygen os color os realme os bloatware the skin is really good nothing to complain like other brands ui absolutely no rd party bloatware and no ads in the ui or any nd party apps even some nd party apps are un installable no major bothering bugs noticed till date yes the alert slider is included unlike some premium one plus models things that are annoying dual ambient light sensor in rear and other in front is not well calibrated the brightness is always in the lower side and frequent manual increase in required volume level is useless until level can be audible only in pin drop silence ambience audible enough only post level stereo speakers output are bottom and earpiece but full volume doesn distort is loud enough haptics are tight but not strong even in higher levels effective only post and best only level hotspot drains battery quickly even warning notification pops up also chrome and google app eats away battery quickly parallel downloads makes the area near the camera module warm though the in hand feel is good the buttons are of no close tolerances and wobbles bit data billing cycle to be reset daily to show the daily data usage in the notification panel the inbuild dac no mm hole and only type port is not great the dirac equalizer is also not yielding best output perhaps dolby atmos support in oos could improve the audio output very happy with the product performance installation very easy to start using had to wait for days for the technician but with the instructions from box you can start yourself without waiting in the box disposable mops washable mops side brushes main brush mopping plate deebot dust chamber with hepa filter charging dock cable user manual cleaning brush cleaning performance superb cleaning with power options quiet normal max and max lower suction means lower battery consumption with higher suction power even the minutest dust particles will be cleaned up good if you have children in the house higher suction also means you need to clean the dust chamber more frequently in all the power options the house will look clean and will collect most visible dust the higher options are for deep cleaning also if you have groves or areas that accumulate dust over time in the flooring the higher power will pull out dust from these tiny places cleaning pattern st edges of the room are cleaned and then it will run north south or east west cleaning pattern inside the edges no specific patterns like or spiral mopping performance the mopping also has electronically controlled water usage low medium high ultra high the app shows warnings when using high and ultra high the robot may slip due to water on the floor but have been using high water flow on ceramic tiles and have not faced such problem the wheels of the robot have good grip which help with the higher water settings the mopping will become more and more effective over time with usage of the reusable mopping pad as it gets older more area will touch the floor than new mopping pad for the st week the mopping is not as good as the mopping pad does not entirely touch the floor but with usage the shape of pad will adapt and you will get better results corner cleaning cms of wall corners may not be cleaned esp if you don have straight walls if you have bathroom door which has cm cutout in the wall then the corner area around the door might not be cleaned degree wall corners may have cm area which is not cleaned however the side brushes are large enough for most of these corners all other areas with obstacles such as chair or table legs will be properly cleaned deebot may run around them or times corner mopping as the deebot mop is round it will not reach the corners expect cm area in the degree wall corners not being mopped however on straight walls the cleaning is very effective as it may only miss cms which however will be cleaned by side brushes important if you have black furniture black stone wall tiles mirrors or any reflective furniture at the height where deebot top mounted laser is located the corner area near that black furniture will not be cleaned by deebot the laser is not able to properly recognize that it is wall and will run few centimeters away from that wall this is important to consider if you have substantial amount of blacks in your house as the cleaning will be less effective mapping the st run will map the entire house and you need to follow deebot as it maps so that no areas are obstructed subsequent runs will update the map with any obstacles chairs and tables if they were not initially mapped the version does not have additional sensors as the pro version so it may crash into smaller items that the top mounted laser cannot directly see also you can save at maximum of maps at time floors the st run will be very random cleaning pattern after the st run you can edit the rooms divide or merge areas and rename the rooms based on some preset options like living room bed room kitchen etc once the rooms are mapped deebot will clean each room in the subsequent run and then you will be able to see proper cleaning pattern the created maps are not editable you cannot move or adjust boundaries you have option to add virtual boundaries as line or as rectangle box where the robot should not go this is extremely useful if you have mirrors or reflecting furniture at the height of deebot deebot laser reflects off the mirrors and assumes there is area of the house where it may be able to go behind the mirror so you need to manually block this mapped area behind the mirror with virtual boundary or box deebot will automatically detect carpets and not mop over them if you have installed mopping plate then deebot will ignore carpet area also there is an option to mark areas as no mop areas similar to virtual boundary application use used the android application for setup and regular cleaning functions the app has an advanced mode which works as per the stored map if you turn it off deebot will start cleaning wherever you place it have balcony which can be accessed by the deebot directly can pickup and place it in the balcony turn advanced mode off and start cleaning once it is done it will return to the place where you put it and notify that docking station is not accessible the app also has cleaning modes with advanced mode turned on area cleaning select room or multiple rooms to clean auto clean clean the entire house custom cleaning select an area on the map to clean you can preset the sequence in which you want to clean the rooms you can also set different vacuum and water levels for each room or can use common setting for the entire house you can also preset how many times options are once or twice you want to clean specific room you can also set multiple cleaning schedules based on which room you want to clean at what time of the day deebot will start working automatically however this is not advisable if you are mopping as per the technician you must remove mopping plate after use if any water leaks onto the parts it may void warranty there is an option to auto boost suction on carpets to max you can set the option for continuous cleaning whether you want deebot to auto restart cleaning if it runs out of charge midway deebot will only recharge partially based on the remaining cleaning area resume the cleaning and then return to recharge this saves time the app also shows usage period of accessories in hours and the total expected usage time it is an ecovacs recommendation to replace the accessories side brush main brush hepa filter this area of the app also shows how to clean or maintain with images which is really helpful the app shows history of cleaning cycles with maps this helps to check if any areas were not cleaned cleaning and maintenance expect that instead of cleaning the house daily you will be washing the mopping pad every day and cleaning deebot once every week depending on the size of your house cleaning will take around to minutes remove all hairs from side brush main brush and wheels remove the dust chamber remove the hepa filter and wash the dust chamber wash the main and side brushes if needed clean all the sensors of deebot with dry cloth let the washed accessories dry and then reinstall them also remember that the investment in robot is not onetime cost you will need to replace the accessories every months based on the usage and maintenance consider the replacement cost also while evaluating price point for investment in robot vacuum overall rating the cleaning and mopping performance is very good and better than house maid in most circumstances deebot goes under the sofas expect manual work such as clearing the rooms before running the cleaning cycle and cleaning areas out of reach of deebot in this price range am very satisfied with the performance

what not to love about this all new inch amazon fire tv unboxingthe whole experience from delivery to commissioning was completely seamless the packaging is strong and very sturdy using lot of bio degradable materials the unboxing was delight and fixing the included wall mount was piece of cake amazon integrationnow comes the amazon magic switch on the tv and it already knew me and my amazon prime account after brief online security check all my content and apps automatically appeared on screen and setup was done optical audio outi using jbl soundbar with sub woofer which are connected to my inch amazon fire tv using an optical cable not supplied and by simply changing settings on the tv my audio system automatically switches on and off with the tv and the supplied tv remote has volume controls for my cinema sound the sound reproduction is first class can comment on the built in tv speakers because haven used them picture qualitythere are lots of presets for the screen including natural cinema gaming etc and you can also set customised screen to your own liking the picture quality is excellent every bit as good as my other tv from famous brand that costs the price of my inch amazon fire tv impressed hdmi connectivityi only using hdmi because all my content is streamed and have been using an amazon firestick and google chromecast the chromecast is plugged into hdmi and the tv automatically switches to it when you want to use it however don think ll be using the chromecast much because fire tv is so good and has an amazing remote control also using tb external hard drive plugged into the fast usb playing movies even in hd is perfect experience with no lag or juddering access to the sockets on the wall mounted tv is ok if you have small arms and although only using hdmi optical audio out and one usb there is plenty of connectivity for other equipment just one thing this version of fire tv only allows alexa to speak languages viz english indian or hindi my amazon firestick echo show echo show echo and echo dot all have settings for english uk aus usa etc spanish french german and many other languages really would like to use alexa on my inch amazon fire tv in my native language it makes it easier for alexa to understand me and easier for me to understand alexa hope that this will come in software update conclusioni think that this inch amazon fire tv is amazing and would recommend it without hesitation

when purchased this watch thought it couple be used to send sms make calls access notifications without being connected to the phone knew that third party notifications required the phone to be connected to the internet but thought the watch could place calls and send texts even if the phone is switched off the product ordered can only make calls when disconnected from the phone features such as sms surprising since this is an lte version and notifications this includes watch apps such as outlook that require internet are only synced with the watch on it is connected to the phone via bluetoothi did not check other features as the main reason ordered this watch was accessibility to notifications without phone have been using this since june it looks good on the wrist and has all useful features like calling reading and replying whatsapp messages the battery is too low though keep it switched off at night never used it to track sleep yet have to charge every couple of days plus it gets charged slow all features of the watch is good but battery backup is very poor after full charge it runs hours but after average uses it will run hours only it amazing with the lte function now don lug my phone to the gym but the battery life sucks and have to charge twice specially when use lte also it heats for some reason and needs to cool down once in while that time the watch automatically goes into hibernation and starts after some time positives are accuracy sleep tracking monitor remote lte connection wears amazing on the wrist great screen negative battery life using it for month fits well have wireless charger you can also charge it from your phone if your phone supports wireless charging one thing which is common to most smart watches is when you re traveling in bus or car in bumby road it will assume you are jogging and congratulate you for completing daily tasks charging is too slow which is to be expected unless you have samsung flagship phone you won be able to see camera app on the watch and you ll have to get third party applications and they re just horrible product is good pros health accuracy is high ui is good design and build quality is also good con app is not that good and facing connectivity issues good

would not consider buying an phone simply because my friend owns two of them or blindly go for new android model suggested by my son or nephew both of whom are more tech savvy than me because their recommendations are obviously based on their own needs and expectations which may differ from mine am an old fashioned mechanical engineer with basic understanding of parameters like millimetres megapixels and megabytes but think of cellphone as utility item not status symbol applying technocratic approach would not choose costlier option unless get additional features which suit my requirements my foremost requirement which is entirely non negotiable is that my handset must have provision for two sim cards since do not want to carry two separate handsets for my cug and personal numbers my other requirements are not difficult to fulfil phonebook with at least contacts basic net connectivity basic camera for photos and videos and scope for downloading few apps such as the ubiquitous whats app and my favourite word games which do not need much memory or processing capacity would certainly appreciate practical features like high reliability software and security updates and high battery capacity sufficient for hours or preferably hours at my normal level of usage besides would like to use new handset for at least two years apart from exigencies do not intend to use my cellphone for surfing the internet videoconferencing or sending mails as prefer using desktop or laptop for such activities am equally clear about what do not need do not intend to use my cellphone for watching movies reading books listening to music or creating fancy social media posts nor do want device for taking high resolution photos during vacation as would prefer to use camera at the risk of sounding flippant would say that do not want device to unlock my car or count the strokes in game of golf primarily because do not own car and do not play golf having used smartphones of samsung and motorola makes over the past few years vastly prefer the former my last phone which gave me over months of good service was samsung since that model is obsolete now focused on its upgraded cousins and the last was immediately ruled out as it does not support two sim cards along with an sd card after studying the relative specifications of and concluded that the latter offers better value for money generally it is worth going for the higher memory and higher ram versions as these parameters affect the performance and the difference in cost is relatively small with these considerations narrowed down my choice to with gb ram and gb storage just twenty years ago was using desktop with gb memory as confirmation for my choice compared the phone had selected with one plus nord ce gb ram gb storage which my son had recommended the specification of the samsung phone was found to be equivalent or superior for the major parameters except that the display screen technology was tft instead of amoled also watched some youtube videos about these handsets for better appreciation of their competing features the clinching factor was that the samsung phone was priced substantially lower than the one plus product as for body colour my first choice was emerald brown but settled for the mystique green since the former was not available in my selected configuration was thinking this would be irrelevant since use case which completely encloses the handset but it turned out that the body colour can be glimpsed through the cutout for the cameras on the rear of the phone despite strong family resemblance with my old one the new phone offers decidedly superior specifications and it meets my requirements perfectly it is few millimetres longer and few grams heavier than my old phone but these differences are acceptable to me thanks to the mp front camera and mp selfie camera the quality of photos and videos is above my expectations see sample pic taken at night at distance of about metres from the stage this phone offers two years of android updates and four years of security patch updates which reduces the worries on these fronts youtube reviewers complain that the has plain looks it is heavy its audio does not offer an immersive listening experience and its screen is plain old tft instead of amoled am willing to live with these perceived shortcomings so long as the meets my requirements was glad to find that samsung has taken an environmentally friendly step of offering many models of handsets without chargers because old chargers like old handsets add to waste however it needs to be kept in mind that new handsets require higher capacity chargers the recommended charger for is watts but the chargers had at home are rated at or watts to cut long story short ordered watt charger along with the phone to avoid compromising with the charging time after using the new handset for couple of weeks find that my phone is at charge at the end of the day and it takes minutes for complete charging one of the useful features of is that it shows the time remaining for complete charging as soon as it is plugged in for charging it turns out that could have managed with the old watt charger except that it would have taken minutes for full charging conclude by emphasizing that samsung galaxy is the perfect phone but for my requirements word of advice if you are planning to buy new phone it would be helpful if you list out your requirements so that you do not end up paying for features that you do not intend to use with connectivity hz display and solid performance the galaxy is samsungs best value smartphone yet under segment pros almost half the price of galaxy exynos is solid performer excellent hz display with smooth experience across the board huge performance uplift over one ui based on android has tons of good features to love none of the flagship grade features are skipped here apart from dex mode and spen features zero lag or stuttering in hz mode with ease of use and seemless switching of apps without any crash or reloading of apps makes using one ui pleasure to surf across you get features like screen recorder video call effects game launcher link to windows dual messenger quick share music share and secure folder along with many others some of the fancy android features like the ability to change the color palette of icons and menus based on the wallpaper and dim the screen for easier reading in the dark are also included voice focus for calls is excellent feature phone call quality is really good even in nosiy and crowded areas had no issues with gps or connectivity while using google maps to navigate signal stays strong even in rural areas thats positive point with good accuracy volte with carrier aggregation works flawlessly wifi connectivity on the dual band ghz router is strong and performs more than satisfactorily with low latency response bluetooth connectivity is strong and has good range no worries of disconnection even as far as meters audio quality via mm jack is excellent compared to redmi note pro much more defined and well rounded for media consumption widewine support is present good av experience on ott platforms have no serious complaints about color reproduction in videos considering tft lcd this panel does good enough job main camera mp is on par and better than redmi note pro in almost all conditions retains colors close to reality with good dynamic range and handling of exposure with hdr in photos as well as videos it is able to handle extremely bright conditions well even in shadows during day time it was able to maintain good colors good stable videos at video recording is available at fps is available many cool camera features boasts ar fun mode single take object eraser and video tnr temporal noise reduction which makes it fun to use camera selfie camera has good punchy colors samsung way of boosted colour processing some may like it some may not excellent battery life got hours of sot despite the heavy usage it takes around hours to go from and half an hour of charging can take the battery percentage to around provided you have watt samsungs charger despite summer time phone has managed to stay relatively cool nm architecture helping its cause here bands dedicated sd card slot is plus here pd watt fast charging support reasonable for price segment but we have seen faster charging speeds with other oems promised major android os updates and years security updates is huge plus above its competitors making this device more value for money in long run cons ultrawide camera is on softer side lacks details compared to its primary sensor but manages to frame good shots that one can post on social media macro camera is good with colors and edge detection but lacks depth of field and details note pro which is brilliant in this case night shots are above average mostly grainy and muddled but better than most smartphones in its segment lacks some stability in video recording at amoled display could have made it unbeatable lacks stereo speaker but audio quality on single speaker is quite good pre installed bloatwares like moj dailyhunt sharechat byju are mild and uninstallable but makes mature one ui experience looks immature out of the box currently device is not tunned for high gaming performance as limited fps in popular games like bgmi and cod deters it away from being gamer friendly device but we can expect exynos to resolve over time and be more optimized for more games in future updates slightly cheap design chunky in size carries some heft dated notch display lack of charger in the box is bummer which adds up to the value cost proposition
